text:
we don’t talk about this often - being sick.  we all get sick at one time or another, but it’s one of those topics that is quietly ignored.

yes, we all have tons to do with deadlines.  but there is only one of us.  if we are feeling under the weather, our body is letting us know something is just not right.  instead of ignoring it and pushing through, slow down and listen to what your body needs - rest, liquids, mild foods...and then take care of you and your body.

i am feeling under the weather this weekend.  today i will be resting and watching hallmark christmas movies (i know, they’re cheesy but i enjoy them!). 💜 📸: dominik martin
name: Denise Styer, PsyD

text:
since #metoo i have been asked how to support survivors of violence. this is by men and women. those that have experienced abuse and those that haven't.

today we are launching a campaign during the 16 days of activism to support 5 frontline organisations that are working day in and day out to support women that face violence in the uk. if you are able to, please support them by giving whatever you can. they really need help! see link in my bio.

https://www.gofundme.com/rise-together

text:
bannon wanted to use the sorts of aggressive messaging tactics usually reserved for geopolitical conflicts to move the us electorate further to the right, wylie said. he had already directed a series of anti-establishment, conservative documentary films and presided over the far-right website breitbart news, but cambridge analytica would mark another step in his overall ambitions to transform the nation.

with financial backing from hedge-fund billionaire robert mercer, bannon co-founded cambridge analytica in 2013 as the us-branch of strategic communication laboratories (scl) group, a british company that advertises how it has conducted "behavioral change" programs in more than 60 countries.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robert mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

text:
i've watched the qspiracy since the start.

steve bannon left the wh august last year and q appeared the following october. do you believe in coincidences?

abusing and leaking presidential information to mislead the people and benefit the hijacked party of puppets is obviously just business as usual.

however - while doing this djt with the brave bunch known as gop has willingly opened a pussy wound that anyone around the world can easily contaminate. i like to call it meddlin' with presidental blessin'. i'm not the only one who knows this opportunity and messes with the bombastic patriots - may be russia or china or mbs or antifa or me me me, a tiny quarter pounder sitting on my bed.

the whole qshow seems like a vile roleplay but instead it has become the heart of the propaganda operation that joseph goebbels would have died for. it is obvious that stuff like pizzagate™ was testing and groundwork for the 2016 election and since it proved to be very effective it is used still, today, right now.

the accompanying memes go way beyond the propaganda of nsdap. social media companies are just helpless with the fake content - there is no way they are going to risk their business by taking a real responsibility.

there is absolutely no way that gop isn't aware of what is going on - after all cambridge analytica worked for ted cruz and john bolton. the whole narrative is built on the same user data that bannon and the mercers reportedly got from cambridge analytica.

and here comes the best part. trumq is truly playing along with his tweets, gestures and words.

the bigger issue still is that requqlicans are willingly piggybacking this lunacy and abusing the faith of their fellow men while campaigning for the midterms. this is not just an insane national security risk - it's a leaking conspiracy and treason in plain sight.

a non

text:
people think they understand, that you are the same. they don't look beyond what they think they know, who wants to lift the curtain and be exposed to the horror waiting there when ignorance is so much easier to live with. 
don't speak, never tell, bite my tongue or go to hell.

#borderlinepersonalitydisorder #bpd #walkingtheborderline #depression #anxiety #ptsd #metoo #youdontknowme

text:
today is the international day for the elimination of violence against women. violence (physical, sexual and psychological) against women and girls is one of the most widespread human rights violations worldwide today. it remains largely unreported due to the impunity, silence, stigma and shame surrounding it. this must stop. don’t be silent: if you are a victim speak up, if you know someone who is a victim speak up. you are not alone! let’s end this together! .
.
.
astăzi este ziua internațională  pentru eliminarea violenței împotriva femeii! violența (fizică, sexuală și psihologică) împotriva femeilor și a fetelor este cel mai răspândit abuz al drepturilor omului. datorită impunității, a rușinii și a stigmelor aceste abuzuri rămân necunoscute si nu sunt raportate. ajunge! dacă ești o victimă: vorbește, dacă cunoști o victimă: vorbește! nu ești singură; milioane de femei si fete sunt in fiecare an victime ale acestor abuzuri. e timpul să spunem stop împreună!
.
.
.
.
#internationaldaytoendviolenceagainstwomen #stopviolenceagainstwomen #stopchildmarriage #stopchildabuse #stopsexualabuse #stopsexualharassment #endfgm #womensrights #womensrightsarehumanrights #genderequality #violență #violențădomestică #drepturilefemeii #ziuainternaționalăpentrueliminareaviolențeiîmpotrivafemeii #opreșteabuzul #stopviol #romania #women #metoo #drawtheline #drawaline

text:
hush no more!

published on november 14, 2016 youtube channel ualbertados created this piece to break down the stereotype of what sexual assault really is verse what we think it is.

it’s so important that we share our stories and that we hold our attackers accountable! we tend to blame ourselves! we believe no one will believe us.. knowledge + awareness = prevention!

#hushnomore #metoo #believewomen #believesurvivors #womensreality #timesup #nomoore #nevermoore #meat14 #imanastywoman #imwithher #everydaysexism #tothegirls #whyistayed #heforshe #yesallwomen #effyourbeautystandards #fem2

text_retweet:
🧡 if you or someone else you know suffers from domestic abuse call the domestic abuse hotline for resources, support and assistance at 1-800-799-7233. if it is not safe for you to speak out loud, please use the chat option available at thehotline.org. #ypfit #repost @akronurbanleagueyp
・・・
november 25 international day for the elimination of violence against women. 
an estimated 29.1% of african american females are victimized by intimate partner violence in their lifetime (rape, physical assault or stalking)

african american females experience intimate partner violence at a rate 35% higher than that of white females, and about 2.5 times the rate of women of other races. however, they are less likely than white women to use social services, battered women’s programs, or go to the hospital because of domestic violence.

according to the national violence against women survey (nvaws), african american women experience higher rates of intimate partner homicide when compared to their white counterparts.

statistics show that african american women typically comprise about 70% of black congregations. religious convictions and a fear of shame or rejection from the church may contribute to their remaining in an abusive relationships. 1 in 10 men 1 in 3 women #hearmetoo🧡🌎🧡 #sayhername #aishafraser #bethemovement #believeher #believehim @naturbanleague @nulyp  @akronurbanleagueyp #protectwomenofcolor

text_retweet:
one of the reasons why this hit me is because i am very close to people that experience this on a regular. 
they're frail and helpless, they've lost their sense of importance, they look worn out, they're asking for help but scared of what the society would think of any major decision they make. it is my most sincere hope that we would educate the little boys around us (not only the girls) on how to be comely, decent and well behaved. i'd spread the word by reposting this. today, i stan for women 🤚🏽 regran_ed from @ifedurosinmietti -  in honor of international day for the elimination of violence against women, i have put together a slideshow of some of the graphics that tell a story and mean a lot to me!
.
•
one in three women experience violence in their lifetime, across all social status, class, race, country or age group. that’s one too many. for many of them, the #metoo moment hasn’t come yet, because speaking out can have fatal consequences, and survival is a long and complicated journey.
.
•
today we stand at a tipping point. these global social media conversations and survivor- activists’ movements have shown us that when our voices come together, it is possible to challenge the historical power imbalances and affect lasting change. summary from the un...
.
•
today, i stan for women

#stoptheviolence #hearmetoo #mentalhealth #mentaldisorder - #regrann

text:
hush no more!

published on november 14, 2016 youtube channel ualbertados created this piece to break down the stereotype of what sexual assault really is verse what we think it is.

it’s so important that we share our stories and that we hold our attackers accountable! we tend to blame ourselves! we believe no one will believe us.. knowledge + awareness = prevention!

text: il 25 novembre è stata la giornata per l’eliminazione della violenza sulle donne, ma visti i tempi che viviamo un solo giorno non basta.  per ogni foto postata con il numero 25, sorgenia, fino al giorno di natale, donerà 1 euro all’associazione la grande casa. un piccolo gesto che non costa nulla, ma che può aiutare tante donne. grazie.  @sorgeniaofficial #controlaviolenzasulledonne#stupri#femminicidio#maltrattamenti#lesioni#sempre25novembre #metoo

text:
have you ever called a narcissist out on his or her behavior? if so, then you know they won’t tolerate the truth very well at all. brace yourself for one of the coldest, worst and possibly most explosive episodes you've yet to see. 
when i finally figured out the narcissist and told him so (although at the time i did not know what a narcissist was and could not put a name to it) he withdrew. he found a new supply and pursued her and there began the process of a brutal discard, the likes of which i had never experienced.

i had been beaten up twice in my life by two other men at two different times in my life: by my father and later by my not-yet-husband. this discard was worse than either of those two beatings. 
a narcissist discard, after having been brainwashed, is nothing short of hell.

#narcissist #narcissistfree #psychopath #emotionalabuse #healingfromabuse #metoo #nomoreabuse #iamdone #healing #divorce #divoricinganarcissist #doneanddone #breakups #selfesteem #selfdoubt #psychologicalabuse

text:
"ask a man what his greatest fear is about serving jail time, and he will almost inevitably say he fears being raped. what can we deduce from the fact that jail is to men what life is to so many women?"
-
-
from an insult, manipulation, authoritarian treatment to assault, cat calling, femicide, rape... it is all forms of violence. you don't deserve any of this. reach out for help, notice the red flags. don't stay where you are not valued and respected. raise your voice when you don't like something. be whoever you want to be even if society doesn't like it💪🏼✨ - international day for the elimination of violence against women.
-
-
lots of light, love and strength to my fellow survivors♥️
-
-
#feminist #womensrights #feminista #survivor #metoo

text:

come join us on our international screening january 16,2019 at 6:30pm

located at the university of south carolina hush no more will be offering victim advocacy services, public education, public policy, and consulting services ! 
remember knowledge + awareness = prevention!

please share your story with us to help share the necessary knowledge, to bring the necessary awareness, so we can raise our rate of prevention ! 
to share you store of domestic violence or sexual trauma please email alexis.wodn@gmail.com

text: 25 de noviembre. día internacional de la no violencia contra la mujer. un problema global que nos involucra a todos y que tristemente permanece como una de las violaciones más persistentes y graves de derechos humanos, siendo una amenaza a millones de niñas y mujeres, incluyendo violencia física, sexual y psicológica, al igual que abuso económico y explotación. defensoras, activistas , sobrevivientes, y muy recientemente movimientos internacionales como el de “#metoo”, “#timesup”, “#niunamenos”, “#totalshutdown” entre otros, están trabajando en convertir el aislamiento en sororidad mundial, exigiendo responsabilidades a los agresores, impulsando peticiones colectivas de rendición de cuentas y la adopción de medidas, instando a poner fin a la impunidad para garantizar los derechos humanos de todas las mujeres y las niñas. las cifras son alarmantes , una de cada tres mujeres sufre violencia a lo largo de su vida, independientemente de su estatus social, clase, raza, país o edad. son demasiadas mujeres.. vamos a unirnos en una sola voz, tenemos derecho a vivir sin violencia y entre todos es posible . #noviolenciacontralamujer

text:
hoy, domingo 25 de noviembre es el día internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer. gran parte de la erradicación de los problemas es la educación, nos unimos a esta lucha y queremos compartir unos datos provistos por las naciones unidas: 
en todo el mundo, una de cada tres mujeres ha sufrido violencia física o sexual, principalmente por parte de un compañero sentimental.

solo el 52% de las mujeres casadas o que viven en pareja decide libremente sobre las relaciones sexuales, el uso de anticonceptivos y su salud sexual.

casi 750 millones de mujeres y niñas que viven hoy en día se casaron antes de cumplir 18 años, mientras que al menos 200 millones de ellas se han visto sometidas a la mutilación genital femenina.

a nivel mundial en 2012, en uno de cada dos casos de mujeres asesinadas, el autor era su compañero sentimental o un miembro de su familia. en el caso de los hombres, estas circunstancias únicamente se dieron en uno de cada 20 hombres asesinados.

el 71% de las víctimas de la trata en todo el mundo son mujeres y niñas, y 3 de cada 4 de ellas son utilizadas para la explotación sexual.

la violencia contra la mujer es una causa de muerte e incapacidad entre las mujeres en edad reproductiva tan grave como el cáncer y es una causa de mala salud mayor que los accidentes de tránsito y la malaria combinados.

puerto rico es parte de estas estadísticas, nos toca a todos ser parte del cambio. ¡ni una menos!

text:
<<un uomo che ci picchia è uno stronzo. sempre. e dobbiamo capirlo subito. al primo schiaffo. perché tanto arriverà anche il secondo, e poi un terzo e un quarto. l’amore rende felici e riempie il cuore, non rompe costole e non lascia lividi sulla faccia. pensiamo mica di avere sette vite come i gatti? no. ne abbiamo una sola. non buttiamola via>>
con questa citazione di @lucianinalittizzetto voglio anche io dire basta alla violenza sulle donne perche tutte le donne si meritano un uomo che le ami e le protegga, e nessuno si merita un uomo violento.
. .
.

text:
non mi vesto di rosso, ma indosso un dettaglio. io che i segni della violenza li porto addosso non ho bisogno di una giornata, ma di rispetto ogni giorno, tutti i giorni.
. 
#25novembregiornatamondialecontrolaviolenzasulledonne❌🚫 #25novembre #metoo #violenzasulledonne #quellavoltache #25novembregiornatanondialecontrolaviolenzasulledonne  #nonènormalechesianormale #
.
ho avuto una relazione con un uomo violento. mi ha usato violenza psicologica e fisica. ho vissuto anni in una spirale fatta di paura, segretezza, io lo cambierò, mi ama, è colpa mia, non merito altro, ferite e lacrime.
.
quando ne sono uscita, chiedendo aiuto e lottando mentre sentivo la corrente che mi trascinava via, mi sono chiesta come sia stato possibile fosse successo proprio a me. mi reputo una donna intelligente, di cultura, con una famiglia solida alle spalle, eppure non avevo abbastanza stima di me, mi vergognavo a chiedere aiuto.
.
chi ci usa violenza non ci ama. al primo segnale chiediamo aiuto e se non ci credono chiediamolo ancora. salviamoci la vita. facciamolo noi.
.
il sorriso che sfoggio oggi, me lo sono sudato, guadagnato, per ogni sbaffo di rossetto.

text:
“she wears strength and darkness equally well, the girl has always been half goddess, half hell” 🌹 nikita gill
⁣⁣⁣
on this year’s international day for the elimination of violence against women, i am contributing with my words to end the culture of silencing survivors. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
did you encounter any abusive situation at home, street or workplace? write, speak, show. look for help with a psychologist, friends and responsible authorities. the important is that you start  somewhere to break the silence. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
i believe you. we’re together.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
do you know of any situation of physical or verbal violence? don’t stay quiet. report. nobody deserves to be a victim of subjugation and violence. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
what do you think about these awareness campaigns? ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
read more about what can you do for women’s rights on my latest article. (link in bio) ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
#hearmetoo #un #orangetheworld ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
🇵🇹 hoje é dia internacional de eliminação de violência contra as mulheres. hoje eu estou a contribuir com as minhas palavras para eliminar a cultura de silenciar as vítimas de violência. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
deparaste-te com alguma situação abusadora em ambiente doméstico, na rua ou no trabalho? escreve, fala, mostra. procura ajuda com um psicólogo, amigos e com entidades responsáveis. importante é começares por algum lado a quebrar o silêncio.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
eu acreditamos em ti, estamos juntas nisto. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
sabes de alguma situação de violência doméstica? quer seja verbal ou física. não fiques calada. denuncia. ninguém merece ser vitima de subordinação e violência. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
o que pensas destas campanhas de sensibilização?⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
lê mais sobre como podes contribuir para a luta dos direitos das mulheres no meu último artigo. (link na bio)

text:
« the thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. you just take it. » – roseanne barr

don’t wait for men to give you a seat at the table. take it. they will find that weird in the beginning but they will get used to it. let’s not blame everything on gender inequality when sometimes it is just that we are not brave enough. .
.
.

text:
today is the international day to end violence against women, organized by @unwomen - as a survivor of gender-based violence and a descendant of a lineage of women who are *all* survivors of gender based violence, i want to remind all female-assigned-at-birth people that we must stand in solidarity with our transgender sisters, who suffer gender based violence worldwide at even higher rates than we do. in the us, transgender women of color are especially vulnerable to hate violence, sexual violence, intimate partner violence, and murder. 82% of transgender people killed this year have been women of color. .
.
.
#hearmetoo #orangetheworld #transgenderwomenarewomen #endrapeculture #endpatriarchy #endtoxicmasculinity #genderbasedviolence #violenceagainstwomen #believesurvivors #metoo #transwomentoo

today is the international day to end violence against women, organized by  - as a survivor of gender-based violence and a descendant of a lineage of women who are *all* survivors of gender based violence, i want to remind all female-assigned-at-bih people that we must stand in solidarity with our transgender sisters, who suffer gender based violence worldwide at even higher rates than we do. in the us, transgender women of color are especially vulnerable to hate violence, sexual violence, intimate paner violence, and murder. 82% of transgender people killed this year have been women of color. .
.
.

text:
#16days: “most of the men i know in #southafrica believe that to be masculine they have to be traditional and follow their culture. so, as young girls growing up we knew our work was to do chores at home whilst the boys could go out and play soccer, women and girls must babysit the younger ones whilst men could just sit and relax waiting for their dinner. at grassroot soccer, we teach young people that no one has a certain job to do. girls and boys and men and women are all equal, we can all contribute to household work, and we can all play soccer! we can do things together as a nation to change the harmful gender expectations that exist in our communities." - @asa_rabalao16, @grassrootsoccer #skillzgirl coach
.
#16days #365days #hearmetoo #metoo #orangetheworld #endgbv #endvawg #girlscan

-

text:
in recent years, the voices of survivors and activists, through campaigns such as #metoo, #timesup, #niunamenos, #notonemore, #balancetonporc and others, have reached a crescendo that cannot be silenced any more. advocates understand that while the names and contexts may differ across geographic locations, women and girls everywhere are experiencing extensive abuse and their stories need to be brought to light.

this is why the unite campaign’s global advocacy theme this year is: orange the world: #hearmetoo

under the theme orange the world: #hearmetoo, the unite partners are encouraged to host events with local, national, regional and global women’s movements, survivor advocates and women human rights defenders and create opportunities for dialogue between activists, policy-makers and the public. as in previous years, the colour orange will be a key theme unifying all activities, with buildings and landmarks lit and decorated in orange to bring global attention to the initiative. from 25 november to 10 december, for the 16 days of activism campaign, unite calls for action to orange the world and mobilize resources to end and prevent violence against women.
- (source: un women)

text:
today is the international day to end violence against women, organized by @unwomen - as a survivor of gender-based violence and a descendant of a lineage of women who are *all* survivors of gender based violence, i want to remind all female-assigned-at-birth people that we must stand in solidarity with our transgender sisters, and especially young transgender femmes, who suffer gender based violence worldwide at even higher rates than we do. in the us, transgender femmes are especially vulnerable to hate violence, sexual violence, intimate partner violence, and murder. 64% of transgender people killed this year were under the age of 35.
.
.
.
#hearmetoo #orangetheworld #transgenderwomenarewomen #endrapeculture #endpatriarchy #endtoxicmasculinity #genderbasedviolence #violenceagainstwomen #believesurvivors #metoo #transwomentoo
name: Amita Swadhin

text:
orange day! it's 'international day for the elimination of violence against women' so wear something orange as we stand against gender based violence! end violence against women and girls.

approximately 15 million adolescent girls (aged 15 to 19) worldwide have experienced forced sex (forced sexual intercourse or other sexual acts) at some point in their life. 
out of these, 9 million adolescent girls were victimized within the past year. in the vast majority of countries, adolescent girls are most at risk of forced sex by a current/former husband, partner or boyfriend. based on data from 30 countries, only one per cent ever sought professional help- un

text:
there’s a constant continuum of violence against women ranging from just verbal harassment to sexual violation- a rampant reality and as a society we not only ignore it, trivialise it, deny it outright and try to normalise it; but also shame and judge those who try to fight back against it. 
let’s talk about it instead and prosecute it. our future and that of generations of women depends on it.

#orangetheworld #empoweringwomen #womensupportwomen #believesurvivors #metoo #metooindia #internationaldayofviolenceagainstwomen #fightlikeawoman
name: Dr. Mehak Nagpal MD, FECSM

text:
arviolta joka kolmas suomalainen nainen on jossain vaiheessa elämäänsä kohdannut väkivaltaa lähisuhteessaan. #valoaeiväkivaltaa -kampanjan tämän vuoden teema on seksuaalisuutta loukkaava väkivalta parisuhteessa. teema on jatkoa #metoo-keskustelulle korostaen itsemääräämisoikeuden ja suostumuksen periaatteita.

kampanjaan liittyviä post it -lappusia voi löytää kaduilta ja julkisten paikkojen sisätiloista. helsingissä näitä lappuja saattaa nähdä bussin ikkunassa tai kiasman yleisövessassa. mitä jos sinäkin jättäisit oman ajatuksesi näkyville nettiturvakodin osoitteen kera? kenties juuri sinun viestisi tavoittaa jonkun apua tarvitsevan. tehdään yhdessä maailmasta turvallisempi paikka elää. ❤️ #somelähettiläs #naisiinkohdistuvaväkivalta #rikohiljaisuus #lähisuhdeväkivalta #nettiturvakoti

text:
una mia amica che vuole rimanere anonima ha condiviso questo pensiero di vita privata oggi nella giornata contro la violenza sulle donne, voglio condividerlo con tutti voi perché sappiate che spesso questo avviene a chi vi sta vicino e non ha il coraggio di parlare, nella vostra città, nel vostro quartiere, nel vostro palazzo: non restate indifferenti, intervenite quando potete che “me faccio i cazzi mia” oggi uccide qualcuno domani.
e voi donne: denunciate, non abbiate paura, parlatene, unitevi, non siete sole.
•
•
•
•

text: desde 1999 el 25 de noviembre es el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer. la asamblea general de las naciones unidas recogía el testigo iniciado en 1981 por el movimiento feminista latinoamericano. el objetivo es invitar a gobiernos, organizaciones internacionales y organizaciones no gubernamentales a realizar actividades dirigidas a sensibilizar sobre el problema de la violencia contra las mujeres, que es una auténtica lacra y que se manifiesta en diferentes vertientes: maltrato físico o psicológico, violación y abuso, discriminación económica...es necesario un cambio en la educación para la prevención. también es necesario un cambio de la justicia para que el que ejerza la violencia no quede impune. #niunanamenos#metoo#porlasqueyanoestan#porlasquenopuedenhablar#pornosotras
name: Estrella Esteban de Miguel

text:
today is the #internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen.
–
🇰🇿 бүгін әйелдерге қатысты зорлық-зомбылықты жоюдың халықаралық күні.
–
🇷🇺 сегодня #международныйденьборьбызаликвидациюнасилиявотношенииженщин.

на пути присоединения казахстана к ведущим странам мира есть большое препятствие – это насилие против женщин.

казахи очень гордый народ. мы любим гордиться своим родным языком, культурой, историей и суверенным государством. однако часто нашу гордость задевают совсем бессмысленные вещи. почему мы не стыдимся того, что ежедневно женщины подвергаются сексуальному харассменту, т.е. домогательствам? почему мы не препятствуем этому, когда это происходит перед нашими глазами? почему нам не стыдно, что женщин в казахстане каждый день избивают, крадут, насилуют и убивают? почему мы не поддерживаем наших сестёр, когда против них совершаются такие преступления? почему нас не оскорбляет тот факт, что от бытового насилия в казахстане ежегодно погибают около 400-500 женщин?

разрушение семьи, нищета, невежество, экстремизм – корень многих проблем казахстана в плохом отношением общества к женщинам. наша страна никогда не исправится до тех пор, пока мы, как общество, чётко не заявим, что «приставать к женщинам – это преступление», «бить женщин – это преступление», «красть женщин – это преступление», «насиловать женщин – это преступление», «убивать женщин – это преступление».
#orangeurworld #orangetheworld #hearmetoo #endvaw #25november #endviolenceagainstwomen #enddomesticviolence #endgenderbasedviolence #16days #немолчи #немолчиkz #dontkeepsilent #dontkeepsilentkz #нетпримирениюснасильником #нетпримирениюснасильникомkz #нетхарассменту #нетхарассментуkz #сообщапобедимнасилие #янебоюсьсказать #metoo #timesup #heforshe #feminism

stop_filter_tweet: today nternationaldayfoheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen . – 🇰🇿 бүгін әйелдерге қатысты зорлық-зомбылықты жоюдың халықаралық күні . – 🇷🇺 сегодня еждународныйденьборьбызаликвидациюнасилиявотношенииженщин . на пути присоединения казахстана к ведущим странам мира есть большое препятствие – это насилие против женщин . казахи очень гордый народ . мы любим гордиться своим родным языком , культурой , историей и суверенным государством . однако часто нашу гордость задевают совсем бессмысленные вещи . почему мы не стыдимся того , что ежедневно женщины подвергаются сексуальному харассменту , т.е . домогательствам ? почему мы не препятствуем этому , когда это происходит перед нашими глазами ? почему нам не стыдно , что женщин в казахстане каждый день избивают , крадут , насилуют и убивают ? почему мы не поддерживаем наших сестёр , когда против них совершаются такие преступления ? почему нас не оскорбляет тот факт , что от бытового насилия в казахстане ежегодно погибают около 400-500 женщин ? разрушение семьи , нищета , невежество , экстремизм – корень многих проблем казахстана в плохом отношением общества к женщинам . наша страна никогда не исправится до тех пор , пока мы , как общество , чётко не заявим , что « приставать к женщинам – это преступление » , « бить женщин – это преступление » , « красть женщин – это преступление » , « насиловать женщин – это преступление » , « убивать женщин – это преступление » . notkeepsilent notkeepsilentkz eminism – www.zikibay.com – facebook.com/zikibay instagram.com/zikibay youtube.com/zikibay

text:
sending out extra love, hugs, strength, & courage to my fellow warriors today. you are amazing, beautiful, & strong. let's continue to get together to stop the silence and end the violence. #strongertogether 💪
🙅🙅🙅
your abusive partner doesn’t have a problem with his anger; he has a problem with your anger.
"one of the basic human rights he takes away from you is the right to be angry with him. no matter how badly he treats you, he believes that your voice shouldn’t rise and your blood shouldn’t boil. the privilege of rage is reserved for him alone. when your anger does jump out of you—as will happen to any abused woman from time to time—he is likely to try to jam it back down your throat as quickly as he can. then he uses your anger against you to prove what an irrational person you are. abuse can make you feel straitjacketed. you may develop physical or emotional reactions to swallowing your anger, such as depression, nightmares, emotional numbing, or eating and sleeping problems, which your partner may use as an excuse to belittle you further or make you feel crazy."
📖📚
why does he do that?: inside the minds of angry and controlling men #lundybancroft
📖📚
if you or someone you know is suffering from domestic violence, call the national domestic violence hotline at 📲1−800−799−7233 or tty 📲1−800−787−3224. 💜

text:
today starts the 16 days of activism to say no to violence against women and girls.
more than a third of women worldwide have experienced either physical or sexual violence at some point in their lives. furthermore, research indicates that the cost of violence against women could amount annually to around 2 percent of global gross domestic product (gdp). this is equivalent to 1.5 trillion dollars
#hearmetoo is a call to listen to and believe survivors, to end the culture of silencing and to put the survivors at the centre of the response.
it is noted that reducing and preventing violence against women is transformational: it improves the heath of women and children, reduces risks of acquiring hiv and sexually transmitted infections (stis), improves economic productivity and educational attainment, and reduces the risks of mental illness and substance abuse, among other benefits.
“to commemorate this year’s international day for the elimination of violence against women and girls on 25 november, the secretary-general’s unite campaign is calling upon us to stand in solidarity with survivors and survivor advocates and women’s human rights defenders who are working to prevent and end violence against women and girls. our duty is not only to stand in solidarity with them but also to intensify our efforts to find solutions and measures to stop this preventable global scourge with a detrimental impact on women’s and girls’ lives and health.
@unicef @unfpa @unwomen @unvolunteers @unitednations @undp #thinkmahogany #thinkmahoganycsr 
#hearmetoo #orangetheworld 
#violenceagainstwomen #violenceagainstgirls #unitecampaign #womenshumanrights #metoo 
#internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomenandgirls #novemberforprosperity
name: Mahogany Events By Debra-Jane
tweet_full:
today starts the 16 days of activism to say no to violence against women and girls.
more than a third of women worldwide have experienced either physical or sexual violence at some point in their lives. furthermore, research indicates that the cost of violence against women could amount annually to around 2 percent of global gross domestic product (gdp). this is equivalent to 1.5 trillion dollars
#hearmetoo is a call to listen to and believe survivors, to end the culture of silencing and to put the survivors at the centre of the response.
it is noted that reducing and preventing violence against women is transformational: it improves the heath of women and children, reduces risks of acquiring hiv and sexually transmitted infections (stis), improves economic productivity and educational attainment, and reduces the risks of mental illness and substance abuse, among other benefits.
“to commemorate this year’s international day for the elimination of violence against women and girls on 25 november, the secretary-general’s unite campaign is calling upon us to stand in solidarity with survivors and survivor advocates and women’s human rights defenders who are working to prevent and end violence against women and girls. our duty is not only to stand in solidarity with them but also to intensify our efforts to find solutions and measures to stop this preventable global scourge with a detrimental impact on women’s and girls’ lives and health.
@unicef @unfpa @unwomen @unvolunteers @unitednations @undp #thinkmahogany #thinkmahoganycsr 
#hearmetoo #orangetheworld 
#violenceagainstwomen #violenceagainstgirls #unitecampaign #womenshumanrights #metoo 
#internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomedgirls #novemberforprosperity

text:
use social media for social good | never lose sight of social good. even as a business. your business can be the biggest voice and lead by example in your community.

we all have a cause and a voice that wants to be heard. although it seems hard to cut through all the 'noise' on social media lately, it's important that we come together as one great big voice to stand for what we believe in as a society. some notable campaigns that brought communities together during a time where we all needed a little more support: #torontostrong #imwithhher #metoo #bellletstalk #marchforourlives #loveislove ..the list could go on.

another perspective is how the toronto police use social media to help keep the streets of toronto safe and connect with the community online: “most people don’t have day to day connections to the police. we use social media to remind the community that we’re people too.” - @tpschrisboddy
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
essentially, help spread love in this world using technology that we didn’t have a long time ago rather than hate.✌🏻 🌎⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
@pinchsocial x @smwitoronto x @thathannahalper x @tpschrisboddy x @beequammie x @chris_glover_

#socialmedia #socialactivism #smwto #socialmedia #socialmediaweek #toronto

text:
healing tip: this quote i used as a screen saver on my phone as a subliminal reminder early in my healing path after i left my abuser. by doing so, it helped with rerouting my brain structure creating new neuropathways in my traumatic brain. .
.
try it. give it time to work. i did this for at least 2yrs. it's "like" advertising on the brain concept.
.
with love and appreciation, 
laura 
@laura_healing_with_spirit .
.
.
.
.
.

text:
nos educaron para aguantar.
nos convencían de que éramos el sexo débil.
nos enseñaban a consentir, aunque ello fuera en contra de nuestra dignidad.
nos exigían ocultar.
nos obligaban a callar, porque nuestra voz no era importante.
nos llaman putas por vestir, por amar o por dejar de hacerlo.
nos criticaban si decidíamos abortar, separarnos o estudiar.
nos gritan, insultan y pegan sino somos sumisas.
nos castigan matando a nuestros hijos porque saben que es el mayor daño que pueden hacernos.
nos amenazan con suicidarse si no hacemos, vestímos o nos comportamos como nos piden... nos han limitado, cuestionado, insultado, controlado, agredido, infravalorado, repudiado, ninguneado y asesinado, solo por ser mujeres. y lo siguen haciendo.

pero seguimos en pié, ahora más que nunca. seguimos luchando, visibilizando, concienciando, saliendo de la sombra y no callando. 
la lucha sigue y seguirá mientras quede una sola de nosotras sufriendo maltrato, físico y/o psicológico. juntas somos más fuertes y si tú, hombre, te unes, lograremos vencer al patriarcado y derrotar al machismo. ¡vivas nos queremos y nos exigimos libres! 💪♀️
.
.
#diainternacionalcontralaviolenciadegenero #cosasdemj #niunamenos #stopmachismo #machismomata #noalaviolenciacontralamujer #25n #nohayagresionpequeña #feminismo #soyfeminista #feminist #feminism #machismonão #metoo #violenciamachista #mujer #womanpower #wearestrongertogether #diacontralaviolenciadegenero

text:
non serve a niente una giornata di sensibilizzazione. ♦️ a niente.
si legge di tutto, ovunque. una battaglia di frasi a effetto a cui fino a ieri nessuno pensava, e che da domani saranno di nuovo dimenticate. 
perché il contrasto alla violenza non ha bisogno di questo. 
il contrasto alla violenza richiede un lavorio continuo, costante, incessante: l'esempio, gli insegnamenti, le letture, le regole, ogni santo giorno, esercitato sui figli di ogni età. 
il contrasto alla violenza fallisce quando difendiamo nostro figlio a spada tratta da ogni accusa prima di chiederci se sia davvero infondata.
fallisce ogni volta in cui sfiduciamo il lavoro di un'insegnante, o di altro tipo di educatore, o quando critichiamo i suoi compagni; insomma.. quando facciamo sentire lui e solo lui al di sopra di tutto.
fallisce quando non sappiamo trasmettere ai nostri ragazzi l'importanza di certi valori, delle autorità, del rispetto incondizionato verso il prossimo. sì, il rispetto. incondizionato.
fallisce quando gli permettiamo tutto e sempre, privandolo del sano no, dell'esercizio alla accettazione della sconfitta e del diniego. 
la violenza che cresce testimonia unicamente che l'asse 'culturale' si sta spostando, e a spostarlo siamo solo noi, nella nostra incapacità di metterci in discussione come educatori, rischiando seriamente di tirar su uomini che domani non avranno rispetto per l'altro e che, anziché accettare un rifiuto, preferiranno cancellare l'ombra della donna che glielo avrà opposto.
non servono i post di cui state inondando le bacheche, né immagini forti, che faranno effetto solo a chi è già sensibile al problema, ma non a tutti gli altri. 
tutto questo serve unicamente a mettere a posto la coscienza e a dirvi "ho contributo alla causa". invece, lasciatevelo dire, se non farete anche tutto il resto non avrete contributo proprio a niente.
oggi abbiamo dei ragazzi, uomo o donna che siano. domani potrebbero essere vittima e carnefice. chiediamoci subito cosa potremmo fare per evitarlo. chiediamocelo davvero. e facciamolo.

stop_filter_tweet: non serve niente una giornata di sensibilizzazione . ♦️ niente . si legge di tutto , ovunque . una battaglia di frasi effetto cui fino ieri nessuno pensava , e che da domani saranno di nuovo dimenticate . perché il contrasto alla violenza non ha bisogno di questo . il contrasto alla violenza richiede un lavorio continuo , costante , incessante : l'esempio , gli insegnamenti , le letture , le regole , ogni santo giorno , esercitato sui figli di ogni età . il contrasto alla violenza fallisce quando difendiamo nostro figlio spada tratta da ogni accusa prima di chiederci se sia davvero infondata . fallisce ogni volta cui sfiduciamo il lavoro di un'insegte , di altro tipo di educatore , quando critichiamo suoi compagni ; insomma.. quando facciamo sentire lui e solo lui al di sopra di tutto . fallisce quando non sappiamo trasmettere ai nostri ragazzi l'impoanza di cei valori , delle autorità , del rispetto incondizionato verso il prossimo . sì , il rispetto . incondizionato . fallisce quando gli permettiamo tutto e sempre , privandolo del sano , dell'esercizio alla accettazione della sconfitta e del diniego . la violenza che cresce testimonia unicamente che l'asse 'culturale ' si sta spostando , e spostarlo siamo solo noi , nella nostra incapacità di metterci discussione come educatori , rischiando seriamente di tirar su uomini che domani non avranno rispetto per l'altro e che , anziché accettare un rifiuto , preferiranno cancellare l'ombra della donna che glielo avrà opposto . non servono post di cui state inondando le bacheche , né immagini foi , che faranno effetto solo chi è già sensibile al problema , non tutti gli altri . tutto questo serve unicamente mettere posto la coscienza e dirvi `` ho contributo alla causa '' . invece , lasciatevelo dire , se non farete anche tutto il resto non avrete contributo proprio niente . oggi abbiamo dei ragazzi , uomo donna che siano . domani potrebbero essere vittima e carnefice . chiediamoci subito cosa potremmo fare per evitarlo . chiediamocelo davvero . e facciamolo .

text:
ljusmanifestation för avskaffandet av mäns våld mot kvinnor. 
idag fick jag lära mig att det bara i sverige dödas 17 kvinnor varje år av män de är eller har varit i nära relation med. det är inte ovanligt med psykiskt och/eller fysiskt våld i nära relationer. förövaren kan vara din granne, din lärare, din pappa eller till och med din allra bästa vän. charmören. "han som är så trevlig". våga se igenom falska fasader, våga fråga, våga säga ifrån när du ser att någon behandlar någon illa och tro på offret när hen väl vågar berätta. 
mäns fysiska våld börjar nästintill alltid med en kortare eller längre period av psykiskt nedbrytande för att normalisera hans oacceptabla beteende och för att uppnå den kontroll han vill ha över kvinnan. 
rekommenderar alla ickemän att läsa och gå igenom informationen på hemsidan jag länkar nedan. den har hjälpt mig mycket. känner du igen dig? kontakta en tjej/kvinnojour nära dig (obs! de på bilderna gäller för linköping), finns länk till listor över jourer över hela landet. eller skicka ett pm till mig om du vill/behöver prata. jag har varit där. jag bröt mig loss och jag kommer aldrig låta någon man någonsin bryta ner mig igen.

http://www.varningstecken.n.nu/

#kvinna #mänsvåldmotkvinnor #pussypower #kvinnojourenellinor
#tjejjourenbeata #metoo #linköping #feminism

text: di hari pertama dimulainya 16 hari anti kekerasan terhadap perempuan, saya memakai celana ini saat sedang liburan. saat sedang makan siang partner saya berkata, "nih ya ada laki, gue tunjuk aja karena dia vulgar banget ngeliatin pantat kamu. tuh dia yang pakai baju hitam." bukan cuma lelaki itu, ada beberapa mata yang melakukan hal sama. saya berada dalam konteks liburan di daerah tepi pantai, apakah dengan memakai celana seperti ini berarti saya bebas dilihat dengan pandangan predator? hari ini hingga 10 desember 2018, kita akan melaksanakan #16daysofactivism atau #16haktp. 1 dari 3 perempuan di indonesia pernah mengalami kekerasan. proporsi yang sama juga terjadi pada perempuan di seluruh dunia menurut @unwomen. ada banyak cara berpartisipasi dalam acara ini. belajar tentang ruu pencegahan kekerasan seksual di @indonesiafeminis. isi survey pelecehan seksual di ruang publik dari @hollaback_jkt. buat yang sudah bekerja pernahkah mengalami pelecehan seksual? suarakan pendapatmu tentang topik ini di survey @neverokayproject. bangkit dan lawan pelecehan seksual. bercerita adalah bagian dari resistensi 👊🏾 #hearmetoo #metoo

.

text:
today marks the international day for the elimination of violence against women. .
.
gender-based violence manifests itself physically, sexually and psychologically. alarming statistics provided by @unwomen @unwomenla  that we must fix:
.
.
.
1 in 3 women and girls experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime, most frequently by an intimate partner
.
only 52% of women married or in a union freely make their own decisions about sexual relations, contraceptive use and health care
.
worldwide, almost 750 million women and girls alive today were married before their 18th birthday; while 200 million women and girls have undergone female genital mutilation (fgm)
.
.
1 in 2 women killed worldwide were killed by their partners or family in 2012; while only 1 out of 20 men were killed under similar circumstances
.
.
71% of all human trafficking victims worldwide are women and girls, and 3 out of 4 of these women and girls are sexually exploited.
.
.
#hearmetoo #believesurvivors #orangetheworld #metoo #timesup #balancetonporc #niunamenos #metooindia #hollaback! #endviolence #violenceagainstwomen #stoptheviolence #domesticviolence #globalhealth #intimatepartnerviolence #genderbasedviolence #endtheviolence #stopviolence #globalcitizen #changetheworld #metoomovement #humanrights #humanrightscampaign #internationalwomensday #internationaldayofthegirl #humantrafficking #childmarriage #femalegenitalmutilation #violenceagaisntwomen #violenceagainstchildren

text:
gracias @mulierpanama por compartir 🙌🏻 #silepegasaunanospegasatodas ・・・
la violencia contra mujeres y niñas es una de las violaciones de los derechos humanos más extendidas, persistentes y devastadoras del mundo actual sobre las que apenas se informa debido a la impunidad de la cual disfrutan los perpetradores, y el silencio, la estigmatización y la vergüenza que sufren las víctimas.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer o día internacional de la no violencia contra la mujer se conmemora anualmente el 25 de noviembre para denunciar la violencia que se ejerce sobre las mujeres en todo el mundo y reclamar políticas en todos los países para su erradicación.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
en 1981, se celebró en bogotá, colombia, el primer encuentro feminista latinoamericano y del caribe, donde se decidió marcar el 25 de noviembre como el día internacional de no violencia contra las mujeres, en memoria de las hermanas mirabal.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
las hermanas mirabal, también conocidas como las mirabal o mariposas (patria, minerva y maría teresa mirabal), fueron tres hermanas dominicanas que se opusieron fervientemente a la dictadura de rafael leónidas trujillo. 
las tres fueron asesinadas el 25 de noviembre de 1960.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
en 1993, la asamblea general de @unitednations aprobó la declaración sobre la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer, en la que definió el término violencia contra la mujer como sigue:
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
“todo acto de violencia basado en el género que tiene como resultado posible o real un daño físico, sexual o psicológico, incluidas las amenazas, la coerción o la prohibición arbitraria de la libertad, ya sea que ocurra en la vida pública o en la vida privada”.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

text:
part 2

i dance to let go of my pain.
i dance to express what
my mouth don't say sometimes.
i dance because it frees my soul
in ways that only music have the power to do.
i dance because it cures all my wounds
and it makes me feel alive!
and i just love to dance❤️
/eu danço para deixar de lado a minha dor.
eu danço para expressar o que
minha boca não diz às vezes.
 eu danço porque liberta minha alma
de maneiras que apenas a música
tem o poder de fazer.
eu danço porque cura todas as minhas feridas
e isso me faz sentir vivo!
e eu amo dançar.❤️
astral ''till it happens to you'' by @ladygaga
this nusic is so powerful,but it tells not a beautiful history,it shows the reality of many that didn't choose what happened with them,but yet have to live with that pain,that wound in their soul,menories that will never go away,and the ignorance of people that don't know what they talking about,and some times blame the victims for the cruelty they lived and think that is easy to tell them that'' it happened so long ago,u should just let go,forget it...''
let's have more love and compassion for one another because love is thegreatest thing we can give each other!

#tillithappenstoyou#metoo#metoomovement#victim#ladygaga#pain#contemporarydance#art#poetry#poet#dancer#caboverdiana#caboverdiana🇨🇻#caboverde🇨🇻#artistas#achievement#重庆#艺术#comtemporarydancer#dancacontemporanea#dancacomtemporanea#danceismylife#danceislove#danceisliving#dancemypainaway#freedom

i dance to express what
my mouth do not say sometimes.
i dance because it frees my soul
in ways that only music have the power to do.
i dance because it cures all my wounds
and it makes me feel alive!
and i just love to dance❤️
/eu danço para deixar de lado a minha dor.
eu danço para expressar o que
minha boca não diz às vezes.
 eu danço porque libea minha alma
de maneiras que apenas a música
tem o poder de fazer.
eu danço porque cura todas as minhas feridas
e isso me faz sentir vivo!
e eu amo dançar.❤️
astral ''till it happens to you'' by adygaga
this nusic is so powerful,but it tells not a beautiful history,it shows the reality of many that didn't choose what happened with them,but yet have to live with that pain,that wound in their soul,menories that will never go away,and the ignorance of people that do not know what they talking about,and some times blame the victims for the cruelty they lived and think that is easy to tell them that'' it happened so long ago,u should just let go,forget it...''
let's have more love and compassion for one another because love is thegreatest thing we can give each other!

text:
hoy, "día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer", te animamos a firmar la petición que ha iniciado la defensoría del pueblo, dirigida a la presidencia del consejo de ministros, pidiendo que el 2019 sea el “año por la igualdad y no violencia contra niñas y mujeres”.
en el perú las cifras del 2018 están siendo devastadoras y en the office centro de negocios y women doing business by the office, condenamos todos y cada uno de estos delitos.

text:
stop alla violenza sulle donne

giornata internazionale contro la violenza sulle donne "borgo flora, 5 novembre 1981 
devi sapere che nel primo anno di matrimonio la delusione è stata cocente sul fatto che un marito può anche non essere capace di essere amico della moglie, quindi quanto spesso sono stata sola in casa mi sentivo scoppiare dalla solitudine e prendevo penna e quaderno per scrivere la mia tristezza, ma dopo alcuni anni l'ho rivisto e l'ho bruciato perché era incomprensibile pensa che erano 10 anni che non scrivevo più se vedessi la mia pagella della quinta elementare ti spaventeresti. 
ora però stando vicino ai mie figli per aiutarli a scuola, e leggendo spesso perché mi piace la storia e l'informazione, geografia e scienze anche un pò i romanzi e la politica, sò di essere all'alteza della mia misera cultura e poi ho deciso di accettarmi come sono compresa l'ignoranza quindi hò messo nella facciata la mia foto con tutti i miei dati per sconfiggere ogni tentazione di bruciarti, perché mi guarderò e capirò che tu quaderno sei la vera luisa nel bene e nel male e rinnegarti sarebbe un suicidio."
luisa t.

foto di luigi burroni •
•

text:
durante demasiado tiempo, la impunidad, el silencio, la estigmatización y la vergüenza han hecho que esta violación de los derechos humanos se convierta en una pandemia arraigada en todo el mundo. sin embargo, en los últimos años, la fuerza del cambio ha cobrado una mayor visibilidad gracias, sobre todo, a la determinación y la valentía de activistas de base y movimientos en defensa de las sobrevivientes, como #metoo, #timesup, #niunamenos, #notonemore o #balancetonporc. 
estos movimientos de defensa entienden que, a pesar de que los nombres y los contextos pueden diferir en función de las circunstancias geográficas, económicas o sociales, subyace una realidad común. hay que sacar a la luz las vivencias de las mujeres sometidas a todo tipo de maltratos y violencia. por ese motivo, el lema mundial del día internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer de este año es: pinta el mundo de naranja: #escúchametambién

#bancamérica #díainternacional #mujer

text:
quando sferriamo un pugno possiamo fare finta che il dorso della mano non ci faccia male ma il livido cresce; quando riceviamo un pugno possiamo convincerci che sia colpa nostra ma le lacrime sgorgano lo stesso e non per il dolore ma per la confusione, per il non capire. 
i ragazzi dallo schiaffo facile finiscono nell’oblio e non nell’olimpo.

l’oblio non è di chi subisce: è il destino di chi attacca.

text:
as global mobilizations soar, un women brings survivors of #violence and advocates to centre stage on international day for the elimination of violence against #women and #girls
this year’s un theme, “orange the world: #hearmetoo” will amplify voices, bringing many more actions and solutions forward during “#16daysofactivism against gender-based violence”

global movements such as #metoo, #timesup, #balancetonporc, #niunamenos, #hollaback! and #totalshutdown and corporate walk-outs in recent times have exposed the magnitude of violence against women and girls and how often it is normalized. while research shows that violence against women and girls affects one in three women worldwide and that no country is immune to this pandemic, instead of holding perpetrators accountable, women and girls who experience violence are often blamed and their testimonies systematically put in doubt. "not until the half of our population represented by women and girls can live free of fear, violence and everyday insecurity, can we truly say we live in a fair and equal world" says un secretary-general, antónio guterres. "it is our collective responsibility that the world is a better and safer place for women and girls" says executive director of #unwomen, phumzile mlambo-ngcuka

additional information from #unic at https://bit.ly/2s9440p or caribbeanun.org 
top #hearmetoo stories from #india 🇮🇳, #libya 🇱🇾, democratic republic of #congo and #mexico 🇲🇽 images credit:  #unwomen

text:
tante volte mi sono chiesta se la mia vita sarebbe stata diversa se ci fossi stato anche tu, se la vita degli altri sarebbe andata diversamente, se l'amore avrebbe cambiato il corso degli eventi. ma tu non ci sei mai stato...anzi ci sei stato troppo poco ... e senza di te ... gli anni sono passati ... e gli eventi si sono susseguiti e la vita di tutti è andata avanti in un qualche modo.
in un giorno di pensieri pesanti, in un giorno mai banale, in un giorno rispettato e maltrattato, banalizzato e strumentalizzato, mi ritrovo a pensare che quello che è stato non si può cambiare. 
i segni sono invisibili, ad occhio nudo tutto sembra uguale, il dolore non lo puoi toccare, la verità non la riesci a vedere se non la sai guardare, in apparenza la vita scorre uguale... davanti allo specchio riflessa vedo la bambina che ero ... abbasso lo sguardo ... gli occhi mi fanno male perché davanti ad essi appaio nuda senza segreti ... ... diventai grande in un tempo piccolo ... sono una donna ora ... il resto è custodito nel vaso di pandora... sono cosi come gli eventi mi hanno fatto diventare ... fragile e forte ... timorosa e coraggiosa ... indomita ... e aspetto il giorno ... e saprò aspettarlo finché arriverà ... ti guarderò senza paura ... sarai esanime ... non potrai piu fare del male ... sarà come rinascere per la seconda volta 
#metoo #25novembre #iounafratante #diventaigrandeinuntempopiccolo
#noviolenzasulledonne
#nowomannocry #stopviolenzasulledonne

text:
👄viktig läsning👄
idag är det den internationella dagen mot våld mot kvinnor. dit räknas förutom fysiskt våld även psykiskt våld, ekonomiskt våld och sexuellt våld. dagen instiftades redan på 1990-talet men lever något i skymundan av kanelbullars, chokladbollars, och andra viktiga dagar.
~
våld mot kvinnor illustreras ofta med en blåtira, men de flesta förövare vet att inte lämna synliga märken. fysiskt våld brukar föregås av en längre period av psykiskt våld. under den tiden bryts kvinnans psyke ned så att den dag första slaget kommer är hon oförmögen att bryta upp. som jag brukar säga ”om han hade slagit mig på första dejten hade jag givetvis rest mig upp och gått.”
~
om kvinnan ändå lyckas bryta upp är det vanligt att förövaren börjar tillämpa så kallat eftervåld. genom vårdnadstvister och olika typer av ekonomisk utpressning (t ex ska kanske en bodelning genomföras) försöker förövaren fortsätta att kontrollera kvinnans liv på distans. ofta lyckas han, eftersom många som arbetar inom domstolsväsendet har dålig kännedom om dessa mekanismer.
~
den ideella föreningen vi bryter tystnaden arbetar för att öka kunskapen om detta bland sveriges domstolar och även socialtjänsten. ta gärna en minut eller två och besök @vi_bryter_tystnaden och läs om några av berättelserna från utsatta kvinnor. där finns även berättelser från barn som tvingas att träffa sin mammas (och sin egen) förövare eftersom pappors rätt till sina barn är så stark idag. föreningen är relativt nystartad och till den är även @insamlingsstiftelsenrespira  kopplad, för den som vill stötta arbetet ekonomiskt. har du en historia att berätta? dela den gärna under hashtaggen #vibrytertystnaden ~
för ett år sedan briserade #metoo och tack vare det har vi börjat prata om sexuella trakasserier och det är inte längre lika lätt att komma undan med det. vi har även fått en samtyckeslag som syftar till att män inte ska kunna utnyttja en kvinna som sover, till exempel.
~
nu är det hög tid att även börja prata om mäns våld mot kvinnor och barn och våld i nära relationer. för tillsammans är vi starka 💪👊💥
.
.
.
#barnensomsverigesviker #inteallamän #mansbebisar #feminismenhargåttförlångt

den ideella föreningen vi bryter tystnaden arbetar för att öka kunskapen om detta bland sveriges domstolar och även socialtjänsten. ta gärna en minut eller två och besök @vi_bryter_tystnaden och läs om några av berättelserna från utsatta kvinnor. där finns även berättelser från barn som tvingas att träffa sin mammas (och sin egen) förövare eftersom pappors rätt till sina barn är så stark idag. föreningen är relativt nystartad och till den är även @insamlingsstiftelsenrespira  kopplad, för den som vill stötta arbetet ekonomiskt. har du en historia att berätta? dela den gärna under hashtaggen #vibrytertystnaden ~
för ett år sedan briserade #metoo och tack vare det har vi börjat prata om sexuella trakasserier och det är inte längre lika lätt att komma undan med det. vi har även fått en samtyckeslag som syftar till att män inte ska kunna utnyttja en kvinna som sover, till exempel.
~
nu är det hög tid att även börja prata om mäns våld mot kvinnor och barn och våld i nära relationer. för tillsammans är vi starka 💪👊💥
.
.
.
#barnensomsverigesviker #inteallamän #mansbebisar #feminismenhargåttförlångt

text:
25 de noviembre: día internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.
una de cada tres mujeres sufre violencia a lo largo de su vida, independientemente de su estatus social, clase, raza, país o grupo de edad. son demasiadas mujeres. para muchas de ellas el momento #metoo #niunamenos todavía no ha llegado, ya que el hecho de expresarse puede tener consecuencias fatales, y la supervivencia es un camino largo y complicado.
visibilicemos está lucha pintando el mundo de naranja. .
#laboratorio #ocampos #laboratorioocampos #catamarca #onumujeres #escúchametambién

text:
25 de noviembre: día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.
a diferencia del año pasado, hoy no tengo una historia tan especifica por contar, pero en este año he sido víctima de violencia varías veces y estoy segura que muchas de mis amigas también. me he sentido insegura por ponerme un vestido hasta el punto de no querer usar transporte público, me han pegado en la cola solo por que si, me han dicho “deja de ser tan nena”, y obviamente no faltan los piropos asquerosos por la calle. formas de violencia que están tan normalizadas que cuando he reclamado por ellas solo he recibido respuestas como “ay, ¿te vas a poner brava por eso?” o simplemente, “pues no te vistas así y ya” 
es que realmente me parece desastroso que sigan pasando los años y los días y que muy pocas cosas cambien, que tengamos que tener un día en contra de la violencia de género ¡¿qué?! es que somos humanos también, ¿no se dan cuenta? no debería existir tal cosa, pero sin embargo aquí estamos, en las calles, en las universidades, en los colegios, en los trabajos y en las casas, así sea por este medio exigiendo que esto cambie. 
este semestre realice un proyecto con respecto a esto y viendo los índices de violencia de este país cada vez más vamos en decadencia. no se que mas escribir por qué la solución a esto es tan intangible, es un cambio de chip en la cabeza que nadie lo puede hacer por nadie. 
espero que por este día analice si está siendo violento con alguien de alguna forma, y cambie su comportamiento y si ve algún tipo de violencia o lo sufre, ¡hable! somos muchas las personas que estamos dispuestas a escuchar.
 termino como lo dije hace un año: da miedo ser mujer, pero sin embargo estoy orgullosa de serlo. 
#25n #25noviembrediainternacionalcontralaviolenciadegenero #mujeresvalientes #metoo #metoomovement #yotambien
name: Ａｎａ Ｓｏｆｉａ

text:
today is the international day for the elimination of violence against women.
these causes sound really general when you don’t personalize them. so let me share with you something personal:
i have been the victim of physical and psychological violence within more than one intimate relationship in the past. i take responsibility for putting myself in that situation. many women in the world don’t have a choice. i did. but i wish the people in my environment had helped me understand i deserved more.
it is our duty to empower and support all the women we can reach. i urge all sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, fathers, mothers and friends to join me in this long path towards eliminating violence towards women.
and to those who think we are in a good place, words of the united nations:
“violence against women continues to be an obstacle to achieving equality, development, peace as well as to the fulfillment of women and girls’ human rights. all in all, the promise of the sustainable development goals (sdgs) - to leave no one behind - cannot be fulfilled without putting an end to violence against women and girls.
alarming figures
* 1 in 3 women and girls experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime, most frequently by an intimate partner
* only 52% of women married or in a union freely make their own decisions about sexual relations, contraceptive use and health care
* worldwide, almost 750 million women and girls alive today were married before their 18th birthday; while 200 million women and girls have undergone female genital mutilation (fgm)
* 1 in 2 women killed worldwide were killed by their partners or family in 2012; while only 1 out of 20 men were killed under similar circumstances
* 71% of all human trafficking victims worldwide are women and girls, and 3 out of 4 of these women and girls are sexually exploited
* violence against women is as serious a cause of death and incapacity among women of reproductive age as cancer, and a greater cause of ill health than traffic accidents and malaria combined”
please take action. every little gesture counts. changing the world is in our hands ✊
•

.

text:
fragile, opulenta donna, matrice del paradiso
sei un granello di colpa
anche agli occhi di dio
malgrado le tue sante guerre
per l’emancipazione.
spaccarono la tua bellezza
e rimane uno scheletro d’amore
che però grida ancora vendetta
e soltanto tu riesci
ancora a piangere,
poi ti volgi e vedi ancora i tuoi figli,
poi ti volti e non sai ancora dire
e taci meravigliata
e allora diventi grande come la terra
e innalzi il tuo canto d’amore.
(a tutte le donne, alda merini)

25 novembre. 
giornata contro la violenza sulle donne. “non è normale che sia normale.” #nomore #nomoreviolenceagainstwomen #25novembregiornatamondialecontrolaviolenzasulledonne #nonènormalechesianormale #metoo #hearmetoo #womensupportwomen #courage

text:
today is international day for the elimination of violence against women, #idevaw, which marks the assassination in the dominican republic of the three mirabal sisters as a direct result of their #feminist political #activism.

on this day we call for an end to women’s second class status, men’s impunity, and the system of prostitution that underpins and enables both.

read more: https://www.thevintagenews.com/2017/04/19/the-mirabal-sisters-the-three-butterflies-who-were-killed-because-of-their-activities-against-the-dictatorship-of-rafael-trujillo/

text:
5 years ago it felt like my life had imploded... for the first time in almost 40 years, i said these words out loud: “i’m a survivor of childhood sexual abuse.” with nowhere to turn and feeling desperate for help, i wrote those same words on a facebook post hoping someone would have an answer about how to move forward and heal. 
a few minutes later, i got a private message from someone who i had gone to elementary school with, someone who i’d only recently reconnected with via facebook. in her message she told me: “it’s going to be really difficult for a while, but it will get better. i promise.” she also told me about a place called @thegatehousetoronto where i could get some trauma support. 
i would not be standing here today were it not for the love and support of this incredible woman who reached in and lifted me up. you never know the impact of your words... let’s be there for one another. 
#sexualviolence #rape #survivor #metoo #speakup #timesup #love #support #relentlesslyforward #jpsteam
name: Jean-Paul Bédard
tweet_full:
5 years ago it felt like my life had imploded... for the first time in almost 40 years, i said these words out loud: “i’m a survivor of childhood sexual abuse.” with nowhere to turn and feeling desperate for help, i wrote those same words on a facebook post hoping someone would have an answer about how to move forward and heal. 
a few minutes later, i got a private message from someone who i had gone to elementary school with, someone who i’d only recently reconnected with via facebook. in her message she told me: “it’s going to be really difficult for a while, but it will get better. i promise.” she also told me about a place called @thegatehousetoronto where i could get some trauma support. 
i would not be standing here today were it not for the love and support of this incredible woman who reached in and lifted me up. you never know the impact of your words... let’s be there for one another. 
#sexualviolence #rape #survivor #metoo #speakup #timesup #love #support #relentlesslyforward #jpsteam

text_retweet:
volevo che smettesse all’inizio, 
speravo capisse, 
cambiasse...
dopo degli anni immaginavo solo di essere altrove, 
al sicuro, lontano da lui e da quella casa. 
ero in trappola lì, 
non potevo scappare, 
non avevo più forze, 
non avevo nient’altro ...
-
.
in realtà non sei sola..
.
.
ogni settantadue ore avviene un femminicidio. 
trova il coraggio di chiedere aiuto! 
stop alla violenza sulle donne ! 
#nonunadimeno #stopallaviolenzasulledonne #stopviolenza #donne #forza #nonseisola #giornatadellaviolenzasulledonne 
#trovailcoraggiodidenunciare
#nonenormalechesianormale 
repost from @freeda #metoo

text:
igtv: what are the three most important steps to take when a child reports abuse or neglect to you?
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
wynona’s house family advocate nance jean discusses how you should handle this situation.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
your response can have a profound impact on that child’s future. watch on our igtv channel. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
***if you or someone you know is the victim of abuse, assault or domestic violence, you can get help.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

text:
“to commemorate this year’s international day for the elimination of violence against women and girls on 25 november, the secretary-general’s unite campaign is calling upon us to stand in solidarity with survivors and survivor advocates and women’s human rights defenders who are working to prevent and end violence against women and girls. our duty is not only to stand in solidarity with them but also to intensify our efforts to find solutions and measures to stop this preventable global scourge with a detrimental impact on women’s and girls’ lives and health. - #hearmetoo #orangetheworld

text:
recently, 4 tanzanian women and 2 nigerian men locked themselves up when a hostile mob following some rumours about them practicing 'cannibalism' and 'kidnapping children' gathered outside their house in hari nagar, dwarka. 
the women are really scared. their families are  trying to convince them to stay but they reportedly don't want to continue living in india. 
we complain of intolerance when we're abroad but what are we doing? we preach of being a very inclusive nation but is it true? are we practicing what we preach?

ikhtiyaar
#womanhoodbeyondclothes
#changingmindsets

#imwithher #everydaysexism #heforshe #fem2 #whyistayed #yesallwomen #tothegirls #allmencan #effyourbeautystandards #timesup #metoo #whyileft #equality4all  #tbt❤️ #photooftheday📷  #bestofthedays #smile😊 #girlspower #instalovers #igaddicts #instagoods #quoteofthedayy #truefacts

text:
“sometimes men at my work say things like, ‘look at that white skin, why do you look so tempting?’ when i report them, managers tell me that my co-workers are just being friendly. managers don’t understand sexual harassment, they say, ‘don’t take it seriously! they are just kidding with you.’ i have a 3-year-old daughter. based on my experience, i can't predict what's going to happen to her. even when she is an adult, i’ll still worry about her. it's hard to let her go. there’s no way for me to know if someone might harass her.” — arunny, in cambodia
▫
today, the international day for the elimination of violence against women, we join the global movement for #16days of activism against gender-based violence. more than one-third of the world's countries do not have any laws prohibiting sexual harassment at work – leaving nearly 235 million working women vulnerable in the workplace. yet there is no international legal standard specifically for protecting women at work from these abuses. you can help make workplaces safe for women everywhere - click the link in bio to learn more and sign the petition. #thisisnotworking #16days #hearmetoo #metoo 📷simon duncan-watt/care
name: CARE
tweet_full:
“sometimes men at my work say things like, ‘look at that white skin, why do you look so tempting?’ when i report them, managers tell me that my co-workers are just being friendly. managers don’t understand sexual harassment, they say, ‘don’t take it seriously! they are just kidding with you.’ i have a 3-year-old daughter. based on my experience, i can not predict what's going to happen to her. even when she is an adult, i’ll still worry about her. it is hard to let her go. there’s no way for me to know if someone might harass her.” — arunny, in cambodia
▫
today, the international day for the elimination of violence against women, we join the global movement for #16days of activism against gender-based violence. more than one-third of the world's countries do not have any laws prohibiting sexual harassment at work – leaving nearly 235 million working women vulnerable in the workplace. yet there is no international legal standard specifically for protecting women at work from these abuses. you can help make workplaces safe for women everywhere - click the link in bio to learn more and sign the petition. #thisisnotworking #16days #hearmetoo #metoo 📷simon duncan-watt/care

text:
25 novembre 2018
nelle commemorazioni o nei discorsi ufficiali la frase "non diamo per scontati i nostri diritti" è praticamente di rito.
be, direi che viviamo in un periodo storico esemplificativo di questo concetto. ogni diritto conquistato duramente negli anni passati ci sta scivolando tra le dita. 
e noi donne siamo sempre, sempre svantaggiate e discriminate. 
i nostri diritti vanno difesi e bisogna reagire e combattere ogni giorni per una società e una cultura più equa!
forza donne (e uomini!)
.
.
.
.
.
.

text:
in questa giornata contro la violenza sulle donne, che come sapete mi sta molto a cuore, vi propongo una lista di gesti quotidiani che le donne fanno di cui gli uomini non dovranno preoccuparsi mai, nella speranza che aiuti tutti a capire meglio cosa vuol dire essere una donna, e che meccanismi dobbiamo attuare per proteggerci. tutte. - tenere le chiavi in mano da usare come arma quando camminiamo per strada da sole di notte – a volte anche di giorno
- spegnere le cuffie per cercare di capire se siamo seguite per strada – personalmente a volte faccio l’opposto, metto su l’arena di ennio morricone, o la settima sinfonia di beethoven per entrare in stato di guerra
- chiamare gli amici quando siamo sul taxi/uber per sentirci al sicuro
- mandare messaggi agli amici quando arriviamo a casa per far sapere loro che siamo al sicuro – purtroppo lo dimentico 9 volte su 10, perciò chiedo scusa a tutti i miei amici che non hanno mai ricevuto quel messaggio <3
- sederci vicino ad un’altra donna sui mezzi pubblici per minimizzare di essere attaccate - evitare addirittura di uscire di casa se è troppo presto al mattino/troppo tardi la sera perché non sembra sicuro
- fingere di essere al telefono in moltissimi casi per evitare ogni tipo di molestia
- dare agli uomini nomi e numeri di telefono falsi piuttosto che rischiare di farli arrabbiare per essere stati rifiutati
- indossare un anello sull’anulare sinistro per ridurre le chances di flirt indesirati da parte degli uomini, perché rispettano la “proprietà” di un altro uomo più del diritto di una donna di dire “no”
- stare in silenzio quando veniamo verbalmente molestate, per il terrore che diventerà violento se rispondiamo a tono
- farci il mazzo tanto a lavoro nonostante sappiamo di essere pagate meno degli  uomini nella stessa posizione
- spendere un sacco di soldi in prodotti per le mestruazioni perché sono ancora considerati “beni di lusso” nonostante in italia la popolazione femminile superi quella maschile (52 donne ogni 100 abitanti)
- vivere nella consapevolezza che il tuo governo (dominato da uomini) ha potere di legiferare sul tuo corpo (l’esempio di verona insegna). #nonunadimeno #niunamenos #metoo #womenup

text:
el 25 de noviembre se celebra el día internacional contra la violencia de género, una fecha señalada en nuestros calendarios que nos recuerda lo presente que sigue estando esta lacra en nuestra sociedad.
⠀
sin embargo, debemos tener en cuenta que este tipo de violencia (que no solo se manifiesta de forma física, no lo olvidemos) está latente cada día del año. el 2016 se cerró con un total de 44 mujeres asesinadas por hombres con los que mantenían o habían mantenido una relación sentimental. según datos de la oms, se estima que 1 de cada 3 mujeres a nivel global ha sufrido violencia física o sexual.
⠀
para erradicar la violencia de género es necesario que sociedad e instituciones trabajen desde la base: la educación y la información son fundamentales para las próximas generaciones, así como reconocer la violencia y denunciarla.
⠀
⠀
⠀
#feminism #feminismo #metoo #timesup #ahoraeselmomento #mujer #woman #grlpwr #strongwoman #feminism #feminist #girl #girlpower #famele #grlpwr #future #woman #feminismo #mujer #fuerza #lucha #grita #pezoneslibres #notecalles #matriarcado #matriarchy #hombre #dejar #manifestacion #igualdad #equidad #lucha #reivindicar #25noviembre #contralaviolenciadegénero
name: F E M I N I S T ♀ G I R L

el 25 de noviembre se celebra el día internacional contra la violencia de género, una fecha señalada en nuestros calendarios que nos recuerda lo presente que sigue estando esta lacra en nuestra sociedad.
⠀
sin embargo, debemos tener en cuenta que este tipo de violencia (que no solo se manifiesta de forma física, no lo olvidemos) está latente cada día del año. el 2016 se cerró con un total de 44 mujeres asesinadas por hombres con los que mantenían o habían mantenido una relación sentimental. según datos de la oms, se estima que 1 de cada 3 mujeres a nivel global ha sufrido violencia física o sexual.
⠀
para erradicar la violencia de género es necesario que sociedad e instituciones trabajen desde la base: la educación y la información son fundamentales para las próximas generaciones, así como reconocer la violencia y denunciarla.
⠀
⠀
⠀

text:

text:
we are not alone in our tragedies. as i worked on these pieces for three and a half years, there were so many shards of pain and new memories evolving into joy, i realized the title had changed in my heart from “reflections of a broken child” to
“windows to my soul.”
i am no longer broken; i had released my tortured pain and in the process i found myself. i have had a magnificent life after healing.

i hope others will be able to see, that once you are able to live free of fear, shame and misplaced guilt, your life shifts profoundly and you can embrace your soul wholly. we must all heal each other and thus our world.
.
.
.
. #uniqueart #artist #fineart #sculpture #trauma  #childabuse #mixedmediacollage #spiritualart  #birthingyourself #ptsd #molestation #anger  #peace #innerpeace #emotionalart #healingart  #abuse #narcissism #powerfulart  #amputee #jewishart #lifestory #dorijalazo  #windowstomysoul #believesurvivors #metoo #believechildren #installationart #lovehannahgadsby #speakyourtruth

text:
the only way to heal is by going through it, not around it. i hope to help others heal with "windows to my soul". life can be so magnificent.
.
.
.
.

text:
poesia contro il femminicidio.
- bestie e fiori -
quel rumor del piatto 
deposto sul piano agiato,
come le colazioni di vent’anni or sono.
medesimo colpo alto e cavo,
nel silenzio rassegnato al vile disprezzo.
dimenticare l’acqua fangosa 
a scorrere dal rubinetto,
quando le braccia tanto esili quanto servili, 
al fine olfatto,
sono solo fragili ossi per una bestia ringhiosa.
una cena fredda poiché consumata con lentezza 
ha immensa colpa,
e guadagna del buon vino negli occhi,
il bruciore, la costrizione 
di leccarsi le labbra.
stride la sedia 
trascinata all’indietro,
l’aria si sposta all’impeto e le narici
si fanno calde e dilatate
e la bocca piega al suolo.
non voglio cedere
per riordinare il volto
e riaprire le palpebre
a colui che calcia le gambe.
sto forse morendo
come un animale del circo,
per opera di un essere umano?
morire, 
con addosso il vestito da lui scelto,
fetido di terrore ed acidità.
morire, 
è la prima volta 
o forse la seconda.
imploro che sciolga il nodo soffocante
e nel singhiozzare alla vita di domani,
rivedo ogni porta che è stata creata 
e la benevolenza 
che rende umilmente vivi.
rimembro, nel poco tempo, 
la cena calda,
l’acqua limpida dal rubinetto,
gli infiniti abbracci 
su questo collo,
da quando nacqui fino a questa sera
in questo vestito di fiori.
•
• -g.r.-•mypoem38•
sabato 27 ottobre 2018
