text:
(delhi, india)
“it happened for the first time when i was 12. i lived in patna with my family – my uncle would visit us during summer break. he was 10 years older than me. it started subtly, with ‘harmless’ touches. i was a child – i couldn’t even make sense of it, but i knew it was wrong. 
i decided to confide in my mom. i even wrote her a letter, hoping that things would change. but later, i found that letter in the dustbin. my uncle had gotten rid of it. he began to brainwash me into believing that this was how things were between a girl & a boy – that it was ‘right’. we moved to delhi when i was in 8th grade & he began living with us. he got the chance to move beyond the usual touching. when i would be in bed, he’d cuddle me & touch my private parts. he kept manipulating me – i’d plead for him to stop, but he never did. 
years later, i decided to study at a college that was far away – i finally had a reprieve from the pain. there, i saw couples & realized that the ‘relationship’ i was forced into wasn’t natural. i didn’t know what to do & my mind began to go back to these dreadful memories. soon, my mental health degraded. 
i decided to meet a psychologist & for once, let it all out. she helped me come to terms with the fact that i was sexually abused as a child. she made me realize that it wasn’t my fault & i shouldn’t blame myself. she gave me the courage to face my abuser.
a year ago, i tried to make him understand that what he did was wrong. he’d gotten engaged by then & instead of repenting for his mistakes, he told me that it would all end if we could do it one last time before he got married. i gave up then – there was just no point to it all. 
i told my mom everything recently – i didn’t take any names though, because i knew it would change the family dynamic. but she said that she knew who it was – she noticed me being uncomfortable around him. she thought that she’d failed as a mother. 
my confession broke her, but it released me. a weight was lifted off my chest, and day by day, it’s getting easier to breathe. my grief hasn’t lessened – i don’t know if it ever will. but for now, this much is enough. for now, being able to talk about, is enough.”
name: We, The People

text:
- bannon got it immediately. he believes in the whole andrew breitbart doctrine that politics is downstream from culture, so to change politics you need to change culture. and fashion trends are a useful proxy for that. trump is like a pair of uggs, or crocs, basically. so how do you get from people thinking ‘ugh. totally ugly’ to the moment when everyone is wearing them? that was the inflection point he was looking for.

is what cambridge analytica does akin to bullying? - i think it’s worse than bullying, christopher wylie says. - because people don’t necessarily know it’s being done to them. at least bullying respects the agency of people because they know. so it’s worse, because if you do not respect the agency of people, anything that you’re doing after that point is not conducive to a democracy. and fundamentally, information warfare is not conducive to democracy.

millions of people’s personal information was stolen and used to target them in ways they wouldn’t have seen, and couldn’t have known about, by a mercenary outfit, cambridge analytica, who, wylie says, “would work for anyone”. who would pitch to russian oil companies. would they subvert elections abroad on behalf of foreign governments?

it occurs to me to ask wylie this one night. - yes.

nato or non-nato? - either. i mean they’re mercenaries. they’ll work for pretty much anyone who pays.

it’s an incredible revelation. it also encapsulates all of the problems of outsourcing – at a global scale, with added cyberweapons. and in the middle of it all are the public – our intimate family connections, our “likes”, our crumbs of personal data, all sucked into a swirling black hole that’s expanding and growing and is now owned by a politically motivated billionaire.

carole cadwalladr
the guardian

#media #news #information #business #success #profit #politics #faith #belief #trust #wisdom #trending #blog #brand #design #journalisim #campaign #propaganda #feminism #feminist #pussygrabsback #timesup #metoo #psychologist #psychology #mentalhealth #b52

text: #donttellmehowtodress is now in manila and part of a national campaign #respetonaman to end sexual assault and violence against women. i’m so humbled and proud of have my campaign be a part of this movement to push back against rape culture and victim blaming in both our countries of thailand and the philippines and across the region. the time is now to stand up for our women and girls and let them know that we hear them, we believe them and we stand with them to fight for their rights to be safe from all kinds of violence. join us and pls visit @donttellmehowtodress exhibit on now at power plant mall until dec 1. thank you from the bottom of my heart for joining in this conversation and for your support. #metoo #16days #unite #timesup @donttellmehowtodress @sparkphilippines

text:
- bannon got it immediately. he believes in the whole andrew breitbart doctrine that politics is downstream from culture, so to change politics you need to change culture. and fashion trends are a useful proxy for that. trump is like a pair of uggs, or crocs, basically. so how do you get from people thinking ‘ugh. totally ugly’ to the moment when everyone is wearing them? that was the inflection point he was looking for.

is what cambridge analytica does akin to bullying? - i think it’s worse than bullying, christopher wylie says. - because people don’t necessarily know it’s being done to them. at least bullying respects the agency of people because they know. so it’s worse, because if you do not respect the agency of people, anything that you’re doing after that point is not conducive to a democracy. and fundamentally, information warfare is not conducive to democracy.

millions of people’s personal information was stolen and used to target them in ways they wouldn’t have seen, and couldn’t have known about, by a mercenary outfit, cambridge analytica, who, wylie says, “would work for anyone”. who would pitch to russian oil companies. would they subvert elections abroad on behalf of foreign governments?

it occurs to me to ask wylie this one night. - yes.

nato or non-nato? - either. i mean they’re mercenaries. they’ll work for pretty much anyone who pays.

it’s an incredible revelation. it also encapsulates all of the problems of outsourcing – at a global scale, with added cyberweapons. and in the middle of it all are the public – our intimate family connections, our “likes”, our crumbs of personal data, all sucked into a swirling black hole that’s expanding and growing and is now owned by a politically motivated billionaire.

carole cadwalladr
the guardian

text:
there are so many types of violence... when he says you’re stupid, you should go by a psychologist it’s violence... when every month he says he doesn’t have money for the rent or for the bills and let you pay everything every single month ... that’s violence 
when he says you cannot go to visit your family, meet your best friend, have a cup of coffee with a colleague that’s violence 
when you are not with him and he constantly is texting you saying you have responded too late, you should call him instead of talking to other persons and go back home immediately this is violence 
i’m strong, fierce, free and ambitious again no more cages for me, no more asking for permission for everything 
i am me! 
#stopviolenceagainstwomen #libertà #nomorecagesforme #iamfree
#nonunadimeno #nonènormalechesianormale #metoo #respect #overcontrolisabuse #secolpisconounacolpisconotutte

text: dear followers, please take a moment while i explain why i’ve been absent here lately (the many words in this post are necessary to make myself perfectly clear). in my daily life i’ve been adjusting my course. in short that means that i’m in the process of putting myself and my artistic work ‘in world service’. what does that mean? originally i’m a dutch poet and i write about the emotions of life. with my poems and photographs i tell my life story. at this point i’m writing a book and i’m transforming my photographs into products to sell. my mission is to generate a cash flow with my work. the full proceeds that will come from selling my work will be donated to charities of my choice that are related to my life story. besides donating money i’ll be donating my time and energy as well by being personally involved. what is my life story about and why? as a child i was sexually abused which caused a lot of damage to myself and the people around me. for many years i travelled through the darkness and experienced a lot of negativity. luckily those days are long over now because i’ve been able to find the strength within me and managed to find my way into the light. now the time has come that i’m ready to share my story and start helping those in need. financial self-enrichment that comes from my own misery is not how it’s meant to be, that doesn’t feel right. reaching out to others and making a positive difference in their lives does feel right. and so it will be. so today i change my course here on instagram. what can you expect from me here as of today? i’ll start posting and communicating differently by sharing the journey i’m on. sometimes in english and sometimes in dutch, depending on the post. and don’t worry, my posts will still be uplifting like you’re used to, i just add meaning. of course you can still expect me to share beautiful photos. i hope you stick around but if not, no hard feelings. i wish each and every one of you nothing but the best and wanna thank you for the amazing support you’ve given me so far, much appreciated! ❤️ wishing you a lovely sunday 💫🙏 ps. next posts will definitely be a lot shorter 🙃😅
name: Yvonne | Philanthropist ❤️

text:
la violenza di genere ha tante forme: psicologica, economica, lavorativa, sociale.
.
la violenza fisica è spesso la più visibile, ma le altre forme non sono meno pericolose, soprattutto quando vengono perpetrate da parenti, amici, colleghi di lavoro, dalla società tutta
.
in questo paese, dove a ogni passo avanti ne facciamo due indietro, dove ogni volta che conquistiamo un diritto dobbiamo scendere in piazza per vederlo applicato, dove la parità è sì a portata di mano, ma inafferrabile, come acqua tra le dita, serve un cambiamento profondo, culturale
.
allora entriamo a far parte di questo cambiamento: educhiamo gli uomini e le donne di domani al rispetto, gettiamo ogni giorno un seme di comprensione contro gli stereotipi.
.
non ridiamo delle battute sessiste, non denigriamo le donne per le loro abitudini sessuali, non minimizziamo l'esperienza di chi ha subito una violenza o un sopruso, non voltiamoci dall'altra parte quando una ragazza viene molestata per strada o sui mezzi pubblici. .
e voi uomini, alleati, compagni: praticate l'empatia, l'ascolto e la comprensione, liberatevi da quelli stessi stereotipi che vi vogliono più simili agli animali che a esseri senzienti e dotati di intelletto quali siete
.
solo così, con piccole azioni di resistenza quotidiana, cambieremo questa cultura malata che divide il mondo a metà e fa male a tutti, uomini inclusi.
.
.
.
#25novembre #giornatacontrolaviolenzasulledonne #stopviolenzasulledonne #metoo #kamafrutta #fiere #noallaviolenzasulledonne

text:
امروز ۲۵ نوامبر روز جهانی محو هرگونه خشونت علیه زنان است.
خشونت علیه زنان انواع و اقسام مختلفی دارد. از جمله خشونت خانگی که آن هم شمل خشونت‌های فیزیکی، کلامی، جنسی، عاطفی و ... و تحمیل انواع محرومیت‌ها بر زنان می‌شود.

بسیاری از زنان سال‌ها سکوت می‌کنند و می‌سوزند و می‌سازند.
ولی نخستین گام برای محو خشونت علیه زنان، شکستن سکوت است.

تم سال ۲۰۱۸ این است:  #مرا_هم_بشنو

توقف خشونت علیه زنان و دختران به دغدغه این روزهای بسیاری از ما تبدیل شده است.

بیایید خودمان خانه، شهر، کشور و تمام جهان را نارنجی کنیم و به هرگونه خشونتی با صدای بلند نه بگوییم.

#خشونت_علیه_زنان 
#خشونت_خانگی 
#hearmetoo 
#من_هم 
#metoo
#زنان_برای_زنان 
#نه_به_خشونت_علیه_زنان 
#را_هم_بشنو 
#hearmetoo 
#جهان_خود_را_نارنجی_کنیم ❌حتما ورق بزنید و ویدیو کلیپ دوم و ببینید که مربوط به ‏تحقير زن در ادبيات و محاوره روزانه است.
 از كاربرد اين اصطلاحات و واژه‌هاى جنسيتى خودداری نمائید!

text:
🌷you don’t need a million signs, sometimes you just need to trust the first and strongest one- your intuition.⁣
⁣
🌷how many times have you thought “something is off?” and when it came to the light you were like “i knew it 🤦🏽‍♀️”⁣
⁣
🌷every sign i’ve ever received after ignoring my intuition usually came with a whole lot of pain. trusting yourself and acting accordingly is one of the highest forms of self-love ever. ⁣
⁣

text:
bannon wanted to use the sorts of aggressive messaging tactics usually reserved for geopolitical conflicts to move the us electorate further to the right, wylie said. he had already directed a series of anti-establishment, conservative documentary films and presided over the far-right website breitbart news, but cambridge analytica would mark another step in his overall ambitions to transform the nation.

with financial backing from hedge-fund billionaire robert mercer, bannon co-founded cambridge analytica in 2013 as the us-branch of strategic communication laboratories (scl) group, a british company that advertises how it has conducted "behavioral change" programs in more than 60 countries.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robert mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

text: hoy es el día de la no violencia contra la mujer. se conmemora en esta fecha en recuerdo del asesinato de las hermanas mirabal en la república dominicana el 25 de noviembre de 1960 por órdenes del entonces dictador rafael leónidas trujillo. minerva, maría teresa y patria mirabal se opusieron al régimen dictatorial de trujillo y fueron encarceladas varias veces, violadas y torturadas. finalmente, el 25 de noviembre de 1960 por orden expresa del dictador fueron asesinadas. las hermanas se convirtieron en símbolo internacional de la resistencia de las mujeres contra la violencia. felipe pigna @felipe.pigna #niunamenos #metoo #no #noalaviolencia #noalaviolenciadegenero

text:
a question for my followers: what are you doing to combat violence against women and girls?
•
today is international day for the elimination of violence against women, as declared by the @unitednations. violence against women and girls remains a serious issue, within and beyond us borders. to give you a global perspective, "violence against women is as serious a cause of death and incapacity among women of reproductive age as cancer, and a greater cause of ill health than traffic accidents and malaria combined . . . 1 in 2 women killed worldwide were killed by their partners or family in 2012; while only 1 out of 20 men were killed under similar circumstances . . . 1 in 3 women and girls experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime, most frequently by an intimate partner" (@unitednationshumanrights).
•
oftentimes i think of my experience with intimate partner violence as an isolated, deeply personal issue, but truly, my experience is part of a larger collective of gender-based violence.

text:
join our feminist tour to visit the stunning national archives and learn all about the history of black women's fight against slavery in chile 💪🏽
during the colonial era the population of santiago was up to 25% black slaves, most of them women. at the national archives are stored hundreds of these women's petitions for liberty, where they decried their mistreatment and abuse. thanks to their push, chile was the first country in latin america to ban all forms of slavery in 1823.
we owe these women so much! visit this incredible site to honor them.

#travelchile #feminism #metoo #santiago

text:
hoy es el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia de género.

yo sufrí violencia por muchos años, por parte de alguien muy cercano a mi, en ese momento no se hablaba de la violencia hacia a la mujer, era un tema muy tabú y gran parte de mi familia no lo sabía y seguramente sigue sin saberlo.

la idea no es contar lo que me pasó a mi sino visibilizar que todo lo que nos pasa no es moneda corriente y no es normal que te insulten, que te menosprecien, que te obliguen a tener sexo, que no te dejen ir a trabajar/estudiar, que te celen, que te controlen, que te digan como vestirte y mucho menos no es comun un golpe, no es normal, no es normal el acoso callejero, y tampoco es normal que el estado destine 11$ por víctima de violencia de género, tampoco es normal no tener centros que asistan a la víctima de violencia.
no es normal el escuchar "fue una sola vez, ya me pidió perdón" e incluso yo lo he dicho , no, no es una sola vez es sólo el principio.
no te quedes callada, comunicalo a tu familia, tus amigos, habla de lo que te pasa con quien tengas confianza y alejate de todo lo que te hace mal, denuncia públicamente que no estás sola, somos un montón y cada día nos multiplicamos, confía en nosotras porque si te creemos.
en lo que va del año 2018 hubo 260 femicidios, esto quiere decir que hubo un femicidio cada 30 horas, dejemos de mirar para otro lado y salgamos todas a la calle a gritar por las que no están.
.
.
#niunamenos #metoo #violenciadegenero #violencia #violence #mujeres #25n #25noviembrediainternacionalcontralaviolenciadegenero #buenosaires #argentina #femicidio #femicidios
name: Yazmin Belén
tweet_full:
hoy es el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia de género.

yo sufrí violencia por muchos años, por parte de alguien muy cercano a mi, en ese momento no se hablaba de la violencia hacia a la mujer, era un tema muy tabú y gran parte de mi familia no lo sabía y seguramente sigue sin saberlo.

la idea no es contar lo que me pasó a mi sino visibilizar que todo lo que nos pasa no es moneda corriente y no es normal que te insulten, que te menosprecien, que te obliguen a tener sexo, que no te dejen ir a trabajar/estudiar, que te celen, que te controlen, que te digan como vestirte y mucho menos no es comun un golpe, no es normal, no es normal el acoso callejero, y tampoco es normal que el estado destine 11$ por víctima de violencia de género, tampoco es normal no tener centros que asistan a la víctima de violencia.
no es normal el escuchar "fue una sola vez, ya me pidió perdón" e incluso yo lo he dicho , no, no es una sola vez es sólo el principio.
no te quedes callada, comunicalo a tu familia, tus amigos, habla de lo que te pasa con quien tengas confianza y alejate de todo lo que te hace mal, denuncia públicamente que no estás sola, somos un montón y cada día nos multiplicamos, confía en nosotras porque si te creemos.
en lo que va del año 2018 hubo 260 femicidios, esto quiere decir que hubo un femicidio cada 30 horas, dejemos de mirar para otro lado y salgamos todas a la calle a gritar por las que no están.
.
.
#niunamenos #metoo #violenciadegenero #violencia #violence #mujeres #25n #25noviembrediainternacionalcontralaviolenciadegenero #buenosaires #argentina #femicidio #femicidios

text:
so, this is me, lorraine. i had been holding back in creating my first online course - but the calling is becoming louder and louder...
six years ago, life was great i was working for a swiss investment bank in the heart of the city of london, i had been working in wealth management for over 10 years, wealth management is basically helping the 1%, the rich get richer. nothing wrong with that and i am grateful for my career but i wanted to have a life with more meaning. it was an august afternoon in 2012, life was good and  i was feeling blessed 😇 . i got down on my knees and said a prayer of gratitude straight from my heart and asked god to show me how to do his work. the very same day, i was drugged and ‘taken advantage of’ by a work colleague (#metoo) 😞and it sent my life into disarray. i experienced very dark times with depression, ptsd, anxiety - the works.  during this time, even though i couldn't understand why i went through the incident that i did, i kept my eyes 👀 on god and miraculous things started to happen. from supernatural experiences, to the manifestation of much needed money 💵 within seconds of praying about it, to the prayer 🙏🏽 i said before going to sleep one night that saw me wake up to the stock (from my side hustle) that had been sitting around for 5 years suddenly get bought by an #abc us sitcom to be a part of their set!
i will share with you things that i have learnt from other spiritual leaders, resilience teachers and world leading meditation teachers. 
i know that what i have been through cannot be in vain and i want to share what i can and empower and encourage who i can. •
•
•

i am therefore launching a 6 week live online course. •
•

#rebalanceandrevive: “master the power within,
 to overcome life's obstacles, so you can upgrade your future and thrive in all that you do in 6 weeks’’ •
•
•

as the course is live, spaces will be limited. it will be an environment that encourages peer support, and psychologically as helpful as any therapy. 
please send me a dm if you would like further information •

let’s see if we can rebalance & revive your life too. 🎉🙌🏽💕🙏🏽
name: Rebalance & Revive ™️

text: #respetoparatodas 💚 dia internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer ❤️ 25 de noviembre ❤️ violencia física, psicológica, sexual, económica 😔 35% mujeres y niñas sufren maltrato (oms) 😔 44% de mujeres y niñas sufren maltrato ( inegi) 😔 la violencia contrs las mujeres es la forma mas extrema de discriminación, en los casos mas graves puede provocar la muerte ☠️☠️☠️☠️ #niunamenos #yositecreo #ibeliveyou #todasjuntas #sororidad #feminista #girlpower #womanpower #womanpride #feminist #woman #mujeres #elpatriarcadomedapatriarcadas #metoo #violenciamachista #stopmachismo

i am #grateful to be alive, 
to be 6 feet above ground. 
i am grateful for all the little and large #miracles that happen in my life daily, especially the ones i don’t notice.
i am grateful for my children, family & friends. 
i am grateful god provided yoga for me to find, mobility, flexibility & sanity. 
i am grateful for all my teachers & mentors, who never said to me, that i couldn’t do it or be it, you know who you are! 
i am grateful that i can now connect to the #divine with just a #breath. 
i am grateful for all of you who like and read my posts. 
i am grateful for my pets 🐕🐩🐈🐈🐢 @@@@@@@

text:
today november 25th is the un’s international day for the elimination of violence against women.
“not until the half of our population represented by women and girls can live free from fear, violence and everyday insecurity, can we truly say we live in a fair and equal world." — un secretary-general antónio guterres

many of you may have experienced violence or know of friend who has. the stats are grim:

1 in 3 women and girls experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime, most frequently by an intimate partner

only 52% of women married or in a union freely make their own decisions about sexual relations, contraceptive use and health care

worldwide, almost 750 million women and girls alive today were married before their 18th birthday; while 200 million women and girls have undergone female genital mutilation (fgm)

1 in 2 women killed worldwide were killed by their partners or family in 2012; while only 1 out of 20 men were killed under similar circumstances

71% of all human trafficking victims worldwide are women and girls, and 3 out of 4 of these women and girls are sexually exploited

violence against women is as serious a cause of death and incapacity among women of reproductive age as cancer, and a greater cause of ill health than traffic accidents and malaria combined. 
#orangeurworld, #orangetheworld, #hearmetoo, #endvaw #16daysofactivism #metoo #ahimsa #sayhername #drdorothyhalton #drelenafric #drtamarao’neal
name: Dr Shailla Vaidya, the Yoga MD

71% of all human trafficking victims worldwide are women and girls, and 3 out of 4 of these women and girls are sexually exploited

violence against women is as serious a cause of death and incapacity among women of reproductive age as cancer, and a greater cause of ill health than traffic accidents and malaria combined. 
#orangeurworld, #orangetheworld, #hearmetoo, #endvaw #16daysofactivism #metoo #ahimsa #sayhername #drdorothyhalton #drelenafric #drtamarao’neal
pre_proc_tweet:
today november 25th is the un’s international day for the elimination of violence against women.
“not until the half of our population represented by women and girls can live free from fear, violence and everyday insecurity, can we truly say we live in a fair and equal world." — un secretary-general antónio guterres

many of you may have experienced violence or know of friend who has. the stats are grim:

1 in 3 women and girls experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime, most frequently by an intimate paner

only 52% of women married or in a union freely make their own decisions about sexual relations, contraceptive use and health care

worldwide, almost 750 million women and girls alive today were married before their 18th bihday; while 200 million women and girls have undergone female genital mutilation (fgm)

1 in 2 women killed worldwide were killed by their paners or family in 2012; while only 1 out of 20 men were killed under similar circumstances

71% of all human trafficking victims worldwide are women and girls, and 3 out of 4 of these women and girls are sexually exploited

violence against women is as serious a cause of death and incapacity among women of reproductive age as cancer, and a greater cause of ill health than traffic accidents and malaria combined.

text:
"con la violenza non si ottiene mai nulla!"
è una frase fatta, ma è così.
non si ottiene rispetto, ma paura.
non si ottiene amore, ma odio.
non accontentatevi di così poco. 
le persone, ma soprattutto le donne, vanno lasciate libere. libere di amarci, di rispettarci e di volerci al loro fianco.
ogni giorno.
la violenza, fisica o mentale che sia, non lega e non legherà mai le persone, anzi.
rispettate gli altri, rispettate le donne, ma soprattutto rispettate voi stessi. perché ogni volta che usate la violenza, oltre a fare del male agli altri, distruggete una parte di voi. 
#stopallaviolenzasulledonne
•
•
•

text:
la violenza nei confronti delle donne è una grave violazione dei diritti umani, eppure è tuttora diffusa in tutto il mondo. l'idea che le molestie o le violenze inflitte alle donne siano normali e accettabili è sbagliata e deve cambiare. spetta a tutti noi dire no, respingere apertamente gli atti di violenza o molestia, sostenere le vittime. 
stop alla violenza sulle donne!

text:
today is international day for the elimination of violence against women. we see a lot of talk and many a campaign against violence on women. #intersectionalfeminism is the new in-thing, and somehow, their sections end at a species level. they happily advocate the rape of cows, chickens, dogs and cats as they sip their starbucks coffee and take a bite of their fillet mignon, with their persian cats purring on their laps. you're not an intersectional #feminist if you're not #vegan
.
🐮🐐 a cow produces milk and babies only when impregnated. and see the pictures to see how impregnation is done. if that isn't rape, what is it? all the male calves that can't produce milk? beef. same with goats and mutton.
.
🐶🐱 the cute purebred puppy or kitten that you want, comes from the rape of strapped and tied up dogs and cats as you see in two pictures.
.
🐔🐣 your chicken and eggs are also product of rape. how else do you think thousands of chicken at a farm are impregnated?
.
🐏🐃 wool and leather? more animals required means more birthed means more raped.
.
🐷 that fashionable bacon? from pigs who spend their lives in a tiny 4'x2' pens from one impregnation to next, birth to death.
.
today is also #worldvegetarianday. but as you see above, being vegetarian isn't enough. animal farming is the number of contributor to deforestation and global warming. so, #govegan for the animals, for your health and for the planet.
.
#veganism #meatismurder
#milkismurder #dairyisrape #ditchdairy #baconismurder #notyourmothernotyourmilk #cowsmilkisforbabycows #veganishealthy #fortheenvironment #fortheearth #savetheearth #savetheplanet #saveplanetearth #veganfortheplanet #fightglobalwarming #endviolenceagainstwomen #feminism #intersectionalfeminist #metoo #internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen #🌱

text:
„nunca más - nie wieder“! der spruch ist vor allem im zusammenhang mit der aufklärung der argentinischen militärdiktatur seit den 1980ern bekannt. 2015 heißt es: „nunca más un femicidio“ - über 200.000 menschen protestieren auf der plaza de mayo im argentinischen buenos aires gegen die grassierenden frauenmorde: gewalt an frauen ist (nicht nur) in lateinamerika alltäglich. in argentinien wird im schnitt alle 1,5 tage eine frau von einen mann getötet. 
die bewegung „ni una menos“ („nicht eine frau weniger“) macht mit wachsendem erfolg auf das problem aufmerksam – und hat den begriff „femicidio“ („femizid“), in anlehnung an „genozid“ (völkermord), in den sprachgebrauch der menschen eingebracht. auch ein nationaler plan gegen die gewalt an frauen wird derzeit umgesetzt – ein anfang und gutes beispiel zum heutigen welttag zur beseitigung von gewalt gegen frauen.
.
foto: getty images/nicolas aguilera/eyeem
.
#niunamenos #nuncamas #hearmetoo #metoo #grrrlpwr #femaleempowerment #justice #gerechtigkeit #onthisday #argentina #1125 #equality #gleich #latinamerica #frauen #gender

text:
#nonunadimeno ❤️👠💄 “ora che tu l'hai fatta finita
ora che tu m'hai tolto la vita, sarai contento
non dire amore
non sei degno di quella parola
ho lottato per anni da sola
con la tua rabbia

sarò l'ultima voce nel vento
sarò l'ultima e questo è il mio canto 
non mi serve un perché
so che senza di me
avrai tanta paura
nella notte scura
la mia voce nei sogni, ogni ora 
griderà ancora
io cercavo solo le tue carezze
io cercavo solo le tue carezze

sarò l'ultima donna lo sento 
sarò l'ultima donna violata
sarò l'ultima morta ammazzata”

text:
o dia internacional da não-violência contra a mulher foi instituído em 1999 durante a assembleia geral da organização das nações unidas, em homenagem “as mariposas”.
no contexto brasileiro, a cada 11 minutos uma mulher é estuprada, conforme demonstrou o fórum brasileiro de segurança pública. além disso, 43% das mulheres em situação de violência sofrem agressões diariamente; para 35%, a agressão é semanal, conforme dados do centro de atendimento à mulher.
devemos combater diariamente qualquer espécie de discriminação e de desigualdade de gênero! 
para saber mais, acesse: https://goo.gl/ss7xbz

#diadanaoviolencia #nãoviolencia #basta #girlpower #grlpwr #metoo #igualdade #igualdad #empoderamentofeminino #womanpower #sororidade #nenhumaamenos #equal #feminist

text:
el dia 25 de noviembre se celebra, a instancias de la onu, el día internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.

con el lema "pinta el mundo de naranja", el objetivo es visibilizar y combatir las cinco formas de violencia contra la mujer:
.
❌ violencia de pareja ✔️
❌ violencia y acoso sexual ✔️
❌ trata de personas ✔️
❌ mutilacion genital femenina ✔️
❌ matrimonio infantil ✔️
.
más información en onu mujeres: bit.ly/2sa10rc
.
puedes ver historias reales, o incluso compartir la tuya, en este enlace: bit.ly/2dium7h
.
más información sobre la campaña "orange the world" aquí: bit.ly/2p2wrsc.
.
también puedes participar, simplemente compartiendo historias o acciones en tus redes sociales, incluyendo los hashtags #hearmetoo, #escuchametambien, #orangetheworld , #pintaelmundodenaranja
.
imagen: freepik
diseño: @atiempo.rrss
.

text:
every child deserves to be loved.my leg was amputated when i was four. one important thing my dad taught me was that everybody has something, some people’s show on the outside, some people’s are on the inside. .
.
. .
.
.

text:
ojalá acabar con la violencia machista fuera tan fácil como hacer una receta: un poco de educación al profesorado, un puñado de dinero para políticas de género, una cucharada de formación para profesionales de la justicia y fuerzas del orden, voluntad política a discreción, sanciones a empresas discriminatorias, medidas de protección reales para mujeres, coeducación en las escuelas, formación sexo-afectiva...
muchos ingredientes, pensaréis, y todos son vitales, pero el más importante de todos, el que no depende ni de presupuestos ni de la política es nuestra actitud, nuestra voluntad. es ponernos las gafas violetas para no quitárnoslas jamás. si ves injusticias, actúa. si alguien necesita ayuda, actúa. si alguien es machista, no te calles. la gente corriente, desde la base, poquito a poquito, podemos cambiar las cosas. ¡por un mundo libre de violencias contra la mujer!

text:
🇮🇹 buongiorno dal giardino di castello! nella giornata  internazionale contro la violenza sulle donne oggi ricordiamo anche le grandi figure femminili della famiglia medici, alcune delle quali ebbero a che fare con la nostra meravigliosa villa. caterina sforza, maria salviati, eleonora di toledo, maria luisa de medici alcune di esse, che contribuirono con spirito e fine intelligenza alla storia della villa, dei medici e di firenze stessa nel corso dei secoli. 
perché sia sempre la giornata del rispetto di tutti, senza eccezioni.

venite dunque a trovarci e a passare questa domenica speciale al giardino. siamo aperti fino alle 16.00!
---
🇬🇧 today is the international day for the elimination of violence against women! we want to remember the great women of the medici family, who made the history of our villa. caterina sforza, maria salviati, eleonora di toledo, maria luisa de medici, some of them cooperated with spirit and intelligence to the story of the villa, to the story of medici's family and florence itself.
because today is the day of respect for all, without exception.

come to the garden, so you could spend this special sunday with us. we are open until 4pm!
-

text:
today is ❝ international elimination of violence against women day ❞ 
1 in 3 women experience sexual or physical abuse. 
by raising awareness we have the ability to reduce and prevent violence against women. "it improves the heath of women and children, reduces risks of acquiring hiv and sexually transmitted infections, improves economic productivity and educational attainment, and reduces the risks of mental illness and substance abuse, among other benefits." - undp

advocate and protect women's rights. by doing this we are showing tribute to our survivors and the women we've lost ♥️

text: heute ist der tag gegen gewalt an frauen. ich möchte jetzt hier keine großen reden schwingen weil andere profile hier viel mehr guten input zu dem thema in den vergangenen tagen gebracht haben. die wichtigsten habe ich schon in den stories geteilt und werde dazu auch noch ein paar beiträge teilen. jedoch möchte ich mich zu dem thema heute auch zu wort melden. ich kenne viele frauen, die gewalt von männern erfahren haben, meist in beziehungen. und oft wird es tot geschwiegen. ich bin auch betroffen und habe lange nicht darüber geredet, vielleicht weil ich noch im prozess der realisierung bin oder weil ich irgendwo den täter schützen wollte. aber man muss darüber reden, solidarität mit anderen opfern zeigen. ein zeichen setzen dass wir nicht alleine sind ❤💪 ich habe jahre lang psychische gewalt erfahren, ich wurde von grund auf manipuliert und zu einer person umgeformt, die mein partner wollte. ich wurde zu sachen genötigt, die ich nicht wollte, die ich unter tränen erduldet habe. nun drei jahre später hab ich eine posttraumatische belastungsstörung aus dieser beziehung mitgenommen. nun bin ich stärker und selbst bestimmter. aber nicht nur wegen dieser scheisse, niemand sollte so eine erfahrung machen müssen. aber leider haben es viele von uns trotzallem.  ich möchte nur sagen, dass wir darüber reden müssen. laut oder leise. #standup #gegengewaltanfrauen #wearestrong #metoo #youarenotalone

text:
es war einfach wieder mal toll mit meine steffi zusammen zu laufen. 
250 höhenmeter haben wir aufgesammelt, gefühlte 150 auf ein schlag🥵😰restliche verteilt auf die ganze distanz. 
hälfte von meinem heutigen lauf widme ich meine lauffreundin @mynew_kat. sie muss wegen der verletzung momentan pausieren. lass dir zeit bis du wieder ganz fit bist😘, heute bin ich schon mal für uns beide gelaufen 
bleibt fit ✌🏼👱🏻‍♀️🧡
********************************
наконец то с моей штэффи вместе пробежались,  с набором высоты в 250м. по ощущению 150 мы набрали на одном участке за раз, а остальные по всей дистанции насобирали🥵😰. сегодняшние делю на пополам  с @mynew_kat , она должна сейчас восстанавливаться после травмы и я надеюсь, что она до конца восстановится прежде чем вновь рванет. по крайней мере, считай , что сегодня ты уже отбегала 😘
оставайтесь в движении ✌🏼👱🏻‍♀️🧡

text:
ferramentas digitais como whatsapp agravam violência doméstica 
as mulheres vítimas de violência doméstica na frança têm enfrentado uma outra fonte de angústia no cotidiano: a “ciberviolência” de seus companheiros e maridos. são cada vez mais numerosos os homens que espionam o telefone celular de suas parceiras, suas atividades nas redes sociais e seus e-mails a fim de intimidá-las, conforme revela um estudo divulgado nesta terça-feira (20) pelo centro hubertine auclert, uma instituição que se dedica a estudos sobre a igualdade de gênero.
com o fenômeno #metoo, muitas francesas vítimas de violência física, de assédio moral e psicológico de seus cônjuges passaram a compartilhar suas experiências nas redes. mas essa liberação da palavra passou a preocupar muitos agressores, que não querem saber de exposição. para continuar a exercer o controle na relação e manter a mulher sujeita à dominação, muitos homens têm aumentado a pressão com o ciberbullying, informa o msn.
o estudo revelou cinco tipos de ciberviolência doméstica. de um grupo de 212 mulheres ouvidas, 73% disseram que foram vítimas de “cibercontrole”, que é a obrigação do cônjuge abusivo de poder entrar em contato com ela a qualquer momento, ler suas mensagens ou consultar suas ligações telefônicas. sessenta e três por cento disseram ter sofrido “ciberassédio” ou “ciberbullying”, ou seja, receberam mensagens ofensivas e insultantes dos companheiros por sms, whatsapp ou correio eletrônico. vinte e nove por cento das entrevistadas tiveram a impressão de serem monitoradas à distância, geolocalizadas por seu cônjuge, sem o conhecimento delas ou não.
tutela financeira
um quarto das mulheres pesquisadas foram submetidas a uma forma de “ciberviolência econômica”, em que o cônjuge modifica as senhas de contas bancárias ou admin ...
name: Repórter Maceió

text:
sexo sem consentimento não é violação, à partida •
pelo menos é o que indica a legislação da maioria dos países europeus, segundo um relatório da amnistia internacional. este mesmo relatório sugere que 20 dos 28 países da eu têm as leis sobre os crimes sexuais desactualizadas. só o facto de usarmos o termo “desactualizadas” para este tipo de crimes já é, no mínimo, engraçado. é que, portanto, até há pouco tempo pouca gente se tinha lembrado de que era capaz de aleijar muito, tanto fisica como mentalmente, quando se viola alguém e que lá por ser marido, namorado, conhecido ou meio-irmão (recorrente nos intensos enredos da pornografia), um não é não.
se isto é triste? imenso. se espanta? pouco. por mais que uma data de gente se recuse a ver (e por uma data de gente, entenda-se que quase toda esta gente é composto por homens brancos e socialmente favorecidos há seculos e séculos), vivemos ainda numa cultura – pasme-se! – altamente machista que desvaloriza os crimes sexuais e tantas vezes culpabiliza a vítima. ainda há pouco, num voxpop que fiz sobre feminismo, um rapaz estudante do técnico me disse com um ar trocista que “no means yes, and yes means anal”. simpático, não? não é que ele tivesse ar de violador – os violadores têm um ar próprio? provavelmente não, dava jeito se tivessem – mas aceita este tipo de pensamento, bem como “agora os homens são todos logo violadores”. certo. porque como, para aí, 3 ou 4 em cada 100 casos de acusação de violação são falsos, então vivemos tempos de histerismo em relação à violação e estamos a condenar injustamente 2 ou 3 homens porque as mulheres se estão todas agora a aproveitar do #metoo. ah, feminismo, seu diabo opressor dos pobres homens que, coitados, são provocados pela forma como as mulheres se vestem e biologicamente não aguentam tamanha tesão que os deixa surdos e não conseguem ouvir um “não”.
(acaba a crónica aqui nos comentários)
#lugarestranho
📸@mafaldaboavida

text:
sent omsider... september månads utmaning i #bou18 - en bok som adresserar en aktuell samhällsfråga. efter #metoo får man väl säga att den här boken platsar på temat. kolla in hyllan i min lokala bokhandel #arbogabokhandel på bild två så ser ni hur stort det här ämnet blivit. rebelltjejerna har fått sällskap av många fler coola tjejer från historia och nutid. den här boen har samma upplägg som ettan med många kända och okända kvinnor. texterna är ganska korta vilket får mig att googla för att få veta mer. bilderna är jättefina🌟 rekommenderas till tjejer och killar i alla åldrar 😊👍

text:
women across the world took part in marches against sexism and gender-based violence this weekend to mark the un’s international day for the elimination of violence against women on november 25. according to the united nations, more than a third of women worldwide have experienced either physical or sexual violence at some point in their lives. the 2018 theme of the day is “orange the world: #hearmetoo,” as the orange colour symbolises a brighter, violence-free future.
photo: jean-paul pelissier/reuters, madaree tohlala/afp, esteban felix/ap
•
#women #violenceagainstwomen #unwomen #vawg #metoo #noustoutes #orangetheworld

text:
bannon wanted to use the sorts of aggressive messaging tactics usually reserved for geopolitical conflicts to move the us electorate further to the right, wylie said. he had already directed a series of anti-establishment, conservative documentary films and presided over the far-right website breitbart news, but cambridge analytica would mark another step in his overall ambitions to transform the nation.

with financial backing from hedge-fund billionaire robert mercer, bannon co-founded cambridge analytica in 2013 as the us-branch of strategic communication laboratories (scl) group, a british company that advertises how it has conducted "behavioral change" programs in more than 60 countries.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robert mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

text:
warning: long post

the more i watch this, the more pissed i get. this little boy with his suggestive comments and movements has this little girl penned to a wall between buildings with a hype-man hyping him up. now some may say i'm reading too much into this. its just kids being kids. (that's what they said about the cheeto in chief. boys being boys having locker room talk. his level of disrespect towards women didn't just start as an adult. ) 
i then say, imagine this is your little girl that you sent outside to play and you then came across this video on the internet? how would you feel? and the hype-man recording this mess? wtf?! look at her face. does she seem interested? she's a kid. does she look scared? she's a kid. nervous about what's going on? 🗣she's a kid!

you see, these little boys doing this that people think are cute, then turn into grown men doing the same shit. not so cute anymore right? especially if you don't want the attention. 
i remember being a little girl and little slick ass boys trying to do slick shit to me on the playground. from sticking their hands up my skirt (i rarely wear skirts to this day!), to trying to "hunch" me in the lunch line, to one showing me their "vienna sausage" on the bus one time (never rode the school bus after that), to a few of them telling my cousin they were gonna "get me" after school one day (shout out to cousin cedric for being the best snitch ever and telling my mom who then confronted them in the middle of the street. she can be hood!) i gag thinking of my two girls going through some of these things. (i'll let you guys know my inmate number and address so you can write me.) everyone will have their own opinion. but this is mine. teach your sons to respect girls at an early age. teach your girls respect of their bodies at an early age. things that are "cute" now might lead to a case later. your influence on kids is greater when they're younger. not later when there is a glass separating you. 
sidenote: this is not an attack on mike brooks because he's funny as hell. this is my take on what i'm watching. 
#truth #facts #metoo tag @sophiabush because she is my spirit animal and she gets it!
name: Heyyy Mrs.Marshall✊🏾🍑/NC🏡GA💙

por dejar de acostumbrarnos a escuchar un feminicidio tras otro. • contra esta justicia que ni te cree y protege, y que deja impune a tu violador si llevas un tanga. • porque de noche quiero ser libre, no valiente. • porque solo hay un 7% de personajes femeninos en los libros de historia. • porque al año trabajamos 84 días más de media para cobrar el mismo salario que un hombre...

text:
heute ist der internationale tag zur beseitigung von gewalt gegen frauen.

das es heutzutage noch so einen tag geben muss ist unglaublich. wie wir es endlich schaffen, dass irgendwann dieser tag nicht mehr nötig ist, steht in meinen büchern. ein interview auch zum thema könnt ihr bei lokalplus lesen (link unten). „haben sie schon mal daran gedacht, sich aus der öffentlichkeit zurückzuziehen?

bis vor kurzem hatte ich nur verantwortung für mich, jetzt habe ich die auch für meine tochter. da haben mir die drohungen teilweise die kehle zugeschnürt. ich kann mich aber nicht zurücknehmen. gerade als frau sehe ich mich dazu verpflichtet, den weg in eine bessere, gleichgestellte gesellschaft vorzubereiten, in der frauen selbstbestimmt leben können. wenn ich nicht dazu bereit bin, das geringste zu tun, wie kann ich das dann von anderen menschen erwarten?“ https://www.lokalplus.nrw/nachrichten/politik-kreisolpe/jede-erwachsene-frau-muss-sich-wehren-und-klare-grenzen-setzen-29986

#feminism #feminismus #gegengewaltanfrauen #politics #gewaltgegenfrauen #dieverschleiertegefahr #sexismus #writersofinstagram #writerslife #writer #hardworkingmom #hilfetelefongewaltgegenfrauen #schweigenbrechen #metoo #aufschrei

text:
ik zit al een tijdje met dit onderwerp in mijn maag en twijfelde enorm of ik er een foto over zou plaatsen. net daarom doe ik het toch. twijfel of een stukje bil wel oké is op social media vormt onderdeel van het grote probleem. kleding mag nooit een free pass zijn om iemand lastig te vallen. vooral niet als het gaat over lingerie, want dat zie je in eerste instantie niet eens. ik vraag er niet om om verkracht te worden. niet als van boven tot onder ingepakt ben, en niet als ik eens wat minder draag. nee betekent nog steeds nee. #thisisnotconsent •
•
•

text:
25th of november – international day for the elimination of violence against women “1 in 3 women and girls experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime” (un, 2018). .

for many, it might seem as a distant and non-existent figure 
but in my reality, it is an actuality. 
i grew up in ukraine in the soviet union aftermath,
the people filled with fear and wrath, 
a peculiar period marked with shiver of distrust. 
i was taught to never talk, never look, never fuss. .

and it made sense because growing up wasn’t pleasant: 
we all felt their eyes punching holes in our backs like weapons; 
we have all seen or heard the domestic violence behind the closed doors; 
we have all heard whistles and words accompanying us outdoors; 
and with carrying that terrifying phobia of being abused 
we have still moved on with life persistently with no excuse.
.
moving to europe didn’t change the situation generally, 
just made the boundary manifest itself ‘liberally’: the consent and other formality are not needed if you are an easy-to-get girl with fun personality; 
at work or at school still not taken seriously for your opinions or abnormalities; 
looked in the eye with lust and carnality; 
and stories of violence not really heard because they make you ‘inadequate’.
.

i will tell you what. .

society’s handcrafted deviant –
a congenital anomaly, 
should never praise inhumanity valiantly.
.
the time has come for the 3.73 billion souls
to take the stand and to take the hold
utilizing the power to which they were born!
.
(poem by me)

we have all heard whistles and words accompanying us outdoors; 
and with carrying that terrifying phobia of being abused 
we have still moved on with life persistently with no excuse.
.
moving to europe didn’t change the situation generally, 
just made the boundary manifest itself ‘liberally’: the consent and other formality are not needed if you are an easy-to-get girl with fun personality; 
at work or at school still not taken seriously for your opinions or abnormalities; 
looked in the eye with lust and carnality; 
and stories of violence not really heard because they make you ‘inadequate’.
.

i will tell you what. .

society’s handcrafted deviant –
a congenital anomaly, 
should never praise inhumanity valiantly.
.
the time has come for the 3.73 billion souls
to take the stand and to take the hold
utilizing the power to which they were born!
.
(poem by me)

text:
tw: körperliche und sexuelle gewalt

40% der frauen in deutschland haben seit ihrem 16. lebensjahr körperliche und/oder sexuelle gewalt erlebt.

25% der in deutschland lebenden frauen haben gewalt durch aktuelle oder frühere beziehungspartner erlebt (häusliche gewalt). 13% der in deutschland lebenden frauen haben seit dem 16. lebensjahr strafrechtlich relevante formen sexueller gewalt erlebt.

42% der in deutschland lebenden frauen haben psychische gewalt erlebt, z.b. einschüchterung, verleumdungen, drohungen, psychoterror.
(quelle: frauen-gegen-gewalt.de)
.
und ich auch. wir sind nicht schuld, weil wir miniröcke und bauchfreie tops tragen. wir sind nicht schuld, weil wir nicht laut genug nein gesagt haben. wir sind nicht schuld, weil wir uns den falschen partner gesucht haben oder weil wir nachts alleine unterwegs sind. wir sind nicht schuld, weil die medien uns immernoch permanent sexualisiert darstellen (an dieser stelle danke an @pinkstinks_de für euren grandiosen einsatz). ich möchte eine gesellschaft, in der ich mir nicht überlegen muss, ob die engen jeans nicht doch zu viel aufsehen erregen, ich möchte eine gesellschaft, in der weibliche nippel keine obszönität sind, ich möchte eine gesellschaft, in der ich keine einschränkungen erlebe aufgrund meines geschlechts.
es ist mir nicht begreiflich, wie wir in der wissenschaft und technik unglaubliche fortschritte machen und bei gesellschaftlichen, sozialen themen so im rückstand sind. wie kann das sein? mein wunsch, nein, meine forderung ist, die größte diskriminierung der welt endlich zu beenden. und dafür reicht es nicht, einmal im jahr plakate aufzuhängen!
.
danke an @terredesfemmes für euer engagement. danke auch an alle einrichtungen wie frauenhäuser und frauenberatungsstellen, danke an jede frau, an jeden mann, die oder der zeichen setzt gegen gewalt an frauen.
.
@stadtloerrach #taggegengewaltanfrauen #esistnichtallesrosarot #terredesfemmes #gegengewaltanfrauen #metoo #feminism #movement #16tagegegengewaltanfrauen #fahnenaktion #schweigenbrechen #pleaseshoutout #comments #scetch #instaart #artwork #frauenrechte #womensupportwomen #international #instapicture #picoftheday #bleistiftzeichnung #womenwhodraw

if someone asks me how old i am, sometimes i say i'm 12, even if i'm eighteen. at the age of 12 i was a child, but at 13 i became an adult, because i saw that not all of people are good people... anyway, it's been a long time since that moment of my life, and i'm still here. do not kill yourself because some people were bad with you, no... love yourself. you are beautiful, strong, intelligent, self-confident and nobody can change it. be strong and walk with your head high.❤️
.
.
. 
#metoo#niunamás#niunamenos#violence#womenpower#genderviolence#me#power#stophating#proud#stoplabelling#onlylove#lifelover#25novembregiornatamondialecontrolaviolenzasulledonne#violenzasulledonne#oggicometuttiigiorni#nonenormalechesianormale 👠

text:
今年92冊目。#wearelonelybutnotalone 
この本はコミュニティについて書かれた本です。ネット社会になった昨今これまでマイノリティだった人たちが声を上げれるようになった。その典型例が#metoo 運動だ。これまで声をあげれなかった人が声を上げれるようになったのはネットの恩恵だ。そんなネット社会で重要なのは「自分はこういう人間だ」という人間性をいかにネットの世界にさらけ出せるかが勝負。
そしてこの本の最後にこの本の著者佐渡島庸平さんと幻冬社の箕輪さんの対談があった。箕輪さんいわくどんなテーマの本でも最終的なメッセージは「あなたは何者か」「何をしたいのか」を問い、最後には「個として立て」と訴えているのだそう。思い返してみれば前田さんの著書#人生の勝算 や昨日読んだ#lifeshiftにも同じような事が書いていた。まずは自分を知ることから始めよう。そうすれば進むべき道が見えてくるはずです。
#佐渡島庸平 #箕輪厚介#前田裕二#コルク##箕輪編集室#コミュニティ#読書記録 #本屋 #bookstagram #読書好きな人と繋がりたい #instagood #本#読書#読書ノート#
hashtags: #佐渡島庸平, #箕輪厚介#前田裕二#コルク##箕輪編集室#コミュニティ#読書記録, #本屋, #bookstagram, #読書好きな人と繋がりたい, #instagood, #本#読書#読書ノート#

text:
today is the start of 16 days of activism... what is the 16 days activism?

it is a worldwide campaign to oppose violence against women and children
it aims to raise awareness of the negative impact that violence and abuse have on women and children and to rid society of abuse permanently
when does the campaign take place?

the 16 days of activism campaign is held from 25 november to 10 december every year
however, the success of this campaign rests on our daily individual and collective actions to safeguard our society against this cycle of abuse

#16daysofactivism #orangeday #genderequalityforall #thetimeisnow #metoo #itbeginswithyou

text:
non è amore se lascia lividi.
non è amore se sei obbligata a fare ciò che lui dice.
non è amore se ti vieta di fare.
non è amore se ti priva della libertà di parola, espressione, di vestirti come vuoi e parlare con chi vuoi.
non è amore se ti priva della tua dignità.
perciò alza il viso, asciuga le lacrime e mostra a tutti, il mostro accanto a te.
perché non è normale che, per te e lui, sia normale.
perché questo non è amore.
#nonènormalechesianorma
#questononèamore
#metoo
#noviolenceagainstwomen
#nonmollare
#noviolence

text:
betroffene nicht alleine lassen- gewalt gemeinsam bekämpfen! 
täglich versucht in deutschland ein mann seine partnerin oder ex-partnerin zu töten. zu wenig von gewalt betroffene frauen trauen sich, hilfe zu suchen oder wissen, wo hilfe angeboten wird. am heuten  internationalen tag zur beseitigung von gewalt gegen frauen wollen wir auf die geschlechtsspezifische gewalt aufmerksam machen und für die notwendigkeit von hilfe- und beratungsangebote werben. eines davon ist das hilfetelefon gewalt gegen frauen, das auch  zeug*innen beratung bietet. unter https://www.frauen-gegengewalt.de/de/hilfe-vor-ort.html gibt es informationen für hilfeangebote vor ort. #stopviolenceagainstwomen #hilfetelefon #internationalertaggegengewaltanfrauen #feminism #gegengewaltanfrauen #gemeinsam #grlpwr #notalone #metoo #aufschrei

text: heute ist internationaler tag gegen gewalt an frauen. heute legen frauen eine rosa rose an den ort ihrer gewalterfahrung. dieses jahr werden an noch mehr kreißsälen rosen niedergelegt, manchmal zusammen mit der erlebten geschichte. immer mehr grauen trauen sich, denn gehört sehr viel mut dazu. unter der geburt erlebt gewalt ist für die frau sehr oft sexuell erlebte gewalt und das krankenhaus der ort ihrer vergewaltigung. nur wenige sind in der lage trotzdem hinzugehen und mit der rose dem personal anonym zu zeigen: hier habe ich schlimmes erlebt und ihr wart beteiligt. sehr oft noch ist das krankenhauspersonal überfordert und in der abwehr, fühlen sich durch die niederlegung angegriffen. aber die bewegung trägt schon dazu bei, dass mehr über die gewalt, die im kreißsaal stattfinden kann, gesprochen wird. der erste schritt, das erkennen und annehmen ist der wichtigste auf dem weg der gewaltvermeidung. heute denken wir an die opfer der gewalt an frauen. es sind die frauen selbst und immer auch ihre kinder.

amatevi, amiamoci di più.

text:
sei bella.
e non per quel filo di trucco.
sei bella per quanta vita ti è passata addosso,
per i sogni che hai dentro 
e che non conosco.
bella per tutte le volte che toccava a te,
ma avanti il prossimo.
per le parole spese invano
e per quelle cercate lontano.
per ogni lacrima scesa
e per quelle nascoste di notte
al chiaro di luna complice.
per il sorriso che provi,
le attenzioni che non trovi,
per le emozioni che senti
e la speranza che inventi.
sei bella semplicemente, 
come un fiore raccolto in fretta,
come un dono inaspettato,
come uno sguardo rubato
o un abbraccio sentito.
sei bella
e non importa che il mondo sappia,
sei bella davvero,
ma solo per chi ti sa guardare.
#aldamerini #25novembre #noallaviolenzasulledonne #nonènormalechesianormale #nonunadimeno #metoo #scarperosse #redshoes

text: el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer o día internacional de la no violencia contra la mujer se conmemora anualmente el 25 de noviembre para denunciar la violencia que se ejerce sobre las mujeres en todo el mundo y reclamar políticas en todos los países para su erradicación. la convocatoria fue iniciada por el movimiento feminista latinoamericano en 1981 en conmemoración a la fecha en la que fueron asesinadas, en 1960, las tres hermanas mirabal (patria, minerva y maría teresa), en república dominicana. en 1999 la jornada de reivindicación fue asumida por la asamblea general de las naciones unidas en su resolución 54/134 el 17 de diciembre de 1999 invitando a gobiernos, organizaciones internacionales y organizaciones no gubernamentales a convocar actividades dirigidas a sensibilizar a la opinión pública sobre el problema de la violencia contra las mujeres.💪🏻 #nonviolence #nowar #metoo #antiviolence #organization #foundation #women #power #nyc #un #unitednations #equalrights #womenforwomen #nomore #mujer #noviolencia #dominicanrepublic #mujerfuerte #nomas

text: eben schon in der story gepostet, noch ein paar mehr 💭 dazu. kleiner schnispel, große wirkung. er hatte sich nicht nur entblößt (auch schon schlimm genug), er holte sich einen runter. in diesem minischnipsel liest es sich so lapidar, so normal. dieses erlebnis war das harmloseste von allen übergriffigkeiten von männern mir gegenüber. ich wünschte, es wäre dabei geblieben. im gegensatz zu allen schlimmen situationen damals weiß ich heute: mich trifft keine schuld. in den anderen fällen ging es nicht wie hier zur polizei, weil ich mich so schämte! verrückt und so falsch! ich dachte, niemand würde mir glauben! ich hoffe und wünsche mir so, dass es nachfolgende generationen einfacher haben. dass mädchen und frauen ernster genommen werden, dass ihnen keine teilschuld zugewiesen wird, dass sie ein selbstverständliches recht auf unversehrtheit und selbstbestimmung haben. #rapeculture #rebelwoman #solidarity #ineedfeminism #gewaltgegenfrauen #neinheisstnein  #meinkörpergehörtmir #metoo

text:
noi, quando siamo innamorate, non distinguiamo più. ci rimbambiamo. scambiamo tutto per amore, mentre l’amore con la violenza e le botte non c’entra un tubo. l’amore, con gli schiaffi e i pugni, c’entra come la libertà con la prigione.
un uomo che ci picchia è uno stronzo. sempre. e dobbiamo capirlo subito. al primo schiaffo. perché tanto arriverà anche il secondo, e poi un terzo e un quarto. invece noi ci illudiamo di poter cambiare le cose, di poter correggere gli uomini maneschi, di riuscire a farli crescere anche quando gli si è bloccato lo sviluppo, e scalciano e urlano come bambini capricciosi.
non illudiamoci mai, mai e poi mai, di poterli cambiare, o che possano cambiare per amore nostro. anche se piangono come vitelli e dicono che non lo faranno più. non caschiamoci e chiediamo aiuto il prima possibile. e se una figlia ha un fidanzato così, prendiamola, impacchettiamola e riportiamola a casa. magari si incazzerà come una belva, magari ci dirà di farci i fatti nostri, ma lo farà da viva, e c’è una bella differenza.
luciana littizzetto

text_retweet:
#repost @istandforwomen 
today is the international day for the elimination of violence against women. it will be followed by 16 days of activisim around the world from 25 november till 10 december.
sexual harassment anywhere, anytime is “not ok”. we are joining the #mesh_basita campaign this year to ask for a law that would penalize sexual harassment in lebanon in all its forms and in all places.
التحرش الجنسي‪ ‬#مش_بسيطة. أنا مع إقرار القانون لمعاقبة التحرش الجنسي.

text:
@regrann from @inimfonetuk - 
the world is not a safe place if our women and girls are not safe! -

on this international day for the elimination of all forms of violence against women, i add my voice to the voices of women and girls and institutions all over the world to say let’s end violence against women and girls in all its forms wherever they occur, including the abolition of harmful traditional practices that continue to dehumanize womanhood. -

#womensrightsarehumanrights #endvaw #endviolence #endsexualviolence #enddomesticviolence #endstereotypes #endfgm #endharmfulpractices #endelectoralviolence #endgbv #endgenderbasedviolence #2030now #endchildmarriage #endchildabuse #endchildtrafficking #hearmetoo #metoo #timesup #timeisnow #rememberme #orangetheworld #idevaw #idevaw2018 @unwomen #womensrights #humanrights #humanrightscampaign #metoomovement #whatwomenwant #womenvoices

text:
jede 3. frau in deutschland hat schon einmal körperliche und/oder sexuelle gewalt erlebt. wenn es in einer partnerschaft zu gewalt kommt, ist das opfer in über 80 prozent der fälle eine frau. hinter jeder dieser zahlen stecken persönliche schicksale und die dunkelziffer liegt noch mal höher. oft trauen sich die betroffenen nicht, darüber zu sprechen. wir stehen an der seite aller frauen, die den mut haben und das #schweigenbrechen! das #hilfetelefon "gewalt gegen frauen" steht betroffenen und menschen aus ihrem umfeld rund um die uhr, an 365 tagen im jahr, zu allen formen von gewalt zur seite. ganz kostenlos, anonym und in 18 sprachen. übrigens können sich auch männer unter der nummer melden und nach hilfsangeboten fragen.
#gewaltgegenfrauen #häuslichegewalt #hilfe #anlaufstelle #bielefeld #frauenrechte #metoo #wegausdergewalt

text:
as-tu remarqué, belle étoile, qu'il est parfois nécessaire d'affirmer avec force sa vision du monde pour pouvoir vivre et avancer ? comme j'ai pu en faire l'expérience dans mon métier, certains sujets n'avancent pas sans un désagréable passage par la confrontation. tout comme un #metoo ou un "black lives matter" sont constamment nécessaires pour ne pas laisser notre collectif se couler dans des inégalités, la lithothérapie ne saurait trouver d'équilibre sans que le public affirme son refus des abus qui le pénalisent.
pour autant notre liberté n'est réelle qu'en dépassant les conflits. c'est seulement dans le rassemblement des forces que nous pouvons faire exister l'accompagnement par les pierres, or depuis mes débuts dans le milieu de la lithothérapie, ces rassemblements de forces ont été impossibles en raison du refus de certains professionnels de faire preuve d'une réelle conscience éthique. aussi j'en appelle à la sagesse de chacun : celui qui est réellement passionné d'accompagnement par les pierres, qui souhaite réellement faire exister cette discipline dans le monde, sera conscient des limites de préservation du public qu'elle ne peut pas franchir sans se détruire, et comprendra que ces enjeux éthiques sont des incontournables pour nous tous. que malgré l'apparente limitation qu'ils constituent, cette conscience et ce respect sont les garants d'une profession pereine, en respect de l'accompagné, et avec un peu de chance, plus forte grâce à une réelle synergie de ses professionnels.
dans l'attente d'une maturité de la lithothérapie, la lithosophie s'engage à vous offrir un accompagnement humain aboutit et responsable, en espérant que les esprits éveillés du milieu de la pierre auront la beauté d'âme de se montrer responsables eux aussi.
name: 💎 Lithosophia 💎•🔮

text:
today marks the beginning of #16daysofactivism for 2018.

from 25th november, the international day for the elimination of violence against women and girls, to 10th december, human rights day, the 16 days of activism against gender-based violence campaign is a time to galvanize action to end violence against women and girls around the world.

the international campaign originated from the first women's global leadership institute coordinated by the center for women's global leadership in 1991.

in recent years, the voices of survivors and activists, through campaigns such as #metoo, #timesup, #niunamenos, #notonemore, #balancetonporc and more locally #lifeinleggings, among others, have reached a crescendo that cannot be silenced any more.

advocates understand that while the names and contexts may differ across geographic locations, women and girls everywhere are experiencing extensive abuse and their stories need to be brought to light.

this year be will represent some stories we have been aware of over the years through the unite campaign’s global advocacy theme: orange the world: #hearmetoo as a means to bring awareness to what girls face daily.

#endviolence #genderviolence #girls #herstory #heartwork #story #likeagirl #advocacy #awakening #awareness #sdg5 #campaign #barbados #pain #cause #charity #change
name: I AM A GIRL BARBADOS

text:
my personal reason for not reporting my sexual assaults. 
my first one i was at a party and i was extremely drunk, he forced me to do oral, he was a couple of years younger than me so i felt like an idiot and because my friends told me it would ruin his life 
the second time was because i was in his friend group and i think if i’d reported it they wouldn’t have wanted to be my friend anymore, i would’ve been isolated. 
#whyididntreport #metoo #consent #rape #sexualharassment #mentalhealthawareness #equality #selflove #fucktrump #blacklivesmatter #womenempowerment #womensrights #transrights #rapevictim #bpd #borderlinepersonalitydisorder #borderline #anxiety #selflove #selfcare #instagood #instalike #instago #instagram

text:
i've watched the qspiracy since the start.

steve bannon left the wh august last year and q appeared the following october. do you believe in coincidences?

abusing and leaking presidential information to mislead the people and benefit the hijacked party of puppets is obviously just business as usual.

however - while doing this djt with the brave bunch known as gop has willingly opened a pussy wound that anyone around the world can easily contaminate. i like to call it meddlin' with presidental blessin'. i'm not the only one who knows this opportunity and messes with the bombastic patriots - may be russia or china or mbs or antifa or me me me, a tiny quarter pounder sitting on my bed.

the whole qshow seems like a vile roleplay but instead it has become the heart of the propaganda operation that joseph goebbels would have died for. it is obvious that stuff like pizzagate™ was testing and groundwork for the 2016 election and since it proved to be very effective it is used still, today, right now.

the accompanying memes go way beyond the propaganda of nsdap. social media companies are just helpless with the fake content - there is no way they are going to risk their business by taking a real responsibility.

there is absolutely no way that gop isn't aware of what is going on - after all cambridge analytica worked for ted cruz and john bolton. the whole narrative is built on the same user data that bannon and the mercers reportedly got from cambridge analytica.

and here comes the best part. trumq is truly playing along with his tweets, gestures and words.

the bigger issue still is that requqlicans are willingly piggybacking this lunacy and abusing the faith of their fellow men while campaigning for the midterms. this is not just an insane national security risk - it's a leaking conspiracy and treason in plain sight.

a non

text:
un giorno d'estate, solito giornale, solito articolo di violenza su una donna. ma una cosa mi saltò all'occhio: nel finale, l'incitazione della giornalista ad educare i giovani (dalle famiglie alle scuole) ad amare sé stessi e rispettare gli altri come unica fonte di soluzione a questo fenomeno diventato ormai una piaga della nostra società. perché chi conosce il rispetto, lo userà sempre per sé e per gli altri.🖤
#giornatainternazionalecontrolaviolenzasulledonne #girl #life #noviolence #woman #feminist #equality #love #respect #thisisnotconsent #metoo #nonènormalechesianormale
name: Martina Borriello
tweet_full:

text: in italia una vittima ogni 72 ore. adesso basta!in italy a victim every 72 hours. now stop! en italia una víctima cada 72 horas. ¡ahora pare!en italie, victime toutes les 72 heures. maintenant stop!in italien alle 72 stunden ein opfer. jetzt stoppen!в италии жертва каждые 72 часа. сейчас остановиться!在意大利每72小时受害一次。现在停止！イタリアでは72時間ごとに犠牲者がいます。今すぐ停止！في إيطاليا ضحية كل 72 ساعة. توقف الآن! #nonunadimeno #nonenormalechesianormale #violenzadomestica #donna #controlaviolenza #femminicidio #noallaviolenza #noviolence #stopviolence #stopviolenceagainstwomen #violenzasulladonna #noallaviolenzasulledonne #violenzadigenere #violenzasulledonnestop #25novembre #violenzacontroledonne #violenzasulledonne #donne #violenzapsicologica #donnerstag #donneemotori #violenza #metoo #followme

text:
each year, from 25 november marked as the 16 days of activism against gender-based violence to 10 december which calls for action against one of the world’s most persistent violations of human rights – violence against men, women, and lgbtqi. the global advocacy theme this year is: orange the world: #hearmetoo

violence against gender continues to occur at an alarming scale in every country in the world. too often it is accepted as normal behavior and the global culture of discrimination against women and other genders allows violence to occur with impunity. recent movements such as #metoo and #timesup have propelled this issue onto the global stage. advocates understand that while the names and contexts may differ across geographic locations, women and girls everywhere are experiencing extensive abuse and their stories need to be brought to light.

violence against women is not inevitable; it is preventable. let us tell our families, schools, communities, and workplaces. together, our message will be amplified, and our voices heard.

yuwa reached out to the youth and asked their opinions on #metoo. through this video, we have tried to convey their voice on the #metoo campaign. the views are completely individual's perception and do not reflect upon yuwa's opinion.

full video on: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6dejoyg1xoi

music: chill smooth guitar rap beat / higher (prod. syndrome) [new 2018] syndrome

text:
"pourquoi aucune jeune fille avec qui j'ai pu échanger aujourd'hui n'était au courant qu'une marche consacrée à la cause féminine avait lieu demain? 
pourquoi, quand j'ai tenté, intriguée, d'aborder avec beaucoup d'entre elles leur ressenti sur ce sujet, plus d'un an après #metoo, ai-je eu le droit à quelques regards gênés et comme simple et évidente réponse: «mais de quoi tu parles?» pourquoi suis-je encore obligée, entre deux intercours ou un passage au self, d'essayer d'expliquer à deux adolescentes qu'une fille qui embrasse n'est pas «une pute» et qu'être en couple avec un garçon ne signifie pas qu'elle consent implicitement à avoir un rapport sexuel avec lui? (...)" un extrait de ma tribune à retrouver en entier sur le figaro vox ou dans ma bio. et si tu veux te délecter des commentaires de certains lecteurs, tu seras servi. 👊

#noustoutes #metoo #metoomovement #etribune #debat #sexisme #feminism #lycée #collège #inégalités #hommes #femmes #commentaires

text:
25 ноября международный день борьбы за ликвидацию насилия в отношении женщин
_
данные статистики печальны:
одна из трех женщин и девочек подвергается физическому или сексуальному насилию хотя бы раз в жизни, причем чаще всего – со стороны супруга или партнера;
_
около 750 млн женщин и девочек вступили в брак до достижения 18-летнего возраста, а 200 млн подверглись калечащим операциям на половых органах;
_
женщины и девочки составляют 71 процент всех жертв торговли людьми;
_
три из четырех из них подвергаются сексуальной эксплуатации;
_
насилие в отношении женщин - одна из главных причин смерти или инвалидности женщин репродуктивного возраста.
_
и это, увы, далеко не полный список.
_
в этом году проводится акция «окрась мир в оранжевый цвет» с хэштегом #hearmetoo начнется с 25 ноября и завершится 10 декабря, в день прав человека. название кампании, означающее «услышьте меня тоже» - это вариация на тему возникшего в сша и распространившегося на многие страны движения против сексуальных посягательств #metoo

источник: un.org

stop_filter_tweet: 25 ноября международный день борьбы за ликвидацию насилия в отношении женщин _ данные статистики печальны : одна из трех женщин и девочек подвергается физическому или сексуальному насилию хотя бы раз в жизни , причем чаще всего – со стороны супруга или партнера ; _ около 750 млн женщин и девочек вступили в брак до достижения 18-летнего возраста , а 200 млн подверглись калечащим операциям на половых органах ; _ женщины и девочки составляют 71 процент всех жертв торговли людьми ; _ три из четырех из них подвергаются сексуальной эксплуатации ; _ насилие в отношении женщин - одна из главных причин смерти или инвалидности женщин репродуктивного возраста . _ и это , увы , далеко не полный список . _ в этом году проводится акция « окрась мир в оранжевый цвет » с хэштегом начнется с 25 ноября и завершится 10 декабря , в день прав человека . название кампании , означающее « услышьте меня тоже » - это вариация на тему возникшего в сша и распространившегося на многие страны движения против сексуальных посягательств etoo источник : un.org

text:
“just asking for it” 
she said she wasn’t going to do it
that today was just a simple check up 
nothing more, nothing less 
but when the doctor asked her 
about the reason for her visit 
she stared blankly at her 
as if she had forgotten how to speak 
and all at once 
the words came gushing out 
uncontrollably 
like the tears streaming from her eyes.
•
•
“i was sexually assaulted a few weeks ago
and i haven’t been able to get over it 
because i blame myself.”
the doctor simply replied, “you didn’t do anything wrong.
all you did was survive.”
but the girl hung her head and sobbed.
“you don’t understand,
i consented at first 
but then i asked him to stop.
he didn’t.
i asked him again. 
and he refused.
it hurt. 
he was hurting me. 
i tried to pull my body away from his 
but he just grabbed me 
and swallowed me up in his arms. 
i begged him to stop.
he wouldn’t stop.” •
•
men will never know the feeling 
of lying naked on a cold table 
having their bodies examined 
spread open 
with cold tools around and in them 
like we women are lab experiments - 
experimented with and on by some stranger 
and left broken on a bed 
just to be fixed up in an office 
that takes care of these women 
who see us like this 
everyday 
and already know the proper procedure
of tissues and right sentences 
to make the victims feel better •
•

name: Hillary Dawn McKinney
tweet_full:
“just asking for it” 
she said she wasn’t going to do it
that today was just a simple check up 
nothing more, nothing less 
but when the doctor asked her 
about the reason for her visit 
she stared blankly at her 
as if she had forgotten how to speak 
and all at once 
the words came gushing out 
uncontrollably 
like the tears streaming from her eyes.
•
•
“i was sexually assaulted a few weeks ago
and i haven’t been able to get over it 
because i blame myself.”
the doctor simply replied, “you didn’t do anything wrong.
all you did was survive.”
but the girl hung her head and sobbed.
“you don’t understand,
i consented at first 
but then i asked him to stop.
he didn’t.
i asked him again. 
and he refused.
it hurt. 
he was hurting me. 
i tried to pull my body away from his 
but he just grabbed me 
and swallowed me up in his arms. 
i begged him to stop.
he wouldn’t stop.” •
•
men will never know the feeling 
of lying naked on a cold table 
having their bodies examined 
spread open 
with cold tools around and in them 
like we women are lab experiments - 
experimented with and on by some stranger 
and left broken on a bed 
just to be fixed up in an office 
that takes care of these women 
who see us like this 
everyday 
and already know the proper procedure
of tissues and right sentences 
to make the victims feel better •
•
she is on a table getting fixed.
he is on another woman getting pleasure.
•
- hillary dawn mckinney

text:
bannon wanted to use the sorts of aggressive messaging tactics usually reserved for geopolitical conflicts to move the us electorate further to the right, wylie said. he had already directed a series of anti-establishment, conservative documentary films and presided over the far-right website breitbart news, but cambridge analytica would mark another step in his overall ambitions to transform the nation.

with financial backing from hedge-fund billionaire robert mercer, bannon co-founded cambridge analytica in 2013 as the us-branch of strategic communication laboratories (scl) group, a british company that advertises how it has conducted "behavioral change" programs in more than 60 countries.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robert mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

text_retweet:
#repost from @psychepsicologia. a nagore laffage la culparon por irse con un desconocido y a su madre en el juicio le preguntaron si su hija era una ligona. a la víctima de la manada la culparon de su violación, apelando que puso la denuncia al avergonzarse de que al final se grabase su «relación sexual» y no defenderse. a juana rivas por «secuestrar» a sus hijos a pesar de tener una denuncia contra su ex marido. a diana quer por salir de fiesta y vestir provocativo. a ana orantes por denunciar a su exmarido en televisión, contando el maltrato que sufrieron ella y sus hijos durante 40 años.  a la mujer violada en irlanda por llevar un tanga. a las jornaleras marroquíes de huelva por venir a españa. a las mujeres que contamos nuestras agresiones en el #metoo o en el #cuéntalo
porque «estábamos llamando la atención»
fueron responsabilizadas de su maltrato, su violación y su asesinato. las revictimizaron los medios de comunicación, los abogados, los jueces y la sociedad patriarcal. 
el #victimblaming también es violencia, y como profesionales no sólo debemos tener cuidado con no caer en ello, también debemos concienciar y sensibilizar en el daño y el peligro que conlleva. 
hoy, día internacional contra la violencia hacia las mujeres, recordemos a las que ya no tienen voz, a las que no la tendrán y a las que día a día les es arrebatada. no volverán a tener nuestro silencio otra vez.
#25n #violenciadegenero #violenciamachista  #feminism #feminismo
