text: por avatares de la vida todo nuestro equipo son mujeres, nosotras, desde la dirección, coordinación, el profesorado, hasta nuestras primeras alumnas en prácticas. por eso desde nuestro equipo queremos remarcar la importancia de este día. no sólo porque la violencia de género mata con asesinatos brutales, sino porque nos ha hecho sentir menos válidas, más acechadas sexualmente, con más miedo, con papeles impuestos de cuidadora, con la idea de que tenemos que demostrar más para que nos vean iguales. todos los días en nuestra profesión vemos estas secuelas en nuestras pacientes, los papeles impuestos, las violaciones (de cuerpo o de mente), los traumas, las limitaciones en la vida de todas. por ello queremos decir que basta ya. no sólo de asesinar en cuerpo, sino de asesinar en espíritu, de hacernos creer que no somos nada si otros no nos dan su aprobación, de rellenarnos de opiniones y vaciarnos de nosotras mismas. no les cuentes los mismos cuentos a tus hijas, la princesa no necesita a nadie #quieropsicologia #psicología #psicólogos #psicológico #violencidegénero #25denoviembre #cursos #formación #niunamás #metoo #maltratofísico #maltratopsicológico #princesasindependientes #amorrománticono

text:
my recent relocation hasn’t been easy but it’s certainly better than what i left behind.
*
in last week’s email i talked about how unacceptable conditions can be just what we need to push us out of the old and into the new and improved.
*
as a former code enforcement housing inspector, i was well aware of my rights as a tenant and how to exercise them. but i also knew that landlords that allowed these types of conditions to exist had no intentions on truly making things right.
*
this relocation wasn’t easy, but it was damn sure worth it!

text:
i come from a patriarchal country where baby girls are considered a burden. majority pakistanis are poor and uneducated and follow age old gender roles. hence, boys are considered a source of income and girls, a source of expense. however, the dynamics are changing as gender roles are being redefined world over. but as women empowerment is gaining momentum, i'm noticing that men are now being villanized (disclaimer: i support women empowerment and #metoo movement). i agree patriachy is at fault and men need to reassess their treatment of women (personally and professionally), but i don't see how little boys are being held responsible. let me explain what i see in my society today.
.
.
.
today i see girls being uplifted but boys being held back. i sometimes feel fear or guilt if i praise my sons too much. i get told that i need a daughter to experience their caring nature as if boys aren't capable of caring. i understand that each gender brings its own set of blessings but why must we create light for one by darkening the other? isn't equality achieved by sharing the light on the basis of merit? why is there a need of putting one gender down to build the other? isn't that exactly what we did with our girls? don't get me wrong, i love that there's a shift in how to raise our children by giving more freedom to girls and limiting the unreasonable freedom given to boys. i totally agree that mothers of boys need to be more responsible and educate their sons regarding the rights of women. i know there are men out there that respect and empower women because they were raised right. my husband is one of them and i hope to raise my boys the same way. my point is to make ourselves more responsible parents instead of supporting gender stereotypes in both cases. let's not celebrate the birth of a boy or girl specifically, let's celebrate the birth of innocent children, of human beings. lets not create a dark cloud over one gender. only then will we be able to make them cherished members of society.
.
.
.
.
#momofboys #motherhood #momlife #momblog #parenting #parenthood #learningtogether #raisinghumanbeings #lovemyfamily #girlsvsboys #womanempowerment #humanity

text:
hoy es el día mundial contra la violencia de género.

en lo que llevamos de año, 44 mujeres (según cifras aportadas por el ministerio de igualdad) han muerto víctimas de la violencia machista. a manos de sus parejas, sus padres, u hombres que no han consentido un no por respuesta
. 
todavía existe mucho desconocimiento del por qué se producen estos asesinatos
. 
la violencia machista no comienza en la edad adulta, ni comienza por una bofetada
.
empieza desde la infancia, cuando nos inculcan valores machistas. cuando a las niñas se les enseña cómo se tienen que comportar por el hecho de ser mujeres, lo que se espera de ellas
.
cuando a los niños se les enseña que tienen el poder por el hecho de ser hombres
. 
empieza cuando tu pareja te dice qué ropa te tienes que poner. cuando te controla el teléfono. cuando te prohíbe salir con tus amigas de fiesta un fin de semana
. 
empieza con los famosos "micromachismos" que tanta gracia hacen a algunos. aunque gracia no tienen ninguna
. 
esto se hace de forma muy sutil, y está tan inculcado en nuestra sociedad, que ni siquiera nos damos cuenta
.
no es un problema de ideologías, ni de nivel cultural, ni de etnias. es un problema social
.
eso que se conoce como patriarcado, no es más que un sistema dominado y controlado por el género masculino. y existe en todo el mundo
. 
sé que muchas personas se ríen o son escépticas cuando se habla de la igualdad de géneros, o cuando las mujeres reclamamos nuestros derechos. que no son más que derechos humanos (así se declaró en 1995, en la iv conferencia mundial sobre los derechos de las mujeres convocada por las naciones unidas). pero la desigualdad entre hombres y mujeres es una realidad mundial a día de hoy
.
y los asesinatos de estas mujeres no son más que el final del camino de la sociedad machista en la que vivimos. un camino que hay que cortar mediante la educación y concienciación desde la infancia
.
como mujer, pero sobre todo como ser humano, me uno a la reivindicación de la igualdad de géneros
.
no se trata de ser feminista. se trata de ser humana
.
#diamundialcontralaviolenciadegenero #niunamas #metoo #noesno #violenciamachista #feminist #feminismo

text:
🚫 25 de novembro, dia internacional de luta contra violência a mulher. ⚠ vimos ressaltar a importância desta data, em que todas as mulheres são protagonistas de uma luta constante contra o assédio e a violência. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
💬 a voz de várias atrizes, cansadas de situações constrangedoras e assediosas, que vivenciaram em camarins e bastidores de desfiles e gravações, tomou proporção internacional, se tornando uma campanha para trazer coragem a outras mulheres, para denunciarem as inúmeras situações de abuso que sofrem em seu cotidiano. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
🚫 não deixe de recorrer aos seus direitos. se achar que eles estão sendo violados, procure uma advogada ou um advogado para ter seus direitos assegurados. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
📱 e para denunciar, disque 180. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
#oabrs #advocaciars #metoo

text:
ik zit al een tijdje met dit onderwerp in mijn maag en twijfelde enorm of ik er een foto over zou plaatsen. net daarom doe ik het toch. twijfel of een stukje bil wel oké is op social media vormt onderdeel van het grote probleem. kleding mag nooit een free pass zijn om iemand lastig te vallen. vooral niet als het gaat over lingerie, want dat zie je in eerste instantie niet eens. ik vraag er niet om om verkracht te worden. niet als van boven tot onder ingepakt ben, en niet als ik eens wat minder draag. nee betekent nog steeds nee. #thisisnotconsent •
•
•

text:
the rights of women and girls are fundamental human rights that are protected by our constitution. gender-based violence, in all its different forms, reduce the ability of women and girls to enjoy their rights and live with dignity. today, we start the #16days campaign to end all forms of #gbv in secondary schools, higher institutions, households, and in the world of work. 
the international day for the elimination of violence against women which also marks the beginning of the 16 days of activism against gender based violence is a time to increase awareness about and more importantly take action on the disproportionate levels of violence faced by women and girls in all their diversities in our society. 
the theme for this year’s campaign is ‘end gender based violence in the world of work’, recognising that perpetrators of #sgbv are not only strangers! they include family members (fathers, brothers, husbands, uncles, etc); teachers and lecturers in schools, as well as colleagues and bosses in the workplace.

in 2018, building on existing campaigns, recognizing the breaking of the silence with #metoo, we want #hearmetoo to challenge institutions in 🇳🇬 where #sgbv is perpetuated and overlooked. and that it is 🕛 to start working towards systemic change with strong accountability mechanisms. 
join us over the next 16 days as we break the silence by sharing stories of sexual and gender based violence in secondary schools, higher institutions, households and workplaces in nigeria and learn from experts in a series of tweet chats on the ways we can work together to end #sgbv. 
we will also be sharing existing laws that are meant to protect girls and young women against violence in nigeria, the gbv services available, the gaps that need response and our recommendations. #timesup nigeria! 
follow us on twitter @eva_nigeria to catch up with our tweets.

text:
hoje comemora-se o dia internacional pela eliminação da violência contra as mulheres. 
são inúmeras as causas que põem as mulheres em situações mais vulneráveis a violência, e todas podem ser combatidas: pelos estados, pelas empresas e por nós. 
conheçam um pouco dessas causas e conheçam também mulheres que lutam pela justiça e pela igualdade e se vêem em situações de perigo. 
visitem o link da nossa bio. 🕯

text_retweet:
taking over open society foundations’s instagram for a week with photos from my long term project 'ni una menos' on gender violence and women's movements fight for rights. 
glad to have the opportunity to give visibility on this important and current issue in the week of november 25th, the international day for the elimination of violence against women.
today women will demonstrate in all the world against gender violence.
more info about 'ni una menos' on the website dedicated to the project www.niunamenosproject.com

#repost @opensocietyfoundations
(@get_repost)
• • •
the leader of madres victimas de trata, an association of mothers whose daughters were lost to sex trafficking. 
despite a 2012 law which raised the maximum prison sentence for “femicide,” the killing of a woman or girl on account of her gender, argentina is still struggling against widespread gender-based violence. thankfully, a grassroots, women-led movement known as ni una menos (not one [woman] less) has arisen in argentina, and is working to empower women and defend their human rights. in this series, karl mancini (@karlitomancini) shares some of his work on the inspiring women of ni una menos and their fight for justice. to learn more about both mancini's work and ni una menos, please follow the link in our bio. 
#opensociety #argentina #niunamenos #femicide #femicidio #conmisderechosnotemetas #16days #genderbasedviolence #metoo #hearmetoo #madrestrata #women #womenrights #portrait #people #reportage #photojournalism #documentary #project

text: heute ist internationaler tag gegen die gewalt an frauen. „nein heißt nein“ gilt laut #amnestyinternational aber nur in einem drittel der europäischen länder. das heißt: auch wenn die frau dem sex nicht zustimmt, gilt er noch nicht überall gleich als vergewaltigung. das muss sich ändern! #neinheißtnein #metoo #violenceagainstwomen #internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen

text:
"per tutte le violenze consumate su di lei
per tutte le umiliazioni che ha subito
per il suo corpo che avete sfruttato
per la sua intelligenza che avete calpestato
per l'ignoranza in cui l'avete  lasciata
per la libertà che le avete negato
per la bocca che le avete tappato
per le ali che le avete tagliato... per tutto questo:

in piedi signori, davanti ad una donna !!! "
(w.shakespeare)

text:
today is international day for the elimination of violence against women, a day where we remember and attempt to raise awareness that women and young girls are victims of various forms of violence. 
no matter how bad we think the problem is, it’s actually a lot worse in reality. many women walk amongst us hiding the physical and emotional scars of previous and ongoing abuse. 
1/3rd of the women worldwide have experienced some form of violence in their lives. so it really is a problem if great importance. 
today, we stand with anti-violence advocates and groups and defenders of women’s rights who work tirelessly to prevent and end violence against women and girls. not only that we encourage you to #orangetheworld and find your own way to join the fight. every little helps. 
#internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen  #internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen2018 #mirabelsisters #stopfemalefoeticide #stopfemaleviolence #enddomesticviolenceandsexualassault #enddomesticviolence #endrape #endsexualharassment #stopsexualharassment #metoo #timesup #endfgm #endfgm2030 #endslavery #endsexualviolence

text:
"him"
i want him to shout loud,
to let his loneliness fade away.
but then society wants him to be strong
for he is a man and he has to pay.

he is mumma's boy and gets mocked,
for someone said man are built muscular.
his teardrops are never seen by anyone,
deep inside if someone sees them is his fear.

good men are hard to find is what people believe,
"you aren't like other's" is what i want to hear.
there are thousand ways to blame him,
but not even single way to make his words clear.

in the shame everyday, he's being called pervert,
wounds are internal you won't see them.
not every man is a culprit, some are victims too,
some can be feminist and even have #metoo in them.

@poetrybypriyanshi via @priyanshi.jain05
🖤
#poetrybypriyanshi #shespeaksforthechange #equality #empowerment

text:
@regran_ed from @lifematterswithaanuadedire -  wednesday’s show was super amazing.  we had a great session with mrs christianah akindolie 
may the lord bless and increase you @christianah_akindolie . it was such a fun moment for us all. we learnt, 
1. be concerned about who your children are with and know their friends.
2. fathers should not bath their girl child: if it’s avoidable.
3. don’t let everyone have access to your children, observe those around your children.
4. don’t shut down your children, give them proper attention.
5. don’t doubt your child. affirm your children, speak positive words to them.
6. fathers need to be present and not just drop money.

we will share many more excerpts but to watch the full video on our facebook page and also on youtube @aanuadedire 
link in bio
.
.
.
.

text:
this is why sen. cindy hyde-smith should be voted out of any leadership for our country. 
read this article  never again........ the mob then tied her ankles, hung her upside down from a tree, doused her in gasoline and motor oil and set her on fire.
while turner was still alive, a member of the mob split her abdomen open with a knife. her unborn child fell on the ground, where it gave a cry before it was stomped on and crushed. finally, turner's body was riddled with hundreds of bullets. mary turner and her child were cut down and buried near the tree, with a whiskey bottle marking the grave.
according to philip dray, “there, before a crowd that included women and children, mary was stripped, hung upside down by the ankles, soaked with gasoline, and roasted to death. in the midst of this torment, a white man opened her swollen belly with a hunting knife and her infant fell to the grown, gave a cry, and was stomped to death. the constitution’s coverage of the killing was subheaded-lined: ‘fury of the people is unrestrained.’ link to sen. cindy hyde-smith  https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2018/11/24/cindy-hyde-smith-attended-segregation-school-praised-confederates-legislation/2105314002/

#weremember  #hatecrimes #unitedstatesofamerica #america  #wethepeople #endhate #endprejudice #enddiscrimination #votethemout #vote2020 #mississippi #changeisnow #vote2018 #neverforget #humanity #humanrights #internationalday  #standagainstwomenviolence #equalityforall #metoo #hearmetoo #equality

text:
.
" من زن ام , اگر میتوانی مرد باش" .

۲۵ نوامبر روز جهانی توقف خشونت علیه زنان است.
جالب است آدمیزاد نمی خواهد بپذیرد که همگی تَنِ واحدیم . زن و مردی فقط در خلقت است. دیگرآزاری در حقیقت آزار تن و پیکر خود آدم و خودزنی است. نتایج دیگرآزاری به خودمان و تَنِ واحدمان باز خواهد گشت و در نتیجه دایم از خودمان میپرسیم چرا حال روح مان خوب نیست‌.
عجیب است اینروزها زن آزاری فقط در تصاویری از ضربات خشونت روی بدن زن ها خلاصه شده است و به دیگر جهات مختلف آزار روحی زن ها توجهی نمی شود که تنها دلیل آن سکوت و ترس زن ها از بازگویی است. 
زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه زن ، ملکه نباشد.
زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه زن را برده کنی برده ی جنسی عاطفی خانگی و با بی حرمتی تمام با او همچون کنیز آبا و اجدادی ات رفتار کنی. 
زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه برای یک بانو حد تعریف کنی ، حد برای حرف زدن حد برای سقف فعالیت حد برای خندیدن حد برای روابط اجتماعی اش
زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه اگر بانوویی در هر عرصه ای موفق باشد اول او را فاحشه خطاب کنی و برای تخریب موفقیت اش، او را سوژه ی سکس و به ادعای کذب مذکرهای اطرافش هر یک معاشقه یا سکس با وی داشته اند! 
زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه احساس لطیف و پاک عشق ورزیدنش و تمامی تقدس قلبش را ، باج عاطفی و باج تنهایی بنامید.
زن آزاری یعنی اینکه به زن عشق نباید داد که نکند روزی مرد نتواند بر زن حریف شود و ...
.
.
 باشد که خداوند نَرها را مَرد نماید و زن ها را عاقل ، آمین 😇
.
#vidakhoshboee #ویداخوشبویی
.
.
#بانوان #زنان #تبعیض_جنسیتی #حقوق_زنان #حقوق_بشر #خشونت_علیه_زنان  #نه_به_خشونت_علیه_زنان

#women #metoo #woman_violence

'' من زن ام , اگر میتوانی مرد باش '' . ۲۵ نوامبر روز جهانی توقف خشونت علیه زنان است . جالب است آدمیزاد نمی خواهد بپذیرد که همگی تَنِ واحدیم . زن و مردی فقط در خلقت است . دیگرآزاری در حقیقت آزار تن و پیکر خود آدم و خودزنی است . نتایج دیگرآزاری به خودمان و تَنِ واحدمان باز خواهد گشت و در نتیجه دایم از خودمان میپرسیم چرا حال روح مان خوب نیست‌ . عجیب است اینروزها زن آزاری فقط در تصاویری از ضربات خشونت روی بدن زن ها خلاصه شده است و به دیگر جهات مختلف آزار روحی زن ها توجهی نمی شود که تنها دلیل آن سکوت و ترس زن ها از بازگویی است . زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه زن ، ملکه نباشد . زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه زن را برده کنی برده ی جنسی عاطفی خانگی و با بی حرمتی تمام با او همچون کنیز آبا و اجدادی ات رفتار کنی . زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه برای یک بانو حد تعریف کنی ، حد برای حرف زدن حد برای سقف فعالیت حد برای خندیدن حد برای روابط اجتماعی اش زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه اگر بانوویی در هر عرصه ای موفق باشد اول او را فاحشه خطاب کنی و برای تخریب موفقیت اش، او را سوژه ی سکس و به ادعای کذب مذکرهای اطرافش هر یک معاشقه یا سکس با وی داشته اند ! زن آزاری ، یعنی اینکه احساس لطیف و پاک عشق ورزیدنش و تمامی تقدس قلبش را ، باج عاطفی و باج تنهایی بنامید . زن آزاری یعنی اینکه به زن عشق نباید داد که نکند روزی مرد نتواند بر زن حریف شود و ... . . باشد که خداوند نَرها را مَرد نماید و زن ها را عاقل ، آمین 😇 . یداخوشبویی . . ه_به_خشونت_علیه_زنان

text: what the actual fuck?! this is the guardian! #metoo wasn't about sex. it was about rape, sexual assault, harassment, stalking and intimidation. if you can't tell the difference between that stuff and sex stop having sex, you're doing it wrong. and i'm sure sharon theobald is being quoted out of context but "anger isn't going to get us anywhere"...?! honestly if women could end sexual violence by fluttering our eyelashes and asking nicely it would have ended several centuries ago. we're right to be angry, more people should be angry, it's the only thing that's going to bring change. and how can we be in the post #metoo era already? #metoo started like one year ago. basically every woman on earth turns out to have been a victim of sexual harassment or assault and so far only bill cosby has gone to jail. i am not done talking about this. i'm still angry. see you in ludlow tonight, perth australia in feb, more u.k. dates in march-may...! #katesmurthwaite #ludlow #metoo @guardian #theguardian #guardian #perth #tour #comedy #feminism
name: Kate Smurthwaite

text:
hoy 25 de noviembre se conmemora el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer, declarado así por la onu en honor a las hermanas mirabal asesinadas un día como hoy, pero del 1960, en nuestro país, 
república dominicana 🇩🇴💔.
.
.
es por eso que hoy me uno al ht #miartemivoz creado por la talentosa colega @lilliambaezmakeup y utilizo mi arte como muestra de apoyo y concientizacion para aquellas mujeres que se encuentran sumergidas en alguna relación tóxica en la cual son maltratadas.
.
.
el amor no es alejarte de tus seres queridos, amor no es ofenderte con malas palabras, amor no es golpearte, amor no es celarte. quien te hace estas cosas no te quiere, trata de buscar ayuda antes de que sea tarde. no es fácil, pero recuerda;
.
.
nada es imposible para los hijos de dios 💜.
.
.
inspiración: @makeup_by_sd
.
.
.
#milliesanchezmua #niunamas #noalaviolencia #feminicidio #nomoreviolenceagainstwomen #metoo #noalfeminicidio #ourartourvoice

text:
on today’s international day for the elimination of violence against women: 1 in 3 women and girls will still experience physical or sexual violence in their lifetime, most frequently by an intimate partner.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
violence against women and girls (vawg) is one of the most widespread, persistent and devastating human rights violations in our world today remains largely unreported due to the impunity, silence, stigma and shame surrounding it.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
in general terms, it manifests itself in physical, sexual and psychological forms, encompassing: intimate partner violence; sexual violence and harassment; human trafficking; female genital mutilation; and child marriage.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
violence against women and girls and the impact this has on their mental health needs to end. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
if you are worried that your relationship, or that of a friend or family member, is controlling or unsafe, visit women's aid or call the freephone 24/7 national domestic violence helpline, run by women’s aid in partnership with refuge, on 0808 2000 247. #endvaw

text:

i
the gender's violence in #colombia is other trouble that do difficult achieve a real #peace, today like conmemoration of day of elimination of violence agaisnt the woman, the stadistics show that the situation is bad for them the principal cities of this southamerican country (#bogota, #medellin y #cali) have highest levels against women and teenagers, yet the efforts is not enough to stop it. #metoo #respect #force #straight

text:
bannon wanted to use the sorts of aggressive messaging tactics usually reserved for geopolitical conflicts to move the us electorate further to the right, wylie said. he had already directed a series of anti-establishment, conservative documentary films and presided over the far-right website breitbart news, but cambridge analytica would mark another step in his overall ambitions to transform the nation.

with financial backing from hedge-fund billionaire robert mercer, bannon co-founded cambridge analytica in 2013 as the us-branch of strategic communication laboratories (scl) group, a british company that advertises how it has conducted "behavioral change" programs in more than 60 countries.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robert mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

text:
🌱día internacional de la eliminación, de la violencia contra la mujer. 🌱#metoo #niunamas #cuéntalo •
•
“de mis cosas preferidas en la vida son mis heridas. he aprendido amar cada grieta, cada raspón, cada dolor, cada traición, cada ansiedad, cada oscuridad, cada agrura, cada mueca, cada flecha. aprendí a comer en banquetas y en banquetes. sabiendo que habría días difíciles donde el dolor sería paralizante, pero ahí también aprendí amarme. descubrí que de los malos momentos nacen las buenas etapas. aprendí amarme primero sin nada para que cuando lo tuviera todo, jamás olvidar que dios me sacó de la nada y me lo ha dado todo, y que nada es mío y todo es de él. cuando veas las llagas de la vida ¡ aplaudetelas ! porque ese eres tú. eres inquebrantable. roto por fuera, pero de una sola pieza por dentro.” - daniel habif #diavioleta #noalaviolencia #niunamas @casa.juliadeburgos #bastaya  #metoo

text:

text:
"violence against women is perhaps the most shameful human rights violation, and it is perhaps the most pervasive. 
it knows no boundaries of geography, culture or wealth. as long as it continues, we cannot claim to be making real progress towards equality, development and peace.” no to violence against women.
no to violence. {25 novembre, giornata internazionale contro la violenza sulle donne}

text:
violenza è quando non si lascia l’opportunità alle donne di abortire in pace, e chiedere se faranno dei figli senza sapere nulla della loro storia personale. 
violenza è quando date un pugno e una carezza in un pomeriggio, quando si chiede “com’era vestita?” nei casi di stupro.
è un esercizio al potere e alla manipolazione.
violenza è insultare, demoralizzare, demolire, distruggere con le parole e le mani. 
esser riluttanti quando una donna ottiene una promozione, come se il merito non fosse mai menzionato. 
scegliere di essere aggressivi in classe e nelle nostre case. 
violenza è decidere di non educare alla parità, fomentare gli stereotipi e costruire muri. anche con l’indifferenza. 
è chiedere “ma lei è sposata?” ai colloqui. 
violenza è mobbing al lavoro e voltarsi dall’altra parte quando si assiste ad un episodio aggressivo.
è perseguire l’idea che non servi un’educazione paritaria, al rispetto reciproco del corpo degli altri e della dignità umana.
violenza è usare un linguaggio arrogante, e continuare a calpestare l’empatia. 
far finta che non esista il problema dei femminicidi e non attuare una politica preventiva.
.
siamo tutti responsabili, ogni singolo giorno. a scuola, nel posto di lavoro, al bar. 
ricordiamo oggi, domani e fra 3 mesi. .
.
.

text:
📌mañana lunes 26 de noviembre buscá nuestra carpa en  la plaza san martín de morón. estaremos apoyando la iniciativa de @morongobierno de 10 a 14 hs. en conmemoración de este día. ✔️11 hs: charla abierta con las dras. ana maría del vecchio (patología mamaria) y natalia mazzola (patología cervical).
✔️12 hs: lic. fernanda delgado (nutrición) 💁🏻‍♀️el cuidado de la salud también es un derecho que debe ser respetado y del que debemos tomar conciencia☝🏻 "un día para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer"
desde 1981, militantes y activistas en favor del derecho de la mujer observaban el 25 de noviembre como día de protesta y conmemoración contra la violencia de género. la fecha fue elegida para honrar la memoria de las hermanas mirabal, tres activistas políticas de la república dominicana que fueron brutalmente asesinadas en 1960 por orden del gobernante dominicano, rafael trujillo (1930-1961). finalmente, el 7 de febrero 2000, la asamblea general adopta la resolución 54/134, designando el 25 de noviembre como el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer e invitando a gobiernos, organizaciones internacionales y a ong a tomar manos en el asunto y coordinar actividades todos los años sobre esta fecha que eleven la conciencia pública en cuanto a esta cuestión. + info:  @nacionesunidas 
#lalcec #lalcecmoron #salud #mujeres #mujer #prevencion 
#metoo #timesup #balancetonporc #niunamenos  #metooindia  #hollaback #25denoviembre  #diainternacionaldelaelimanciondelaviolenciacontralamujer #pintaelmundodenaranja  #porunpaissinmaltrato #dianaranja #escúchametambien #orangetheworld #onu #ong

text:
bannon wanted to use the sorts of aggressive messaging tactics usually reserved for geopolitical conflicts to move the us electorate further to the right, wylie said. he had already directed a series of anti-establishment, conservative documentary films and presided over the far-right website breitbart news, but cambridge analytica would mark another step in his overall ambitions to transform the nation.

with financial backing from hedge-fund billionaire robert mercer, bannon co-founded cambridge analytica in 2013 as the us-branch of strategic communication laboratories (scl) group, a british company that advertises how it has conducted "behavioral change" programs in more than 60 countries.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robert mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

25n. día internacional por la eliminación de la violencia contra las mujeres.
violencia no sólo física, sino también sexual, económico-laboral, psico-emocional. 
somos responsables de este cambio. todos.
educando desde la cuna. responsabilizando al agresor y no a las víctimas. apoyando y comprendiendo. desmontando el sistema para volver a construirlo en igualdad.

wylie described cambridge analytica as - steve bannon and robe mercer using a foreign, military contractor ... to use some of the same techniques that the military uses ... on the american electorate.

cu devine, donie o'sullivan and drew griffin
cnn

text:
this is why sen. cindy hyde-smith should be voted out of any leadership for our country. 
read this article  never again........ the mob then tied her ankles, hung her upside down from a tree, doused her in gasoline and motor oil and set her on fire.
while turner was still alive, a member of the mob split her abdomen open with a knife. her unborn child fell on the ground, where it gave a cry before it was stomped on and crushed. finally, turner's body was riddled with hundreds of bullets. mary turner and her child were cut down and buried near the tree, with a whiskey bottle marking the grave.
according to philip dray, “there, before a crowd that included women and children, mary was stripped, hung upside down by the ankles, soaked with gasoline, and roasted to death. in the midst of this torment, a white man opened her swollen belly with a hunting knife and her infant fell to the grown, gave a cry, and was stomped to death. the constitution’s coverage of the killing was subheaded-lined: ‘fury of the people is unrestrained.’ link to sen. cindy hyde-smith  https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2018/11/24/cindy-hyde-smith-attended-segregation-school-praised-confederates-legislation/2105314002/

text:
- bannon got it immediately. he believes in the whole andrew breitbart doctrine that politics is downstream from culture, so to change politics you need to change culture. and fashion trends are a useful proxy for that. trump is like a pair of uggs, or crocs, basically. so how do you get from people thinking ‘ugh. totally ugly’ to the moment when everyone is wearing them? that was the inflection point he was looking for.

is what cambridge analytica does akin to bullying? - i think it’s worse than bullying, christopher wylie says. - because people don’t necessarily know it’s being done to them. at least bullying respects the agency of people because they know. so it’s worse, because if you do not respect the agency of people, anything that you’re doing after that point is not conducive to a democracy. and fundamentally, information warfare is not conducive to democracy.

millions of people’s personal information was stolen and used to target them in ways they wouldn’t have seen, and couldn’t have known about, by a mercenary outfit, cambridge analytica, who, wylie says, “would work for anyone”. who would pitch to russian oil companies. would they subvert elections abroad on behalf of foreign governments?

it occurs to me to ask wylie this one night. - yes.

nato or non-nato? - either. i mean they’re mercenaries. they’ll work for pretty much anyone who pays.

it’s an incredible revelation. it also encapsulates all of the problems of outsourcing – at a global scale, with added cyberweapons. and in the middle of it all are the public – our intimate family connections, our “likes”, our crumbs of personal data, all sucked into a swirling black hole that’s expanding and growing and is now owned by a politically motivated billionaire.

carole cadwalladr
the guardian

#media #news #information #business #success #profit #politics #faith #belief #trust #wisdom #trending #blog #brand #design #journalisim #campaign #propaganda #feminism #feminist #pussygrabsback #timesup #metoo #psychologist #psychology #mentalhealth #b52

text:
el dia 25 de noviembre se celebra, a instancias de la onu, el día internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.
.
con el lema "pinta el mundo de naranja", el objetivo es visibilizar y combatir las cinco formas de violencia contra la mujer:
.
❌ violencia de pareja ✔️
❌ violencia y acoso sexual ✔️
❌ trata de personas ✔️
❌ mutilacion genital femenina ✔️
❌ matrimonio infantil ✔️
.
más información en onu mujeres: bit.ly/2sa10rc
.
puedes ver historias reales, o incluso compartir la tuya, en este enlace: bit.ly/2dium7h
.
todo sobre la campaña "orange the world" aquí: bit.ly/2p2wrsc.
.
también puedes participar, simplemente compartiendo historias o acciones en tus redes sociales, incluyendo los hashtags #hearmetoo, #escuchametambien, #orangetheworld , #pintaelmundodenaranja
.
imagen: freepik
diseño: @atiempo.rrss
.

text:
- bannon got it immediately. he believes in the whole andrew breitbart doctrine that politics is downstream from culture, so to change politics you need to change culture. and fashion trends are a useful proxy for that. trump is like a pair of uggs, or crocs, basically. so how do you get from people thinking ‘ugh. totally ugly’ to the moment when everyone is wearing them? that was the inflection point he was looking for.

is what cambridge analytica does akin to bullying? - i think it’s worse than bullying, christopher wylie says. - because people don’t necessarily know it’s being done to them. at least bullying respects the agency of people because they know. so it’s worse, because if you do not respect the agency of people, anything that you’re doing after that point is not conducive to a democracy. and fundamentally, information warfare is not conducive to democracy.

millions of people’s personal information was stolen and used to target them in ways they wouldn’t have seen, and couldn’t have known about, by a mercenary outfit, cambridge analytica, who, wylie says, “would work for anyone”. who would pitch to russian oil companies. would they subvert elections abroad on behalf of foreign governments?

it occurs to me to ask wylie this one night. - yes.

nato or non-nato? - either. i mean they’re mercenaries. they’ll work for pretty much anyone who pays.

it’s an incredible revelation. it also encapsulates all of the problems of outsourcing – at a global scale, with added cyberweapons. and in the middle of it all are the public – our intimate family connections, our “likes”, our crumbs of personal data, all sucked into a swirling black hole that’s expanding and growing and is now owned by a politically motivated billionaire.

carole cadwalladr
the guardian

#politics #democracy #vote #election #propaganda #womensmarch #metoo #notmeus #bethechange #climateaction #climatechange #feminism #pussygrabsback #truth #responsibility #future #environment #planetrights #mindfulness #wellness #conciousness #kindess #humbleness #equality #animalrights #humanrights #care #b52

text:
i was 11 when it started. it stopped when i was 16. i found out almost ten years later. .
.
.
a year after finding out, i still can‘t believe how well my mind repressed these memories. it‘s still hard to accept that they are now part of my history. it’s still hard to use that word. especially, since i kept hiding from it strategically. 
i had to learn how to live with this feeling first. that feeling that makes you want to rib off your skin and burn it. that shame and guilt that comes with it. i am still learning how to make these feeling part of my history and not letting it into my everyday live takes some strength from time to time.
.
.
.
i am taking baby steps towards healing. 
i am save.
i survived.
and i am not going to give up until i create the life that i deserve. .
.
.
thank you @la_frecks for reminding me of the international day of elemantion of violence against women. thank you for reminding women to raise their voices. ❤️
.
.
.
#hearmetoo #metoo #childhoodsurvivor #ificansocanyou #healing #healingjourney #recovery #empoweredwomenempowerwomen  #loveyourself

text:
🧡 reminders in orange from the everyday, compiled on the international day for the elimination of violence against women.
to be honest, as a survivor of relationship violence, i find the framing of this issue to be problematic, even among international organizations. too often, it is portrayed as something that only happens to the "uneducated", to the "poor", to those with "low self-esteem" or who have deep, underlying psychological issues. it becomes associated with non-western culture and thus frees western males of the emotional responsibility of facing the issue, and only ever includes discourse on direct physical/sexual violence and outright insults. 
the problem is that violence against women includes so much more, which is why i remained in a terrible situation for so long and took so long to admit it afterwards. i was ashamed to admit that it was happening to me.
the discussion must include respecting women for their sexuality and admitting when we tend to objectify them for it. it must include full cultural respect for "career women", housewives, transgender women, sex workers, immigrant women, and the end of any sort of dichotomization of "types of" women. it must push men to engage in emotional labor (and if you don't know what that is, google exists. you can figure it out for yourself ;) ). it must include electing leaders who respect our autonomy, our very existence. the discourse must show that violence against women has nothing to do with the status of the woman herself, nor her own actions or psychology, but that it weighs upon transforming the psychological perception of women on the part of peoples of all genders.
because i'm really tired of seeing a therapist for the men in my life who won't. #unwomen #16daysofactivism #metoo #timesup #internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen #unitednations #hearmetoo 🧡

text:
sono sempre di più i casi di donne uccise o maltrattate in italia.

sono 113 le donne che nel 2017 sono state uccise dai loro mariti, compagni o ex, secondo i dati raccolti dall’associazione sos stalking. due delle donne assassinate stavano per partorire ed i rispettivi feti, di 5 e 6 mesi, sono morti assieme a loro. .
.
.
al link in bio trovate l'articolo con l'intervista ad alessandra bucci, dirigente prevenzione generale della questura di genova.
.
.

una strage che vede le donne indifese di fronte alla furia cieca dei loro partner o ex partner, incapaci di accettare la fine della relazione o la volontà della ex compagna di volersi ricostruire una vita al di fuori della coppia.

#nonunadimeno
#metoo
#stopviolence 
#violenzasulledonne

text: “‘female empowerment’, means nothing unless sex is in the mix, too.” pick up the observer today to see the brilliant @dvdobald talking about the pleasure revolution and her book sex drive alongside an all-star line-up of women including @drkatedevlin. from the article: in these post #metoo days, when sex is often presented as immoral, dangerous or potentially illegal, female pleasure has, according to theobald, become politically important. “anger is not going to get us anywhere,” she says, which is why she is calling for a pleasure revolution. “the first sexual revolution,” she says, “was about male desire. back in the 1970s men were still asking if women had orgasms and if they did, who cares? #metoo was about men imposing their pleasure on women. the pleasure revolution is about women asserting their own pleasure.” https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2018/nov/25/the-pleasure-revolution-what-women-really-want-sex @unbounders #sexpositive #pleasurerevolution #ladygarden #sextech #unboundbabes #unbound

sono sempre di più i casi di donne uccise o maltrattate in italia.

sono 113 le donne che nel 2017 sono state uccise dai loro mariti, compagni o ex, secondo i dati raccolti dall’associazione sos stalking. due delle donne assassinate stavano per partorire ed i rispettivi feti, di 5 e 6 mesi, sono morti assieme a loro. .
.

una strage che vede le donne indifese di fronte alla furia cieca dei loro partner o ex partner, incapaci di accettare la fine della relazione o la volontà della ex compagna di volersi ricostruire una vita al di fuori della coppia.

text:
wylie said that bannon's plans began to solidify in 2014, when cambridge analytica consulted various republican campaigns and pacs ahead of the midterm elections. the company began to test and apply its psychographics by using facebook data to model individuals' personality types in order to understand how to influence them.

documents show the john bolton super pac, which promoted candidates supported by recently appointed white house national security adviser john bolton, paid cambridge analytical $454,700 in 2014 for "behavioral microtargeting with psychographic messaging." those services included strategies that broke individual voters into "clusters" based on what messages would resonate with them.

wylie also said the company used focus groups and messaging trials in 2014 to test some of the concepts that became core themes of the trump campaign, such as "drain the swamp" and imagery of walls. "a lot of the narratives of the trump campaign were what we were testing in 2014," wylie said.

he added that bannon directly presided over much of the company's initial research. "everything that we were doing ultimately had to be passed up to bannon for approval," said wylie, who left the company in late 2014.

wylie said bannon would fly to london about once a month for company meetings, and during that time he came to understand bannon's ideology. "he really liked the idea of using a military-style approach to changing people's perceptions," wylie said.

curt devine, donie o'sullivan & drew griffin
cnn

text:
this was a serious business, it was actually backed by goldman sachs, but it crashed and went bankrupt because the gamers themselves who weren't cheating became enraged basically that these other people were doing, they put so much pressure on the gaming companies.

they put so much pressure on the video game companies, that they decided to basically ban gold-farming, which killed bannon's business, but it awakened him to the power of what he called "rootless white males" who spend all their time online. and five years later when bannon wound up at breitbart, he resolved to try and attract those people over to breitbart because he thought they could be radicalized in a kind of populist, nationalist way. and the way that bannon did that, the bridge between the angry abusive gamers and breitbart and pepe was milo yiannopoulous, who bannon discovered and hired to be breitbart's tech editor.

from the time i met him in 2011, he's had exactly the same politics. the same stuff you heard from trump, you saw on the campaign trail. what he was looking for was a vessel because nobody in republican washington believed in these kinds of ideas. the whole trend in the republican party was toward liberalizing immigration laws, passing comprehensive immigration reform. he was against it.

joshua green
devil's bargain: steve bannon, donald trump, and the storming of the presidency

text:
no quiero que nadie tenga que sufrir lo que yo sufrí.

hoy es un día especial, el 25n, el día contra la violencia de género.

no me gusta hablar de ello, pero entre 2015 y 2017 estuve en una relación que me destruyó, como mujer, como persona. tanto que todavía, más de un año después, me estoy intentando recuperar de lo que sufrí. pero la cosa más importante que he aprendido es que el amor no duele. si es amor, no duele.

me gustaría decir que yo soy la última que ha sufrido así, pero, por desgracia, sería mentira. somos innumerables. innumerables personas que ahora mismo sufren en relaciones abusivas, o que sufren después de dejarla. porque la recuperación también es difícil. es un proceso largo y duro.

me gustaría decir que es el único incidente de violencia que he sufrido, pero tampoco sería la verdad. somos innumerables, los que dicen #metoo. odio la palabra violación, la odio en inglés, en español, en valenciano. la odio con toda mi alma. jamás quiero oírla.

no quiero que nadie sufra lo que yo sufrí.

os quiero 💜 (y ya entiendo que algunos de vosotros siguen siendo amigos de mi exnovio. ya entiendo que habéis escuchado una versión de la historia que no tiene concordancia con la mía. y a vosotros, quiero que entendáis que no es un monstruo. es humano. porque no tiene por qué ser monstruo para cometer actos monstruosos.) #25n #25noviembre #contraviolenciadegénero #elamornoduele #noesno #igualdad #soyfeminista #metoo #niunamenos #niunamenys #yaestamoshartas #ilustracion #dibujo #illustration #drawing #feminist
name: Ana SZ

text:
un giorno qualunque, così all'improvviso, potrebbe accadere proprio a te di guardarti allo specchio, di vedere il tuo volto ferito e chiederti: "davvero è successo a me?". sì è accaduto per davvero!
i segni passeranno ma resteranno delle cicatrici invisibili agli occhi di chi ti guarderà, tu cambierai e non ti fiderai più di nessuno e nessuno ne capirà le ragioni, penseranno solo che sei instabile, possessiva, psicopatica e fottutamente gelosa perché la gente non sa guardare oltre e non ha la pazienza di aspettare tu sia pronta a parlarne. il tuo volto col tempo e le cure tornerà quello di prima ma tu no, tu non sarai più la stessa, mai più...
•
•
•

text:
hoy 25 de noviembre es el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.

por lo general hay muchas cifras y estadísticas horribles que nos ayudan a comprender porque hay que seguir luchando contra la vida basada en género (vbg) y este año ha sido muy significativo con movimientos como los de #metoo y casos legales como el de "la mandada". pero hoy me quiero enfocar en las cosas simples que refuerzan esa cultura donde se naturaliza la vbg. 
cuando hablo de estos temas en las charlas que doy hacemos el ejercicio de los regalos que damos a las niñas y a los niños, cómo se ve en esta foto (tomada ayer de un catálogo que me dieron) lo más regular es la muñeca a la niña (desarrollando habilidades de cuidado) y carritos de carrera a los niños (desarrollando habilidades psicomotoras, de liderazgo, haciéndolo sentir campeón) y vemos en la imagen como debe ser la niña, tierna; y la expresión del niño de ganador.

y qué sucede cuando esos es lo que formamos? estamos enseñando a las niñas a ser mamás y amas de casa (que son habilidades buenas, pero tenemos que fomentar más cosas) y al niño le enseñamos a alcanzar sus metas, ser un ganador (que tampoco está mal, pero también necesita aprender sobre ser cuidador y ser parte del mantenimiento del hogar). cómo podemos cambiar eso? dejar de ver los juguetes "rosados" y "azul" permitirles escoger, fomentar actividades que salgan de esa caja de eso es de niña o de niño. 
sé que es un post un poco pesado, y me quedo corta para todo lo que podemos hablar de esto, pero quisiera saber qué opinan? 
#crianza #psicoalejandrag #psicologia #genero #vbg #metoo #padres #niñez #juguetes #toys

text_retweet:
hoy 25 de noviembre, celebramos el día internacional para la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer. 
en culturas machistas como la nuestra, es muy importante empezar a visibilizar la violencia contra la mujer y dejar de normalizar discursos y conductas recurrentes.
y esto sólo se logra con una política potente de educación emocional, que enseñemos a niños y niñas, hombres y mujeres a estar en contacto con sus emociones, poner límites y conocer cómo autorregularse, para que así conozcan el valor de un otro, por que se han valorado a sí mism@s.
los seres humanos sanos, no son violentos, visibilizemos, hablemos, eduquemos, sanemos, es posible hacer un mundo mejor, entre todos! @fundacion_liderazgo_chile
@arnaldo_canales

#nolodejespasar #niunamenos #noesno #metoo #yotecreo #yotambien #educacionemocional

text:
jak powinna wyglądać skrzywdzona osoba, żebyś jej uwierzył?
może udostępniać pogróżki, które dostaje za to, że sprzeciwia się przemocy wobec kobiet?

tak się zaczął dla mnie międzynarodowy dzień przeciw przemocy wobec kobiet. nadawca to poeta i redaktor z mojego zawodowego środowiska, który jakiś czas temu wysyłał do mnie nocami nienawistne wiadomości. i nie tylko do mnie. ignorowałam go, blokowałam bez słowa każde jego konto na facebooku. dziś rano napisał mail. jego wiadomość to reakcja na to, że zgłosiłam groźby jego kolegi, wydawcy, na policji. groźby od wydawcy także dostałam za to, że wsparłam pisarkę, którą on seksistowsko obrażał.

taka jest „kara” za walkę z przemocą wobec kobiet. takie są codzienne, niewidoczne konsekwencje feministycznego aktywizmu. „bracia” nie przestają się wspierać. nie przestają próbować zastraszyć kobiet i zniechęcić ich do działania. walka z przemocą wobec kobiet to nasza codzienność – przed nami 16 dni przeciwdziałania przemocy ze względu na płeć. i kolejne 365 dni.

how should the victim look like to be believed?
can she share threats that she receives for fighing with violence against women? (text of the message: “i will always curse your name, fucking sneak. under normal circumstances, if somebody reports my brothers to the police, i would get into a car and burn your house, but my heart is not good”). this is how my international day for the elimination of violence against women started. a sender is a poet and a redactor from my work environment. his message is a reaction on the fact that i reported his friend’s threats (friend is a well-known publisher) to the police. threats from the publisher i also got because i supported a woman that he insulted. this is the “punishment” for fighting against violence. there are the everyday, invisible consequences of feministic activism.the fight against violence against women is our everyday life – ahead of us are 16 and 365 days of activism against gender-based violence.

#jakpowinna #whatsheshould #canshe #metoo #jatez #timesup #ibelieveher #trzymamstronekobiet #threats #hatespeech #internationaldayfortheeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen #violence #speakup #feminist #feminism

text:
abuse thrives only in silence. we want to empower women to use their voices to tell their stories and share their experiences. we also know that for many women, for many reasons, it’s not possible to speak. not yet. the goal of the never. her. fault. campaign is to raise awareness, to empower women who are able to share their stories to do so. to change the narrative. to support our sisters.
.
we'll shout it from the rooftops- no matter what, sexual violence is never. her. fault.
.
we’re donating 10% of all sales on bellesa today to rainn to help support survivors. use code neverherfault20 for 20% off and free shipping. #neverherfault

text:
today begins our #16daysofartivism to support art to end violence against women.  from now until 12/10, @create_2030 will be sharing relevant artwork.  join along and share your favorite music, films, photographs, poems or more on #16days using #create2030 and #hearmetoo!

about 16 days of activism:

on november 25, 1960, three sisters, patria mercedes mirabal, maría argentina minerva mirabal and antonia maría teresa mirabal, were assassinated in the dominican republic on the orders of the dominican ruler rafael trujillo. the mirabel sisters fought hard to end trujillo's dictatorship. activists on women's rights have observed a day against violence on the anniversary of the deaths of these three women since 1981.

under the theme orange the world: #hearmetoo, the unite partners are encouraged to host events with local, national, regional and global women’s movements, survivor advocates and women human rights defenders and create opportunities for dialogue between activists, policy-makers and the public. as in previous years, the colour orange will be a key theme unifying all activities, with buildings and landmarks lit and decorated in orange to bring global attention to the initiative.

help us highlight the work of artivists around the world who are using their talents to elevate calls to end violence against women. follow the twitter campaign on twitter.com/create_2030.

#unitednations #16daysofactivism #16days #orangetheworld #artivism #wd2019 #heforshe #sayno #metoo #timesup #idevaw #idevaw2018 #diacontralaviolenciadegenero #noustoutes

text:
lei (r)esiste. "come presso i primitivi il sesso maschile è laico, mentre quello femminile è carico di virtù religiose e magiche, così gli errori degli uomini nelle società più moderne sono considerati stravaganze senza importanza e giudicati con indulgenza; anche se disobbedisce alle leggi della comunità, un uomo non cessa di farne parte; è solo un bambino viziato che non minaccia profondamente l'ordine collettivo. invece quando la donna evade dalla società, ritorna alla natura e al demonio, scatena nella collettività forze incontrollabili e maligne. [...] la donna che esercita liberamente il suo fascino, l'avventuriera, la donna fatale, è sempre un tipo inquietante. nella donna avventurosa dei film di holliwood rivive la figura di circe. vi furono donne bruciate come streghe soltanto perché erano belle. e nel pio accanimento delle virtù di provincia contro le donne libere si perpetua una paura antica.
[...] se la donna è stata spesso paragonata all'acqua, è, tra l'altro, perché la donna è lo specchio in cui il narciso maschio si contempla: si piega su di lei in buona o in cattiva fede. ma in ogni caso, ciò che le chiede é di essere fuori di lui tutto quello che non può cogliere in sé, perché l'interiorità di quell'esistente è un nulla e, per pervenire a sé stesso, bisogna che egli si proietti in un oggetto. [...] e in ciò è talmente necessaria alla gioia dell'uomo e al suo trionfo che se non esistesse, gli uomini l'avrebbero inventata.
l'hanno inventata. ma lei esiste anche senza tale invenzione." simone de beauvoir, 1949

#nonunadimeno
#nessunaesclusa
#metoo
#25novembre
#ungiornodiunmesediunannodiunavita

tweet_full:
lei (r)esiste. "come presso i primitivi il sesso maschile è laico, mentre quello femminile è carico di virtù religiose e magiche, così gli errori degli uomini nelle società più moderne sono considerati stravaganze senza importanza e giudicati con indulgenza; anche se disobbedisce alle leggi della comunità, un uomo non cessa di farne parte; è solo un bambino viziato che non minaccia profondamente l'ordine collettivo. invece quando la donna evade dalla società, ritorna alla natura e al demonio, scatena nella collettività forze incontrollabili e maligne. [...] la donna che esercita liberamente il suo fascino, l'avventuriera, la donna fatale, è sempre un tipo inquietante. nella donna avventurosa dei film di holliwood rivive la figura di circe. vi furono donne bruciate come streghe soltanto perché erano belle. e nel pio accanimento delle virtù di provincia contro le donne libere si perpetua una paura antica.
[...] se la donna è stata spesso paragonata all'acqua, è, tra l'altro, perché la donna è lo specchio in cui il narciso maschio si contempla: si piega su di lei in buona o in cattiva fede. ma in ogni caso, ciò che le chiede é di essere fuori di lui tutto quello che non può cogliere in sé, perché l'interiorità di quell'esistente è un nulla e, per pervenire a sé stesso, bisogna che egli si proietti in un oggetto. [...] e in ciò è talmente necessaria alla gioia dell'uomo e al suo trionfo che se non esistesse, gli uomini l'avrebbero inventata.
l'hanno inventata. ma lei esiste anche senza tale invenzione." simone de beauvoir, 1949

text:
"in recent years, the voices of survivors and activists, through campaigns such as #metoo, #timesup, #niunamenos, #notonemore, #balancetonporc and others, have reached a crescendo that cannot be silenced any more. advocates understand that while the names and contexts may differ across geographic locations, women and girls everywhere are experiencing extensive abuse and their stories need to be brought to light." - un women

specifically for those who have conditions associated with infertility (such as endometriosis and pcos), it is known that "intimate partner violence (ipv), gender-based violence (gbv) and domestic violence have been shown to have significant associations with individuals and couples suffering from unwanted childlessness or involuntary infertility" (who, 2018). today, november 25 is international day for the elimination of violence against women. this is an important date marking the beginning of 16 days of activism, culminating in human rights day on december 10.  #hearmetoo
#endviolence 
#sdg5 
#genderequality
#orangetheworld

text:
join us this upcoming wednesday, november 28th at 2pm in room s737 as we present an exclusive workshop on sex, consent, and communication. what does consent really mean? what is considered sexual harassment? does no always mean no? these questions and more will be explored in this incredible workshop featuring professional actors from the @cunycat74 nyc creative arts team. this is a must-attend event for young brothers and sisters navigating college life. see you there. salute!
-

text_retweet:
rp @anon_vegan_guerrilla animals grieve too. realize this, and then think about how much grief you are bringing into the world by supporting the meat and dairy industry, where 60 billion land animals are brutally murdered every year, separated from their families, forced to watch their friends die before them as they await, trembling in fear, next in line...
the world can only take so much. please make this stop. you have the power to do so. between all of us we can create the most powerful wave. please help make this world a more compassionate one. your daily choices matter. choose kindness. choose vegan.
*

text:

text:
conmemorado desde el 1981

durante el 2017 y el presente año se han abierto un sinnúmero de casos de acoso sexual internacionalmente y las mujeres están más abiertas a acusar a sus agresores, especialmente con el movimiento virtual #metoo

conoces la historia?  todo inició con una tragedia en la república dominicana.

la convocatoria fue iniciada por el movimiento feminista latinoamericano en 1981 en conmemoración a la fecha en la que fueron asesinadas por mandato del dictador rafael leonidas trujillo, en 1960, patria, minerva y maria teresa mirabal. 
las mariposas, como eran sus nombres cladestinos, fueron organizadoras del movimiento que intentaba eliminar la dictadora trujillista en conjunto a sus respectivos esposos.  en 1993, en asamblea general, las naciones unidas (onu) aprobaron la declaración , y en 1999, a propuesta de la república dominicana con el apoyo de 60 países más, declararon el 25 de noviembre como día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.

fuente @wikipedia
@unwomen

#diainternacionaldelanoviolenciacontralamujer 
#eliminaciondelaviolenciacontralamujer 
#niunamasniunamenos 
#angiehernandez

pre_proc_tweet:
conmemorado desde el 1981

durante el 2017 y el presente año se han abieo un sinnúmero de casos de acoso sexual internacionalmente y las mujeres están más abieas a acusar a sus agresores, especialmente con el movimiento viual etoo

conoces la historia?  todo inició con una tragedia en la república dominicana.

la convocatoria fue iniciada por el movimiento feminista latinoamericano en 1981 en conmemoración a la fecha en la que fueron asesinadas por mandato del dictador rafael leonidas trujillo, en 1960, patria, minerva y maria teresa mirabal. 
las mariposas, como eran sus nombres cladestinos, fueron organizadoras del movimiento que intentaba eliminar la dictadora trujillista en conjunto a sus respectivos esposos.  en 1993, en asamblea general, las naciones unidas (onu) aprobaron la declaración , y en 1999, a propuesta de la república dominicana con el apoyo de 60 países más, declararon el 25 de noviembre como día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer.

text:
taking a break from promoting my album bc i was taken aback by this conversation between men who get it. unfortunately i haven't seen enough of this. ⠀
⠀
there's only so much we can say and do as women, y'all have to start having these conversations with each other. take responsibility for your actions, take action to remove the deeply ingrained social conditioning of toxic masculinity. it's never too late to learn new behaviors, to ask questions and to look in the mirror and decide who you want to be.⠀
⠀
bravo @cthagod & @lewishowes may we keep this conversation going!⠀
⠀

text:
esiste una violenza che non è fatta di rabbia espressa, al contrario, è insidiosa, fatta di silenzi ostili alternati a parole pungenti, si chiama gaslighiting. e’ una forma d’abuso antica, perpetrata in modo particolare tra le “sicure” mura domestiche, che lascia profonde ferite psicologiche.
colpa per aver sbagliato.

questo tipo di violenza psicologica è insidiosa, sottile, a volte giustificata dalla stessa vittima. e’ una violenza gratuita e persistente, somministrata a dosi quotidiane, ed ha la capacità di “annullare” la capacità di giudizio e autonomia valutativa la persona che ne è bersaglio.

il gaslighting è una forma di violenza che nasce anche all’interno di rapporti precedentemente costruiti sull’amore. poi, accade che una frustrazione alla quale non si sa adeguatamente reagire, mette in crisi la sicurezza e la fiducia che ripone in sé il manipolatore e tutto crolla: l’amore è sostituito dalla cattiveria gratuita e dalle molestie.

esistono tanti tipi di violenza che si nascondo sotto la parola amore. dobbiamo avere il coraggio di riconoscerla e di allontanarci, ma anche di chiedere aiuto, chè si, siamo donne, ma non supereroine! ❤️
se sei vittima denuncia. 
#unete #niunamenos #vivasnosqueremos #metoo #stopallaviolenzasulledonne #25novembre #women

text:
on wednesday the advocate qc, simon di rollo, who represented me in a civil rape case will discuss representation for rape complainers in criminal cases. i will be attending on wednesday to hear the advocates opinions.

as the only person who has been through both a criminal trial (no legal representation) and then a civil case (with legal representation) i was interviewed by the @scotnational for my comments.

#fightingforjustice . ** i would like to highlight that it was not the fact the surgeon didn’t turn up but rather he was never asked to attend ** .

#metoo #16daysofactivism #16days #metoomovement #missm #rapesurvivor #scotslaw

text:
🤓🤓 new episode alert people!! 🤓🤓 potterheads near and far were looking forward to the new addition to the wizarding world: fantastic beasts 2: the crimes of grindelwald 🔎🔎 while the fanbase is excited to find out what happens to newt, tina, queenie, jacob, and – most importantly – the niffler, one specific cast choice however, gave a lot of people reason for criticism 😳

around the same time that the first adaption of the series came out in 2016, johnny depp was accused of abusing his wife amber heard. even though the case seems to be settled (with a big privacy clause attached that prevents both parties to talk about it) fans are not pleased 😠

we discuss our views on this topic in the light of the current #metoo movement and as hardcore potterheads ourselves ⚡🐟 join the conversation!

we've already been getting some  feedback on this episode over on twitter and facebook - what do you think? would you have cast johnny depp in the role despite all this division and controversy? 🤔

let us know in the comments below!

you can find the full episode on our website (link in bio) or through your favourite podcatcher. 🤓🐟 -
-
-
-
-

text:
la violencia contra mujeres y niñas es una de las violaciones de los derechos humanos más extendidas, persistentes y devastadoras del mundo actual sobre las que apenas se informa debido a la impunidad de la cual disfrutan los perpetradores, y el silencio, la estigmatización y la vergüenza que sufren las víctimas.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer o día internacional de la no violencia contra la mujer se conmemora anualmente el 25 de noviembre para denunciar la violencia que se ejerce sobre las mujeres en todo el mundo y reclamar políticas en todos los países para su erradicación.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
en 1981, se celebró en bogotá, colombia, el primer encuentro feminista latinoamericano y del caribe, donde se decidió marcar el 25 de noviembre como el día internacional de no violencia contra las mujeres, en memoria de las hermanas mirabal.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
las hermanas mirabal, también conocidas como las mirabal o mariposas (patria, minerva y maría teresa mirabal), fueron tres hermanas dominicanas que se opusieron fervientemente a la dictadura de rafael leónidas trujillo. 
las tres fueron asesinadas el 25 de noviembre de 1960.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
en 1993, la asamblea general de @unitednations aprobó la declaración sobre la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer, en la que definió el término violencia contra la mujer como sigue:
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
“todo acto de violencia basado en el género que tiene como resultado posible o real un daño físico, sexual o psicológico, incluidas las amenazas, la coerción o la prohibición arbitraria de la libertad, ya sea que ocurra en la vida pública o en la vida privada”.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

text:
dia 25/11, dia internacional da eliminação da violência contra a mulher - “a igualdade entre homens e mulheres continua sendo um assunto pendente. o movimento #metoo colocou a atenção internacional na prevalência generalizada da agressão sexual e do assédio. a verdade é que a violência contra mulheres e meninas é uma das violações de direitos humanos mais comuns, arraigadas e devastadoras do mundo.

em muitos lugares, essa violência é parte da vida cotidiana, é uma ameaça constante apoiada em noções destrutivas de masculinidade e que dá forma às interações humanas. o machismo está presente na vida cotidiana da américa latina, apesar de não ser exclusivo dessa região. esta noção arcaica de masculinidade, em conjunto com a ampla disponibilidade de armas de fogo, é uma receita para aqueles que se sentem no direito de exercer poder sobre outros.

nos lares e entre parceiros, o poder das armas para ameaçar e aterrorizar faz com que atos como assédio e estupro sejam fáceis de serem cometidos pelos abusadores. os perpetuadores atacam cotidianamente indivíduos por meses e anos, e seus crimes só são interrompidos com a morte de suas vítimas.

a américa latina abriga 14 dos 25 países onde o feminicídio é mais comum. doze assassinatos motivados por gênero ocorrem na região a cada dia, a maioria por meio de armas de fogo, e as leis não garantem justiça para 49 de cada 50 vítimas.

ao lembrar o dia internacional para a eliminação da violência contra a mulher, 25 de novembro, começamos com 16 dias de ativismo contra a violência de gênero, nos quais as pessoas da região compartilham a responsabilidade de pressionar para colocar fim a esses atos e atitudes culturais que a tornam possível. como disse minha colega, amina mohammed, secretária-geral adjunta das nações unidas, “nenhuma mulher deve morrer por ser mulher”....” -
por izumi nakamitsu, alta representante das nações unidas para assuntos de desarmamento
name: Ana Julia Azevedo
tweet_full:
dia 25/11, dia internacional da eliminação da violência contra a mulher - “a igualdade entre homens e mulheres continua sendo um assunto pendente. o movimento #metoo colocou a atenção internacional na prevalência generalizada da agressão sexual e do assédio. a verdade é que a violência contra mulheres e meninas é uma das violações de direitos humanos mais comuns, arraigadas e devastadoras do mundo.

em muitos lugares, essa violência é parte da vida cotidiana, é uma ameaça constante apoiada em noções destrutivas de masculinidade e que dá forma às interações humanas. o machismo está presente na vida cotidiana da américa latina, apesar de não ser exclusivo dessa região. esta noção arcaica de masculinidade, em conjunto com a ampla disponibilidade de armas de fogo, é uma receita para aqueles que se sentem no direito de exercer poder sobre outros.

nos lares e entre parceiros, o poder das armas para ameaçar e aterrorizar faz com que atos como assédio e estupro sejam fáceis de serem cometidos pelos abusadores. os perpetuadores atacam cotidianamente indivíduos por meses e anos, e seus crimes só são interrompidos com a morte de suas vítimas.

text:
uno de los proyectos que estamos llevando a cabo en los servicios sociales del ayuntamiento de sagunto (valencia), es un taller de habilidades dirigido a adolescentes, que paralelamente se complementa con un taller de competencias parentales para parte de las madres, padres o tutores legales de las chicas y chicos con los que trabajamos.

esta semana que entra se tratará de promover la prevención de comportamientos y actitudes de violencia de género, así como la identificación de las distintas formas de abuso.

entre las diferentes actividades, me gustaría poder compartir tanto con adolescentes como con adultos este cortometraje noruego. me parece que ilustra muy bien cómo se fragua la violencia contra las mujeres y, sin quedarse ahí, apunta especialmente a los hombres a la reflexión de ser, del deber ser, si no lo son ya, modelos positivos en renuncia activa de este tipo de comportamientos.
.
.
¿a vosotrxs qué os parece? en el vídeo que he subido podéis ver un cachito del corto, pero os dejo aquí mismo el enlace por si queréis verlo entero.
👇🏼
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iue_2fa93di
👆🏼
.
.
¿conocéis algún otro corto relacionado con este tema que os gustaría compartir? 🎞
.
.
#25n #diainternacionalcontralaviolenciadegenero #violenciamachista #noesno #niunamenos #metoo #parentalidadpositiva #adolescentes #psicologia

text:
la #violencia contra las #mujeres y las niñas es una de las violaciones de los derechos humanos más graves, extendidas, arraigadas y toleradas en el mundo. las mujeres y las niñas sufren diversos tipos de violencia en todos los ámbitos de su vida y bajo múltiples manifestaciones: en el hogar, en el espacio público, en la escuela, en el trabajo, en el ciberespacio, en la comunidad, en la política, en las instituciones, entre otros.

a nivel global, 1 de cada 3 mujeres ha sufrido violencia física y/o sexual a lo largo de su vida, y en algunos países esta proporción aumenta a 7 de cada 10

en méxico, al menos 6 de cada 10 mujeres mexicanas ha enfrentado un incidente de violencia; 41.3% de las mujeres ha sido víctima de violencia sexual y, en su forma más extrema, 9 mujeres son asesinadas cada día.

con el lema de campaña #escúchametambién, las naciones unidas reconocen la determinación, relevancia y valentía de activistas y movimientos en defensa de las sobrevivientes de violencia, tales como #metoo, #miprimeracoso, #timesup, y #niunamenos, y hacen un llamado para que todas las estrategias que se implementen para erradicar la violencia contra las mujeres y las niñas, desde todos los sectores, sean integrales.

#orangetheday #dianaranja #escúchametambién #enredhadas #womensocialmedia @onumujeresmx @gire_mx @fondosemillas

text:
“fragile, opulenta donna,
matrice del paradiso 
sei granello di colpa
anche agli occhi di dio
malgrado le tue sante guerre
per l’emancipazione.
spaccarono la tua bellezza 
e rimane uno scheletro d’amore che però grida ancora vendetta,
e soltanto tu riesci
ancora a piangere,
poi ti volgi e vedi ancora i tuoi figli,
poi ti volti e non sai ancora dire
e taci meravigliata
e allora diventi grande come la terra
e innalzi il tuo canto d’amore..
(alda merini)

#25novembre #donne #hearmetoo #niunamenos #niunamenos✋ #timesup #violenceagainstwomen #noviolence #lindyhoppers #25nov #picoftheday #instadaily  #humanrights #orangeday #stoptheviolence #stopviolence #genderequality #pic #pics #metoo #supportwomen # womenrights #saynomore #breachthesilence

text:
today is international day for the elmimation of violence against women. the un theme for this year’s 16 days of activism against gender-based violence (25 november – 10 december) under the unite to end violence against women campaign is orange the world, #hearmetoo

one in three women experience violence in their lifetime, across all social status, class, race, country or age group. that’s one too many. for many of them, the #metoo moment hasn’t come yet, because speaking out can have fatal consequences, and survival is a long and complicated journey.

let us help put to an end violence against women and violence in general.
name: ZJ SPARKS 🇯🇲 aka Sparkie OMG

text:
lo que ella quiere decir cuando dice no:
1. no
.
hoy se conmemora el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra las mujeres. sin duda, un problema de todos. es increíble que en una argentina del siglo xxi sigamos teniendo miedo por nosotras y por nuestras hijas. que se siga escuchando / justificando el "es que llevaba una pollera muy corta", es que "le provocaba celos" o argumentos semejantes.
.
creo que va siendo hora que nos comprometamos con este tema y que luchemos contra nuestros propios prejuicios. y las que venimos con una cultura antigua y machista (porque nos criaron en una sociedad donde eso era lo "normal") hagamos un esfuerzo por abrir nuestra mente y sobretodo que aprendamos y escuchemos a las nuevas generaciones que sobre esto tienen mucho que decir
.
.
.
#orangetheworld #escuchametambien #diacontralaviolenciadegenero #romperelsilencio #25nov #noalaviolenciadegenero #igualdaddegenero #onumujeres #niunamenos #metoo #pintemoselmundodenaranja #almacenderestauracion #cuentagenerosa
name: Almacen de Restauracion

here’s my experience.... you can do everything to clue a new girlfriend in that that scumbag she started hanging with beat his ex-wife before she finally left as well as took custody of their child, but that same foreign old girlfriend who unshockingly lies about being a lawyer (unfort claims she practices law from @ucla without a bar certification to @uclalawschool) will take on my identity (if that sounds creepy it’s because it is) and would rather tell me how “manipulative” women are because her ex-boyfriend’s “ex-wife used the child as a weapon....?” men who put a girlfriend’s opinion or whatever before #family are gross 🤢 #realryanblair #identitytheft ・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・
good riddens to women who have a twisted view of women (includes women who blame me for their decision to leave a leadership course) and themselves (an ex-girlfriend who didn’t believe that a manipulative frat guy didn’t have her best interests in mind) to the point where they possibly need to be black, blue, and sedated before realizing it. there’s nothing to fix, right? happy international day to end violence against women!!! @unitednations #sos #repost @unwomen with @get_repost #sexbarter #betterbusiness #selflove #socialmedia #investors #truth #decency #scottlipps #venturecapital #unfaithfulness #fantasy #trustbreakers #plaything #sexterrorists #selfdestruction #trumpcard #notcool #truth #vc #disgusting

here’s my experience.... you can do everything to clue a new girlfriend in that that scumbag she started hanging with beat his ex-wife before she finally left as well as took custody of their child, but that same foreign old girlfriend who unshockingly lies about being a lawyer (unfort claims she practices law from @ucla without a bar certification to @uclalawschool) will take on my identity (if that sounds creepy it’s because it is) and would rather tell me how “manipulative” women are because her ex-boyfriend’s “ex-wife used the child as a weapon....?” men who put a girlfriend’s opinion or whatever before #family are gross 🤢 #realryanblair #identitytheft ・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・
good riddens to women who have a twisted view of women (includes women who blame me for their decision to leave a leadership course) and themselves (an ex-girlfriend who didn’t believe that a manipulative frat guy didn’t have her best interests in mind) to the point where they possibly need to be black, blue, and sedated before realizing it. there’s nothing to fix, right? happy international day to end violence against women!!! @unitednations #sos #repost @unwomen with @get_repost #sexbarter #betterbusiness #selflove #socialmedia #investors #truth #decency #scottlipps #venturecapital #unfaithfulness #fantasy #trustbreakers #plaything #sexterrorists #selfdestruction #trumpcard #notcool #truth #vc #disgusting

text:
“per tutte le violenze consumate su di lei, per tutte le umiliazioni che ha subito,
per il suo corpo che avete sfruttato, per la sua intelligenza che avete calpestato, per l’ignoranza in cui l’avete lasciata, per la libertà che le avete negato, per la bocca che le avete tappato, per le sue ali che avete tarpato, per tutto questo: in piedi, signori, davanti ad una #donna!” (william shakespeare)

text:
shout out to all women of color!!!! working every day to get heard and seen in a society that refuses to accept your existence!
let’s talk about feminism and intersectional feminism. we need this now more than ever. we need to listen to and amplify the words of our women of color in this country!

____

text:
🗣️over the past 20 years, every year, the v-day spotlight campaign calls attention to a particular group of women who are experiencing elevated levels of violence and disproportionate socio-political marginalization, in an effort to raise awareness for the issues they face and aid the community groups working to address these injustices. . .🗣️this year v-day’s spotlight will include advocates for decarceration of women in prison and for programs in prisons, jails and detention centers whose goal is to help them process their experiences and heal. these advocates acknowledge, as do many in the decarceration movement, that the past violence and poverty experienced by women is often a direct pipeline to incarceration. . .🗣️ the vast majority of women in prison would not be there if there were adequate resources in their own communities that provided education, jobs, mental health and physical health treatment. .
.🗣️if you have interest to take the stage and share your story,  your experience and advocacy around this societal problem, please sign up.  link in bio.  please #reshare this post. . . . 
#securethepurse
 #vdayeotr #vaginamonologues #womenstandup #riseresistunite #vday #vaginawarrior #womensrights #untiltheviolencestops #enddv #enddvindc  #vaginamonologues #decarceratenow #bethechange  #riseup  #blackisbeautiful  #justiceorelse #metoo #artisticuprising  #202  #ward8 #ward7 #sedc #southeastdc  #orangeisthenewblack #socialjustice
