text:
leadership and members of ni una menos assembled in buenos aires before a historic march against gender-based violence. 
despite a 2012 law which raised the maximum prison sentence for “femicide,” the killing of a woman or girl on account of her gender, argentina is still struggling against widespread gender-based violence. thankfully, a grassroots, women-led movement known as ni una menos (not one [woman] less) has arisen in argentina, and is working to empower women and defend their human rights. in this series, karl mancini (@karlitomancini) shares some of his work on the inspiring women of ni una menos and their fight for justice. to learn more about both mancini's work and ni una menos, please follow the link in our bio. 
#opensociety #argentina #niunamenos #femicide #femicidio #conmisderechosnotemetas #16days #genderbasedviolence #metoo #hearmetoo

text:
i know the pain, hurt, betrayal, grief that comes with this. i also know the strength, recovery, love on the flipside.  i am a survivor. i am fortunate. 
this must stop! 
@regran_ed from @criminalise.abuse -  today is the international day for the elimination of violence against women. 
the world has been marking this day since 1999. 
honestly? we think nearly twenty years is long enough to work out that this problem isn’t getting any better.
awareness is not resulting in any tangible change. 
it’s time for law reform that makes men accountable. 
sign the petition to criminalise nonviolent abuse at: 
http://criminaliseabuse.com 
maybe one year soon we won’t need to mark this day on our calendars.

name: Melisa Shu Jan
tweet_full:
i know the pain, hurt, betrayal, grief that comes with this. i also know the strength, recovery, love on the flipside.  i am a survivor. i am fortunate. 
this must stop! 
@regran_ed from @criminalise.abuse -  today is the international day for the elimination of violence against women. 
the world has been marking this day since 1999. 
honestly? we think nearly twenty years is long enough to work out that this problem isn’t getting any better.
awareness is not resulting in any tangible change. 
it’s time for law reform that makes men accountable. 
sign the petition to criminalise nonviolent abuse at: 
http://criminaliseabuse.com 
maybe one year soon we won’t need to mark this day on our calendars.

text:
orange the world: #hearmetoo
——————
today starts the @sayno_unite initiative of 16 days of activism to end gender-based violence. today is international day for the elimination of violence against women and december 10th, the 16th day is human rights day. —————-
launched in 2008, united nations unite to end violence against women campaign is a multi-year effort aimed at preventing and eliminating violence against women and girls around the world.
unite calls on governments, civil society, women’s organizations, young people, the private sector, the media and the entire un system to join forces in addressing the global pandemic of violence against women and girls.
the campaign builds on existing international legal and policy frameworks, and works to synergize the efforts of all un offices and agencies working to end violence against women. it sets out five key outcomes to be achieved in all countries by 2015:
* adoption and enforcement of national laws to address and punish all forms of violence against women and girls, in line with international human rights standards.
* adoption and implementation of multi-sectoral national plans of action that emphasize prevention and are adequately resourced.
* establishment of data collection and analysis systems, on the prevalence of various forms of violence against women and girls.
* establishment of national and/or local campaigns and the engagement of a diverse range of civil society actors in preventing violence and in supporting women and girls who have been abused.
* systematic efforts to address sexual violence in conflict situations and to protect women and girls from rape as a tactic of war, and the full implementation of related laws and policies.
sign up for news and action alerts via @sayno_unite ——-
spread the word, attend an event, sign up for action alerts! ——-
#unitednations #badasscrossstitch #hearmetoo #metoo #timesup #niunamenos #notonemore #balancetonporc #craftivism #craftivist #feminism #feminist #resist #persist

non discutere in auto. 
non accettare appuntamenti "riconciliatori" e sopratutto in luoghi poco frequentati e da sole.
non piegarsi alla minaccia del suicidio. 
non accettare che ci controllino il cellulare. 
o che ci dicano come vestirci.
.
.
.

text:
254femmes sont victimes de viol ou tentative de viol chaque jour en france 
1 femme meurt tous les 3 jours sous les coups de son conjoint ou ex-conjoint 
1/3 des femmes ont déjà subis du harcèlement sexuel au travail
16% de la population a subi des maltraitantes sexuelles au cours de son enfance 
1% des viols sont condamnés par la justice 
80% des femmes en situations en situation de handicap ont déjà subi des violences
59% des lesbiennes ont subis des discriminations ou violences dans les 2 dernières années 
des chiffres comme ceux-ci ils y en a encore plein, sur les discriminations à l’embauche, les différences salariales, l’excision, le revenge porn, les crimes d’honneur, les mariages forcées, et tant d’autres sujets... les violences sexuelles et sexistes sont une réalité, ici et ailleurs. elles sont multiples et complexes, nous avons besoin de tout le monde pour faire cesser ce fléau.

merci à ceux et celles qui ont défilé hier et participé à sensibiliser sur ce combat.

#noustoutes #nousaussi #metoo #feminisme #jemarchele24 #25novembre

text:
the annual 16 days of activism against gender-based violence start today, on the international day for the elimination of violence against women. its purpose is to center the prevention and elimination of violence against women and girls in all its forms, including fgm, the most brutal act of violence against women in the world. this year's theme is orange the world: #hearmetoo.  it was chosen to lift up the work done by grassroots activists and survivor advocates such as #metoo, #niunamenos, #balancetonporc and #notonemore. kota takes part in these 16 days of activism and goes orange to raise awareness on the serious women's rights violations.⠀
⠀
#goorange #16daysofactivism #feminism #endgenderbasedviolence #womensrights #genderequality #endfgm

#repost @en.redhadas • • •
la #violencia contra las #mujeres y las niñas es una de las violaciones de los derechos humanos más graves, extendidas, arraigadas y toleradas en el mundo. las mujeres y las niñas sufren diversos tipos de violencia en todos los ámbitos de su vida y bajo múltiples manifestaciones: en el hogar, en el espacio público, en la escuela, en el trabajo, en el ciberespacio, en la comunidad, en la política, en las instituciones, entre otros.

a nivel global, 1 de cada 3 mujeres ha sufrido violencia física y/o sexual a lo largo de su vida, y en algunos países esta proporción aumenta a 7 de cada 10

en méxico, al menos 6 de cada 10 mujeres mexicanas ha enfrentado un incidente de violencia; 41.3% de las mujeres ha sido víctima de violencia sexual y, en su forma más extrema, 9 mujeres son asesinadas cada día.

con el lema de campaña #escúchametambién, las naciones unidas reconocen la determinación, relevancia y valentía de activistas y movimientos en defensa de las sobrevivientes de violencia, tales como #metoo, #miprimeracoso, #timesup, y #niunamenos, y hacen un llamado para que todas las estrategias que se implementen para erradicar la violencia contra las mujeres y las niñas, desde todos los sectores, sean integrales.  #orangetheday #dianaranja #escúchametambién #enredhadas #womensocialmedia @onumujeresmx @gire_mx @fondosemillas

text:
"no dispares a tus hermanas de mundo. 💜
no te compares, no rivalices, no las envidies.
no las hagas chiquititas hasta que luego quieran desaparecer.
no las llames gordas de mierda.
no dejes mujeres heridas.
no digas que la culpa es de ellas cuando te ponen los cuernos.
no digas: "mujer tenía que ser".
no le digas nunca a las hermanas que están feas.
porque este sistema las quiere así: inseguras.
porque la belleza es la herramienta que tiene el patriarcado para controlarlas.
porque para estar bonitas no hace falta sino estar vivas.
no permitas que las hermanas se odien a sí mismas.
no les hagas creer que no valen, que no pueden, que no son.
ayuda a tus hermanas a interrumpir sus embarazos si es lo que deciden.
recógela si está sola.
ayúdalas a liberarse de sus padres, de sus maridos y de sus hijos.
ayuda a tus hermanas de mundo a sembrar corazones feministas.
déjales tu mejor rojo de labios para que salgan de noche.
custódiales el secreto como cuando os llamaban brujas.
no las traiciones.
no dispares a tus hermanas de mundo.
no acabes con ellas.
porque vivas os queréis. porque juntas os queréis.
〰️ y porque es lo único que ellos no esperan:
que en lugar de mataros
os deis la mano."
💜
by @roygalan
#hermanas #metoo #yositecreo #feminismo #mujeres #compañeras #hermanasdemundo #brujas #roygalan #mujer #sermujer #locasdelcoño #soacha #lavega #cundinamarca #colombia #25n #25noviembre #diacontralaviolenciadegenero

ayuda a tus hermanas de mundo a sembrar corazones feministas.
déjales tu mejor rojo de labios para que salgan de noche.
custódiales el secreto como cuando os llamaban brujas.
no las traiciones.
no dispares a tus hermanas de mundo.
no acabes con ellas.
porque vivas os queréis. porque juntas os queréis.
〰️ y porque es lo único que ellos no esperan:
que en lugar de mataros
os deis la mano."
💜
by @roygalan

text:
- bannon got it immediately. he believes in the whole andrew breitbart doctrine that politics is downstream from culture, so to change politics you need to change culture. and fashion trends are a useful proxy for that. trump is like a pair of uggs, or crocs, basically. so how do you get from people thinking ‘ugh. totally ugly’ to the moment when everyone is wearing them? that was the inflection point he was looking for.

is what cambridge analytica does akin to bullying? - i think it’s worse than bullying, christopher wylie says. - because people don’t necessarily know it’s being done to them. at least bullying respects the agency of people because they know. so it’s worse, because if you do not respect the agency of people, anything that you’re doing after that point is not conducive to a democracy. and fundamentally, information warfare is not conducive to democracy.

millions of people’s personal information was stolen and used to target them in ways they wouldn’t have seen, and couldn’t have known about, by a mercenary outfit, cambridge analytica, who, wylie says, “would work for anyone”. who would pitch to russian oil companies. would they subvert elections abroad on behalf of foreign governments?

it occurs to me to ask wylie this one night. - yes.

nato or non-nato? - either. i mean they’re mercenaries. they’ll work for pretty much anyone who pays.

it’s an incredible revelation. it also encapsulates all of the problems of outsourcing – at a global scale, with added cyberweapons. and in the middle of it all are the public – our intimate family connections, our “likes”, our crumbs of personal data, all sucked into a swirling black hole that’s expanding and growing and is now owned by a politically motivated billionaire.

carole cadwalladr
the guardian

text:
sei bella.
e non per quel filo di trucco.
sei bella per quanta vita ti è passata addosso, per i sogni che hai dentro e che non conosco.
bella per tutte le volte che toccava a te, ma avanti il prossimo.
per le parole spese invano
e per quelle cercate lontano.
per ogni lacrima scesa
e per quelle nascoste di notte
al chiaro di luna complice.
per il sorriso che provi,
le attenzioni che non trovi,
per le emozioni che senti
e la speranza che inventi.
sei bella semplicemente, 
come un fiore raccolto in fretta,
come un dono inaspettato,
come uno sguardo rubato
o un abbraccio sentito.
sei bella
e non importa che il mondo sappia, sei bella davvero,
ma solo per chi ti sa guardare.

alda merini

per ogni lacrima scesa
e per quelle nascoste di notte
al chiaro di luna complice.
per il sorriso che provi,
le attenzioni che non trovi,
per le emozioni che senti
e la speranza che inventi.
sei bella semplicemente, 
come un fiore raccolto in fretta,
come un dono inaspettato,
come uno sguardo rubato
o un abbraccio sentito.
sei bella
e non impoa che il mondo sappia, sei bella davvero,
ma solo per chi ti sa guardare.

alda merini

text:
essere libere di uscire con quella gonna un po' più corta, essere libere di dire "non ti amo più", essere libere di scendere in piazza per reclamare i nostri diritti. essere libere di essere #libere. nel 2018 è morta una donna ogni 72 ore, tante altre continuano a subire #violenza fisica e psicologica. a volte veniamo violentate senza neanche accorgercene, quando occhi indiscreti ci seguono, quando qualcuno urla un commento sgradevole, e ancora più spesso a fare del male alle #donne sono altre donne. per far sì che ogni giorno sia il #25novembre dobbiamo essere noi le prime a darci una mano, a dare il buon esempio, perché se colpiscono una colpiscono tutte!
•
•
ti meriti un #amore che ti ascolti quando canti,
che ti appoggi quando fai la ridicola,
che ti rispetti per il tuo essere libera,
che ti accompagni nel tuo volo,
che non abbia #paura di cadere.

despite a 2012 law which raised the maximum prison sentence for “femicide,” the killing of a woman or girl on account of her gender, argentina is still struggling against widespread gender-based violence. thankfully, a grassroots, women-led movement known as ni una menos (not one [woman] less) has arisen in argentina, and is working to empower women and defend their human rights. in this series, karl mancini (@karlitomancini) shares some of his work on the inspiring women of ni una menos and their fight for justice. to learn more about both mancini's work and ni una menos, please follow the link in our bio. 
#opensociety #argentina #niunamenos #femicide #femicidio #conmisderechosnotemetas #16days #genderbasedviolence #metoo #hearmetoo

text:
orange the world: #hearmetoo
——————
today starts the @sayno_unite initiative of 16 days of activism to end gender-based violence. today is international day for the elimination of violence against women and december 10th, the 16th day is human rights day. —————-
launched in 2008, united nations unite to end violence against women campaign is a multi-year effort aimed at preventing and eliminating violence against women and girls around the world.
unite calls on governments, civil society, women’s organizations, young people, the private sector, the media and the entire un system to join forces in addressing the global pandemic of violence against women and girls.
the campaign builds on existing international legal and policy frameworks, and works to synergize the efforts of all un offices and agencies working to end violence against women. it sets out five key outcomes to be achieved in all countries by 2015:
* adoption and enforcement of national laws to address and punish all forms of violence against women and girls, in line with international human rights standards.
* adoption and implementation of multi-sectoral national plans of action that emphasize prevention and are adequately resourced.
* establishment of data collection and analysis systems, on the prevalence of various forms of violence against women and girls.
* establishment of national and/or local campaigns and the engagement of a diverse range of civil society actors in preventing violence and in supporting women and girls who have been abused.
* systematic efforts to address sexual violence in conflict situations and to protect women and girls from rape as a tactic of war, and the full implementation of related laws and policies.
sign up for news and action alerts via @sayno_unite ——-
spread the word, attend an event, sign up for action alerts! ——-
#unitednations #badasscrossstitch #hearmetoo #metoo #timesup #niunamenos #notonemore #balancetonporc #craftivism #craftivist #feminism #feminist #resist #persist

text_retweet:
for all the violence committed on you,for all the humiliations she suffered,for your body that you have exploited,for his intelligence you have trampled,for the ignorance in which you left it,for the freedom you denied it,for the mouth you plugged it,for the wings you cut them,
for all of this:standing, gentlemen, in front of a woman.
‘
‘
november 25th. international day against violence against women.

#repost @guggenheim_venice
・・・
per tutte le violenze consumate su di lei,
per tutte le umiliazioni che ha subito,
per il suo corpo che avete sfruttato,
per la sua intelligenza che avete calpestato,
per l’ignoranza in cui l’avete lasciata,
per la libertà che le avete negato,
per la bocca che le avete tappato,
per le ali che le avete tagliato,
per tutto questo:
in piedi, signori, davanti a una donna.

text:
por ella... la que puede ser todo lo que quiera ser:  rebelde | fabulosa | libre y mucho más. porque merece ser amada y apreciada de verdad, porque el amor no duele, no hiere, no te humilla ni te hace daño.

por eso esta cami es de nuestras favoritas!! ❤️ si nadie te lo ha dicho hoy te lo decimos nosotras: eres increíble, hermosa y única 👉🏻 ámate! valórate! así nadie podrá maltratarte!!!
.

text:
sono 3100 le #donne uccise dal 2000 a oggi, più di 3 a settimana. 
nella maggior parte dei casi ad ammazzare è chi diceva di amarle. 
sono tante le donne che hanno cercato aiuto per uscire da situazioni di abuso: quasi 50 si sono rivolte ai centri antiviolenza nel 2017 e di queste oltre 29mila hanno iniziato un percorso di uscita dalla violenza.

anche per noi di @derivatisanniti #nonènormalechesianormale. 
#metoo #noallaviolenzasulledonne #nonunadimeno #stopviolence #femminicidio #25novembre

text:
a magazine publisher, photographer and part time activist @rankinarchive is one of the most celebrated fashion photographers of our time. he’s  spent over 40 years trailblazing his way through the world of photography. he’s produced an incredibly unique and eclectic body of work that challenges every possible norm thrown at him. the founder of @dazed and now @hungermagazine the lens now turns on him as he sits down with us in reflective mood in this sometimes nervy chat unpacking his thoughts on the #metoo movement, why he “fucking” hates his birthday and why at 50 he feels like he’s just getting started. if you want to read this interview click the bio link. .
.
credits: 1. ellen burton, 2018 for hunger. 2. big night out, rank, issue 00, 2000. 3. winnie harlow, 2016 4. bella hadid, 2016, love magazine
.
.

text:
feliz día contra la violencia de género 💜

respétate y respétale.
💜
escúchate a ti y a los que tienes alrededor cuando habláis y date cuenta de cuándo hay machismo en nuestra comunicación, porque todos somos machistas incluso sin darnos cuenta, ya que hemos crecido en la desigualdad, pero estamos totalmente capacitados para mejorar eso: no dejes pasar el machismo
💜
planteate tu rol en tu propia relación, piensa en ti y en tus sueños, y no olvides que el apoyo y la dedicación son cosas que todos podemos ofrecer y no es solo cosa de mujeres: si no te ayuda a recordar que puedes conseguir tus metas, te apoya, te escucha, te cuida, te quiere, te ama, te empodera... no es porque sea un hombre, los hombres y las mujeres somos absolutamente igual de capaces en esto: si no lo hace, probablemente no te merece.
💜
recuerda que las mujeres necesitamos la fuerza de la unión, ayudarnos, halagarnos, cuidarnos. nos necesitamos 🙌
💜
y por último, recordar que este día no es sólo por las mujeres, sino también por los hombres que aman a sus parejas, madres, hermanas, hijas, amigas, primas, sobrinas, tías, abuelas... y que jamás querrían verlas humilladas, golpeadas, amenazadas, atemorizadas... o asesinadas. la violencia de género nos afecta a todos: los hombres sois una fuerza crucial en el camino hacia la igualdad. manifestaros cuando haya machismo, no dejéis que vuestros amigos falten el respeto a las mujeres, educad a vuestros hijos en el amor y la paternidad cálida y afectuosa, amad y respetad a las madres de vuestros hijos incluso si ya no sois pareja, y también a vuestras madres, hermanas, amigas... haced el cambio con nosotras, por favor, que vosotros también lo necesitáis, todos los necesitamos✋
por un mundo en que no haya que tener un día como el de hoy, porque no haga falta 🙏
#juntassomosmaisfortes #juntas
#juntassomosmasfuertes #mujeres #fuerza #violenciadegenero #25denoviembrediainternacionalcontralaviolenciadegenero #machismo #feminismo #feminist #equality #igualdad #lamanadasomosnosotras #juntos #metoo #feminismo #25n #diacontralaviolenciadegenero

escúchate a ti y a los que tienes alrededor cuando habláis y date cuenta de cuándo hay machismo en nuestra comunicación, porque todos somos machistas incluso sin darnos cuenta, ya que hemos crecido en la desigualdad, pero estamos totalmente capacitados para mejorar eso: no dejes pasar el machismo
💜
planteate tu rol en tu propia relación, piensa en ti y en tus sueños, y no olvides que el apoyo y la dedicación son cosas que todos podemos ofrecer y no es solo cosa de mujeres: si no te ayuda a recordar que puedes conseguir tus metas, te apoya, te escucha, te cuida, te quiere, te ama, te empodera... no es porque sea un hombre, los hombres y las mujeres somos absolutamente igual de capaces en esto: si no lo hace, probablemente no te merece.
💜
recuerda que las mujeres necesitamos la fuerza de la unión, ayudarnos, halagarnos, cuidarnos. nos necesitamos 🙌
💜
y por último, recordar que este día no es sólo por las mujeres, sino también por los hombres que aman a sus parejas, madres, hermanas, hijas, amigas, primas, sobrinas, tías, abuelas... y que jamás querrían verlas humilladas, golpeadas, amenazadas, atemorizadas... o asesinadas. la violencia de género nos afecta a todos: los hombres sois una fuerza crucial en el camino hacia la igualdad. manifestaros cuando haya machismo, no dejéis que vuestros amigos falten el respeto a las mujeres, educad a vuestros hijos en el amor y la paternidad cálida y afectuosa, amad y respetad a las madres de vuestros hijos incluso si ya no sois pareja, y también a vuestras madres, hermanas, amigas... haced el cambio con nosotras, por favor, que vosotros también lo necesitáis, todos los necesitamos✋
por un mundo en que no haya que tener un día como el de hoy, porque no haga falta 🙏
 untas

text:
una vez más elevo la la voz en favor de nosotras las mujeres, nuestros derechos y nuestra vida. debemos generar consciencia y saber que es responsabilidad de todos trabajar para alcanzar la eliminación del maltrato contra mujeres y niñas (y hacia cualquier persona o ser vivo). con la intención de educarnos, les dejo aquí algunas formas de identificar a una mujer en condición de maltrato según @unwomen 
1. la mujer luce neviosa o ansiosa tratando de complacer a su pareja
2. tiene acceso limitado al dinero, no puede tomar ninguna decisión económica.
3. muestra cambios en su personalidad, comportamiento o apariencia física.
4. deja de cuidar de sus necesidades emocionales, físicas y espirituales.
edúcate y educa a tu familia... tus hijas merecen un mundo más seguro para ellas.
¡conéctate con el amor en ti! 💛🎈🌼🌞 relieve humano

text:
25 de noviembre. el día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer. hoy conmemoramos a las hermanas mirabal de república dominicana y la infinidad de mujeres que han sido asesinadas por sus parejas, familiares, vecinos, amigos, desconocidos. nos matan porqué somos mujeres, porqué la sociedad los avala y porqué el estado los respalda. 
hoy nos faltan más de las que las estadísticas pueden contabilizar pero hoy también somos más las que luchamos por un mundo libre de violencia, somos también hombres y disidencias resistiendo. 
hoy sabemos que no nos para nadie, porque la revolución será feminista o no será. 
acá estamos y nos estamos cuidando entre todas, hasta que la sociedad cambie y nuestro género no nos reste libertades ni vidas. 
#sevaacaer #feminist #25n #niunamenos #vivasnosqueremos #feminista #genderequality #metoo #noesno #nomasviolencia #fuckpatriarchy

text: today, november 25th, marks the start of #16daysofactivism ,ending on dec 10th, human rights day. this annual 16 day campaign designated by the united nations is designed to bring awareness to gender based violence and to galvanize action to end violence towards women and girls internationally. today, on the international day for the elimination of violence against women, i encourage you to wear a little bit of orange to show support for the #hearmetoo theme this year. let’s talk numbers. 1 in 3 women or girls experience physical or sexual violence in their life, typically at the hands of an intimate partner. 71% of human trafficking victims are women and girls. 200 million women and girls have been subject to female genital mutilation, which is still a major problem in many parts of the world. today, and during this 16 day campaign, some things you can do to be proactive are 1. give survivors a safe space to talk about their experiences. listen to them.. thank them for their bravery. 2. educate yourself on the violence surrounding women and girls today. the united nations website is a wonderful resource to start with. 3. attend a public event surrounding the topic and get involved. the more we can do collectively to spread awareness, educate, and allow survivors a safe welcoming space to process their experiences are baby steps we can all take towards making our world safer for women and girls. i took this photo from a hotel hallway window in york, england, where i was starting a ma in applied human rights before i decided to go with another us university. i thought the photo was fitting for today, given the reason i was there. equal rights are human rights, and so are women’s rights 🖤 finally, as a counselor with crisis text line, i would encourage anyone who needs or wants to talk with a counselor via text within the united states about these topics to text 741741- were here for you xx much love #endvaw #orangetheworld #orangeurworld #endgenderbasedviolence #unitednations #unwomen #humanrights #activism #16days #thismattersnow #metoo #violence #intimatepartnerviolence #fgm #humantrafficking #awareness #educate #survivors #assault #ctl #crisistextline

text:
היום היום הבין לאומי נגד אלימות כלפי נשים. על אלימות מיילדותית, אלימות מערכתית מובנת, כבר שמעתן??? אנחנו רוצות שגם בישראל תקום תנועה ברורה שאומרת: די!!! שצועקת יחד איתנו שזה חייב להיפסק. 
שזו זכותנו ללדת בכבוד, איך, איפה ועם מי שאנחנו בוחרות. 
זו זכותנו לקבל המלצות, ליווי ותמיכה ולא הנחיות המונחתות עלינו כפקודות. 
זו זכותנו לקבל מידע מלא על פרוצדורות שהצוות ממליץ לבצע בנו, ללא מניפולציות רגשיות. 
זו זכותנו להחליט מה ייעשה ומה לא ייעשה בגופינו. 
גם כשאנחנו מותשות וכואבות ומפוחדות, זה עדיין הגוף שלנו ולא של אף אחד אחר. וזהו הלידה שלנו!!! אנחנו מבקשות דווקא היום, להשמיע קול ברור ותקיף שמתנגד לאלימות המופנית כלפי נשים יולדות, היא לא יכולה עוד להישאר שקופה!!! אנחנו רוצות לוודא שאף אישה לא תחווה אלימות כזאת ביום הכי משמעותי בחייה! 
ואנחנו מבקשות מכן לעזור לנו להעלות מודעות לתופעה המושתקת הזו. 
איך?  עקבו על הפוסט שיעלה הערב בעמוד שלנו
*** שתפו את הפוסט
*** אם חוויתן אלימות מיילדותית כתבו בתגובות "אני" וציינו את שם בית החולים בו ילדתן. *** תנכיחו את התופעה ותנו לה שם ותמונה אם תרגישו שאתן מוכנות לחלוק את סיפור הלידה שלכן איתנו כאן בתגובות או בקבוצה שלנו. מוזמנות להוסיף לסיפור שלכן את ההאשטגים  #metoo #stop_obstetric_violence
אנחנו רוצות לשים סוף לאלימות מיילדותית! בואו תעזרו לנו וקחו חלק בשינוי!

#נשים_קוראות_ללדת  #חופש_בחירה_בלידה #זכויות_נשים_בלידה #זכותינו_על_גופינו  #לידה_מכבדת #אלימות_מיילדותית
name: מקדמות זכויות נשים בלידה

stop_filter_tweet: היום היום הבין לאומי נגד אלימות כלפי נשים . על אלימות מיילדותית , אלימות מערכתית מובנת , כבר שמעתן ? ? ? אנחנו רוצות שגם בישראל תקום תנועה ברורה שאומרת : די ! ! ! שצועקת יחד איתנו שזה חייב להיפסק . שזו זכותנו ללדת בכבוד , איך , איפה ועם מי שאנחנו בוחרות . זו זכותנו לקבל המלצות , ליווי ותמיכה ולא הנחיות המונחתות עלינו כפקודות . זו זכותנו לקבל מידע מלא על פרוצדורות שהצוות ממליץ לבצע בנו , ללא מניפולציות רגשיות . זו זכותנו להחליט מה ייעשה ומה לא ייעשה בגופינו . גם כשאנחנו מותשות וכואבות ומפוחדות , זה עדיין הגוף שלנו ולא של אף אחד אחר . וזהו הלידה שלנו ! ! ! אנחנו מבקשות דווקא היום , להשמיע קול ברור ותקיף שמתנגד לאלימות המופנית כלפי נשים יולדות , היא לא יכולה עוד להישאר שקופה ! ! ! אנחנו רוצות לוודא שאף אישה לא תחווה אלימות כזאת ביום הכי משמעותי בחייה ! ואנחנו מבקשות מכן לעזור לנו להעלות מודעות לתופעה המושתקת הזו . איך ? עקבו על הפוסט שיעלה הערב בעמוד שלנו *** שתפו את הפוסט *** אם חוויתן אלימות מיילדותית כתבו בתגובות `` אני '' וציינו את שם בית החולים בו ילדתן . *** תנכיחו את התופעה ותנו לה שם ותמונה אם תרגישו שאתן מוכנות לחלוק את סיפור הלידה שלכן איתנו כאן בתגובות או בקבוצה שלנו . מוזמנות להוסיף לסיפור שלכן את ההאשטגים top_obstetric_violence אנחנו רוצות לשים סוף לאלימות מיילדותית ! בואו תעזרו לנו וקחו חלק בשינוי !

text:
chains and boundaries. [trigger warning] ▪️
today is international day of elimination of violence against women, and it is harrowing to read the statistics. at least  100 uk women killed by men or where a man is the principal suspect by 24 september this year 100 women in 267 days is one woman dead every 2.6 days.  over 20% of women in england and wales have suffered some form of sexual violence since the age of 16. considering rape or attempted rape alone it is 5.5% and 0.3%. these are shocking statistics, and yet we hear more in uk media about immigration and about terrorism.
.
▪️
so many women do not come forwards. so many women come forwards but are not believed. and so many women are made to feel ashamed by questions such as ‘so why did you stay?’ dv and abuse takes different forms and coercive control is one of them, which is not so easy to prove and not easy to escape from. abuse of any form breaks down the spirit and self-worth and self-esteem something which prevents so many women leaving until it is too late. we need to have more stringent legal systems in place, and we have to believe women. let us end of culture of silence and let us put survivors at the centre of any action @unwomen we have to enable more women to share their stories without shame and stigma, and we have to consider the multi-faceted nature of abuse and violence. and for any man who says ‘what about men’, honestly do have a considered look at your unconscious biases, and instead think of what you can do to help this. ▪️
i am planning to take my two year olds to their first march against misogyny in manchester next week. if you are around do join us! .
//
#unwomen #hearmenow #orangetheworld #believethesurvivors #metoo #timeisup #womenempowerment #womenempoweringwomen #internationaldayofeliminationofviolenceagainstwomen #limitlessboundaries #feministparenting #parenting #mothersofdaughters #motherhoodunplugged #cornersofmyworld #liverpool #smashthepatriarchy #raisingfeminists #distractionsandinspirations #parenting101  #makeitblissful #quietchaotics #momentsofmine #holdthemoments #honestmotherhood #instaparent #parenthood #parentsofinstagram #creativitycoach #businessmentor

so many women do not come forwards. so many women come forwards but are not believed. and so many women are made to feel ashamed by questions such as ‘so why did you stay?’ dv and abuse takes different forms and coercive control is one of them, which is not so easy to prove and not easy to escape from. abuse of any form breaks down the spirit and self-woh and self-esteem something which prevents so many women leaving until it is too late. we need to have more stringent legal systems in place, and we have to believe women. let us end of culture of silence and let us put survivors at the centre of any action  we have to enable more women to share their stories without shame and stigma, and we have to consider the multi-faceted nature of abuse and violence. and for any man who says ‘what about men’, honestly do have a considered look at your unconscious biases, and instead think of what you can do to help this. ▪️
i am planning to take my two year olds to their first march against misogyny in manchester next week. if you are around do join us! .
//

text:
“the rise of the scarred moon”
#metoo
80x60 cms, acrylic on canvas

i rose everyday
like a puppet hanging to a thread
from a pit of dirt
with my clothes stained
ashamed to show the pain rooted inside..
today and everyday, i choose to rise
wild, passionate and transient
like the sea that i rule..
i choose to rise as the muse,
the creatrix of my own world
i choose to rise as the mother,
engaging into love and compassion
i choose to rise like the moon
to still shine in times of darkness.. #mauritianartist #artist #artistsoninstagram #artlovers #metoo #divinefeminine #womanrising #acrylicpainting #contemporarypainting #emotions #emotionalpainting #womanandmoon #wildwoman

text:
🤚🏻hoy el es día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer, vivimos en un momento histórico en donde las mujeres tomamos protagonismo, no nos callamos y somos solidarias entre nosotras.
la #violenciacontralamujer existe y lejos de bajar, el porcentaje de mujeres que sufren maltrato sigue subiendo, démosle la voz a las que no la tienen, que no saben, que no pueden, que tienen miedo, que no se animan, depende de nosotras cambiar esta situación, la violencia no tiene clase social.
“la forma más común de violencia experimentada por mujeres a nivel mundial es la violencia física infringida por una pareja íntima, esto incluye mujeres golpeadas, obligadas a tener relaciones sexuales o víctimas de alguna otra forma de abuso. entre las formas cotidianas de violencia contra las mujeres, se encuentran también, el tráfico de mujeres, la mutilación genital, el asesinato por causa de la dote, el "homicidio por honor" y la “venganza porno” incluida como nueva forma de violencia digital.
en los últimos años, las voces de sobrevivientes y activistas, mediante campañas como la de #metoo o #yotambién, #timesup, #niunamenos, #notonemore y #balancetonporc, entre otras, han ido ganando protagonismo que ya no puede seguir siendo ignorados. las mujeres y las niñas de todo el mundo sufren maltratos generalizados y sus historias deben salir a la luz.” @unwomen
name: Adri Montaldo Vera

text:
today the world goes orange for international day for the elimination of violence against women. across the world, in our region and right here at home, the prevalence of violence towards women and girls has persisted and disrupted the quality of their lives because of the historical gender biases that are entrenched in our society. this year, un women has enlisted the theme #hearmetoo, in light of tarana burke's #metoo movement, to bring attention to the experiences and plight of women who are far removed from western media's spotlight. #hearmetoo is the voice of every young girl and woman who has been shamed into silence. it endeavours to empower through empathy and shared experiences and to move closer to deconstructing the powers and systems that engender violence towards women, with survivors at the centre. 
as 16 days of activism starts off, mek we listen to survivors.

text:
often times we can’t experience the fullness of christ due to doubt, fear and lack of acceptance to his ways. when god challenges us in various areas of our lives we must trust him. we must deepen our relationship with him for a more peaceful understanding of his will for our lives. when we stop needing others to be constant reminders of his goodness and start constantly reminding ourselves how good god is, it’s then we can experience our relationships with god on a new level.

text:
<< no to violence on women >>. rome, november 25 - italy moves for the world day against violence against women. politicians, institutions, but also ordinary people: there are hundreds of initiatives to promote the event throughout the country. "it is time to no longer be afraid for fear, for shame, for the hope that everything will sooner or later be adjusted to live quietly, says laura boldrini, chairman of the chamber of deputies, intervening at the house today. “is violence, silence is no refuge, no escape routes, silence island and word aggregates, silence kills and is the word to save.” - <<no alla violenza sulle donne>>. roma, 25 novembre - l'italia si mobilita per la giornata mondiale contro la violenza sulle donne. politici, istituzioni, ma anche gente comune: sono centinaia le iniziative per promuovere l'evento in tutto il paese. "e' il momento di non stare più zitte per paura, per vergogna, per la speranza che tutto prima o poi si aggiusta, zitte per quieto vivere - dice la presidente della camera dei deputati laura boldrini, intervenendo alla camera oggi. ma quando c'è la violenza, il silenzio non è rifugio, non offre vie di scampo, il silenzio isola e la parola aggrega, il silenzio uccide ed è la parola a salvare". - v.a. •
•
•
•
•
•
•

text:
#25n 💜 
el 14 de noviembre de 1817 fue silenciada la voz de una de las mujeres más valientes de la gesta independentista de la nueva granada. policarpa hace parte de esa generación de mujeres que se levantaron contra la tiranía y abrazaron la causa por la libertad y la soberanía de nuestro territorio. 
pertenece a esa estirpe de mujeres que aprendieron de la resistencia de la cacica gaitana ante el conquistador español, de las negras esclavas, de las mestizas, de las juanas que acompañaron alejército libertador, de las mujeres criollas que alentaron en sus tertulias el espíritu de insubordinación 
y libertad inspiradas en la revolución francesa. una generación de mujeres que se levantaron titánicas por la defensa del valor más preciado de los pueblos: la dignidad; y no mermaron en la lucha contra sus opresores. 
mujeres a quienes les arrebataron la vida y de quienes valoramos el significado de la fortaleza y la resistencia, a las que hacemos eco hoy 25 de noviembre, día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer. 💜💚 #nonoscallarán #25n #niunamenos #diacontralaviolenciadegénero #mujeres #colombia #womenpower #metoo #policarpa #feminismo #graffiti #art #eckounltd

y libead inspiradas en la revolución francesa. una generación de mujeres que se levantaron titánicas por la defensa del valor más preciado de los pueblos: la dignidad; y no mermaron en la lucha contra sus opresores. 
mujeres a quienes les arrebataron la vida y de quienes valoramos el significado de la foaleza y la resistencia, a las que hacemos eco hoy 25 de noviembre, día internacional de la eliminación de la violencia contra la mujer. 💜💚

text:
io voglio avere gli stessi privilegi dei maschi.
io voglio poter avere le stesse opportunità lavorative dei maschi.
io voglio poter camminare per strada e non preoccuparmi di come sono vestita, non dover abbassare la testa quando passo davanti a dei maschi (coetanei e non), non voglio accelerare il passo per fuggire a quegli occhi indiscreti, non voglio dover serrare le labbra per paura che ogni loro minimo movimento possa sembrare un flirt nei confronti di quei maschi.
io voglio poter entrare in un bar con tutti maschi e non avere paura di quello che potrebbe succedere.
io voglio poter prendere un taxi, un pulman di sera tardi con le cuffie nelle orecchie e avere la testa nelle mie fantasie di donna e non dovermi preocupare di ciò perchè potrei non tornarci più a casa o non tornarci come ero prima.
io vorrei potermi svincolare anche dai giudizi delle altre donne che ormai sono troppo influenzate dal pensare comune che se fai qualcosa di diverso dagli standard, se non sei truccata ogni giorno, se provi a vestirti più succinta per sentirti bene con te stessa, se parli con un ragazzo che non sia il tuo fidanzato o tuo fratello, se non segui certe regole, vieni classificata e quel soprannome “zoccola, puttana” non te lo leva più nessuno di dosso. 
il rossetto non è consenso.
il vestito scollato non è consenso.
la gonna corta non è consenso.
essere ubriaca non è consenso.
essere da sola non è consenso.
essere la tua fidanzata, tua moglie, la tua compagna non è consenso. 
il silenzio non è consenso.
stare ferma non è consenso.
tutto quello che non voglio, 
non è consenso. 
#nonènormalechesianormale#metoo#25novembregiornatamondialecontrolaviolenzasulledonne#nonseisola#nonèconsenso

text:
.nessuna gonna è troppo corta.

non siamo angeli, non siamo streghe.
non siamo sante né puttane.
non siamo l’oggetto delle vostre brame.
non bocconcini che saziano una vile fame.

non siamo tue, sue, vostre, non siamo di nessuno,
ma poi dobbiamo sempre dimostrare di essere qualcuno.
morire per salvare un figlio, un lavoro, per il diritto di voto,
morire perché alziamo la testa, anche per mano di un marito.

vendute comprate schiavizzate lapidate.
bruciate al rogo donne, fattucchiere rinnegate!
sfregiate infibulate stuprate e poi umiliate.
in fondo è colpa nostra se siamo troppo amate.

in fondo è colpa nostra, per come siamo vestite,
ché una gonna troppo corta risveglia voglie inaudite.
ma verranno giorni giusti, giorni senza fiori né sonetti,
giorni di rispetto, dignità e pari pari pari diritti.

non siamo angeli, non siamo dèmoni.
siamo donne, uguali a voi, uomini.
•••
[chiedo scusa ai miei maestri di metrica per non aver seguito nessuna regola.]
#versianarchici
#feminist #feminism

#metoo #thisisnotconsent #25novembre
#love #onelove #sempre25novembre 
#nonènormalechesianormale #noallaviolenzasulledonne
#poetry #poem #poesia #lovewriting #thewords
